1373133600.artistName: NUMBERS feat. RUSTIE, JACKMASTER, ONEMAN, SPENCER, DEADBOY, REDINHO and SOPHIE

1373214600.artistName: ORGI-E / KLAMFYR feat. F1RSTEHOLDET & OPA OPA ORKESTAR

description.uk:
The bearded word juggler Action Bronson has a past as a gourmet chef, but has put palette knife and carving fork aside to devote himself to rap. Too bad for the hungry mouthes in Queens, New York. Good for the international hip hop community.

This immigrant son knows how to serve rap that will draw in all fans of true New Yorker hip hop faster than a lobster bisque reaches the boiling point.

With great confidence, Action Bronson stands on the shoulders of Ghostface Killah and the rest of the Wu-Tang Clan as his rap takes him away from the kitchen and straight onto the hip hop scene.

Label: Vice / import
description.dk:
Den skæggede ord-akrobat Action Bronson har en fortid som gourmetkok, men har lagt paletkniv og stegegaffel til side for at hellige sig rappen. Synd for de sultne maver i Queens, New York. Heldigt for det internationale hiphopsamfund.

Immigrantsønnen her kan nemlig servere en omgang rap, som vil knytte alle tilhængere af sand newyorkerhiphop til sig, hurtigere end en hummerbisque når kogepunktet.

Action Bronson stiller sig selvsikkert på skuldrene af Ghostface Killah og resten af Wu-Tang Clan og rapper sig væk fra kødgryderne og ind på hiphoppens lysende stamtavle.

Label: Vice / import

related.name: JOEY BADA$$
related.short_description: Young hip hop hope from Brooklyn

related.name: KENDRICK LAMAR
related.short_description: The new hip hop king of the West Coast

description.uk:
Copenhagen’s darkest underground, with the store and label posh isolation as a platform, keeps on producing new crisscrossing constellations within (post) punk and industrial. Age Coin is a duo of members from Lower and Vår, their music describes, according to themselves, what it’s like “when you’re feeling really low in a corner of the club”. With foggy, industrial soundscapes, they create bleak scenarios where the dim techno rhythm is hovering like an abstract threat of annihilation. A massive darkness built from steel and shabby electronics.

Label: Posh Isolation
description.dk:
Københavns mørkeste undergrund – med butikken og selskabet posh isolation som platform – bliver ved med at gyde nye konstellationer på kryds og tværs inden for (post)punk og industrial. Age Coin er en duo bestående af medlemmer fra Lower og Vår, deres musik beskriver ifølge dem selv, hvordan det føles, ”når du har det rigtigt dårligt i et hjørne af klubben”. Med tågede, industrielle lydbilleder skaber de kuldslåede scenarier, hvor den matte technorytme hænger over hovedet som en abstrakt undergangstrussel. Et massivt mørke bygget af stål og skrabet elektronik.

Label: Posh Isolation

description.uk:
The Aussie-rockers Airbourne hold the balls of rock music in as firm a grip as their countrymen AC/DC. The new album Black Dogs Barking is likely to be as chemically cleansed of ballads, bullshit and unnecessary shifting accords as the earlier ones. But great albums are one thing. As always the stage is the only place to experience these guys sing about Jack D, wicked blondes and amber ales. Airbourne plays rock with riffs like bolts of lightning and grinding guitar solos. Look forward to meeting these guys, who obviously had a healthy amount of hops and motor oil mixed into their baby food.

Label: Roadrunner / Warner
description.dk:
Aussie-rockerne Airbourne har samme faste greb om rockmusikkens boller som deres landsmænd AC/DC. Deres nye plade Black Dogs Barking bliver sandsynligvis som de foregående kemisk renset for ballader, bullshit og unødvendige akkordskift. Men fede skiver er én ting. Scenen er og bliver stadig det rette sted at opleve de her gutters sange om Jack D, slemme blondiner og ravgylden øl. Airbourne spiller rock, der lyner med riffs og hvinende guitarsoloer. Glæd dig til at møde nogle svende, der tydeligvis har fået motorolie og humle ind med modermælken.

Label: Roadrunner / Warner

related.name: METALLICA
related.short_description: Thrash giants roll over the Orange Stage.

description.uk: For years Ajuna have been hatching and brooding in the cellar depths: In 2013 exciting things are happening for the quintet who have a new EP, Prisoners Of The Sun, due. The Copenhagen band plays crushingly chaotic metal with a Nordic touch, finding room for both depressive beauty and marrow-shattering aggression. Black metal and technical hardcore are just some of the genres Ajuna uses in their attempt to set your ears and nerve system on fire.
description.dk: I flere år har Ajuna fostret og ruget i kælderdybet: I 2013 sker spændende ting for kvintetten, der har en ny ep – Prisoners Of The Sun – på vej. Københavnerne spiller sønderknusende kaotisk metal med et nordisk strejf, der finder plads til både depressiv skønhed og marvruskende aggression. Blackmetal og teknisk hardcore er blot nogle af de genrer, Ajuna anvender til at sætte øregange og nervesystem i flammer.

description.uk: The 700-year-old music genre Qawwali is best described as Islamic gospel. Meher & Sher Ali belongs at the top end of the genre. Departing from the Sufi-tradition, in which music is a tool to approach the divine, the two Pakistanis sing and play their way towards the diverse heart of Allah. The Tabla drum and the harmonium along with the chanting vocals make up some of the characteristics of the music. The brothers and their ensemble achieve an ecstasy, which can make even the most unreligious into believers – in the music if nothing else.
description.dk: Den mere end 700 år gamle musikgenre qawwali kunne man kalde en slags islamisk gospel. Meher & Sher Ali hører til toppen af toppen inden for genren. Med afsæt i sufitraditionen, hvor musikken er et værktøj til at nå det guddommelige, synger og musicerer de to pakistanere sig hele vejen ind mod Allahs vidtforgrenede hjerte. Tablatrommen og harmonium er sammen med den messende vokal nogle af musikkens særkender. De to brødre og deres ensemble opnår en ekstase, der kan gøre selv det mest ureligiøse gemyt troende, om ikke andet så på musikken.

description.uk:
In a black cloud of fear and nausea, the extreme metal duo Anaal Nathrakh attacks everything good, light and beautiful in this world. With elements of black metal, melodious death metal and grindcore, the two Brits blur the edges for where the punishment ends and the relief begins.

When Mick Kenney and David Hunt perform, they are usually backed up by guest performers on stage to match the attack of guitar and guttural growling on their albums. Anaal Natrakh will devour your nerve endings like a drugged up fighter dog.
description.dk:
I en sort sky af kvalme og rædsel angriber ekstremmetal-duoen Anaal Nathrakh alt, hvad der er godt, skønt eller kønt i denne verden. Med elementer af blackmetal, melodisk dødsmetal og grindcore har de to briter sløret grænserne for, hvor kompromisløst man kan afstraffe, så det stadig føles godt.

Når Mick Kenney og David Hunt giver koncert er der typisk lånte kræfter med, så de i fællesskab kan matche angrebet af guitar og gutturale growls på briternes albums. Anaal Nathrakh æder løs på dine nervebaner som en dopet, gammelsulten kamphund.

description.uk:
“Destruction, sadness, & experiencing what it is to suffer.”

This is how Angel Haze lists her primary sources of inspiration. Yet, her aggressively delivered hip hop is quite an encouraging acquaintance.

The young woman caused a stir with her version of Eminem's "Cleaning Out My Closet" in which she – brutal as a torrential wound – raps about a sexual assault.

But despite her childhood demons, the amazon from Detroit has no intention of throwing in towel nor microphone in the ring. "I run New York," is the chorus from her signature song. We bet she includes Roskilde when she drops by.
description.dk:
”Destruktion, sorg og oplevelsen af lidelse.”

Sådan lister Angel Haze selv sine primære inspirationskilder. Alligevel er hendes aggressivt afleverede hiphop et opmuntrende bekendtskab.

Den unge kvinde vakte opsigt med sin version af Eminems ”Cleaning Out My Closet”, hvor hun hudløst som et styrtblødende sår beretter om et seksuelt overgreb.

Men trods barndommens dæmoner har amazonen fra Detroit ingen intentioner om at smide hverken håndklæde eller mikrofon i ringen. ”I run New York,” lyder omkvædet fra hendes foreløbige signatursang. Mon ikke hun også lige tager Roskilde med i købet, når hun slår sin vej forbi?

related.short_description: The hip hop queen of the Internet

related.name: JOEY BADA$$
related.short_description: Young hip hop hope from Brooklyn

related.name: MIGUEL
related.short_description: The new golden boy of R&B

related.name: KENDRICK LAMAR
related.short_description: The new hip hop king of the West Coast

description.uk:
The residents of Animal Collective – Avey Tare, Panda Bear, Geologist and Deakin – have pushed pop music into a whole new dimension on a number of deeply curious albums, latest on Centipede Hz from 2012.

The Americans' music – inspired by avant-garde and minimalist art music – sounds like a batch of children high on sugar let loose behind synthesizers, microphones and drums. Playfulness and joy of music in all colors of the rainbow.

Below the turbulent soundtrack a pop heart beats, not unlike that of Beach Boy Brian Wilson's.

Animal Collective is a wild celebration of the potential of music – sparkling with life and alien forms.

Label: Domino / Playground
description.dk:
Indbyggerne i Animal Collective – Avey Tare, Panda Bear, Geologist og Deakin – har skubbet popmusikken ind i en helt ny dimension på en række dybt besynderlige plader, senest Centipede Hz fra 2012.

Amerikanernes musik – inspireret af avantgarde og minimalistisk kompositionsmusik – lyder som et kobbel sukkeropkørte børn sluppet løs bag synthesizers, mikrofoner og trommer. Legesyge og musikglæde i alle regnbuens farver.

Neden under de turbulente lydspor banker samtidig et pophjerte lig Beach Boy Brian Wilsons.

Animal Collective er en vilter fejring af musikkens potentiale – sprudlende med liv og fremmede former.

Label: Domino / Playground

description.uk:
With its lion roars and insistent bass, "Harlem Shake" is the hottest stuff right now.

The artist behind the song calls himself Baauer. He’s one of the exponents of trap, one of the possible successors of dubstep.

As a one-man army onstage, he blends house, southern hip hop and bass music in his own instrumental rehash.

This promising boy wonder confidently steps into a constantly mutating musical arena. Reputable electronic names such as Rustie, Flosstradamus and Diplo have noticed Baauer.

Label: LuckyMe / Import
description.dk:
”Harlem Shake” med sine løvebrøl og pågående bas er toppen af poppen lige nu.

Ophavsmanden kalder sig Baauer og er en af eksponenterne for en af dubsteppens mulige arvtagere, nemlig trap.

Ene mand på scenen voldblander han house, sydstatshiphop og basmusik i sit eget instrumentale opkog.

Det lovende vidunderbarn træder selvsikkert ind på en konstant muterende musikalsk arena. Velansete elektroniske navne som Rustie, Flosstradamus og Diplo har allerede fået øjnene op for Baauer.

Label: LuckyMe / Import

related.name: DISCLOSURE
related.short_description: Electronic house duo with an ear for hits

description.uk:
They aren’t old enough to remember the 90s, yet they still manage to take you back to a point in time and a place that feels a lot like smoky backstreet bars in Seattle with sticky floors and no aircon, but a maxed out sound system and Bill Clinton on the flickering telly behind the bar swearing his innocence.

Baby in Vain have found their inspiration in dragging stoner-rock and grunge, and Benedicte, Lola and Andrea’s songs manage to be a charming mix of rattling and reckless, yet tuneful, harmonies delivered with a 2 finger salute-attitude.

Baby in Vain is a heavy but loving shot of grungy rock right into your central nervous system.
description.dk:
De er ikke gamle nok til at huske 90’erne, alligevel klinger Baby In Vains rumlende guitarrock, som var den skrevet under Clinton-administrationen på en tilrøget rockklub i Seattle.

Inspirationen er hentet i slæbende stoner-rock og slacket grunge; Benedictes, Lolas og Andreas sange er skramlede, fandenivoldske og stadig melodiøse.

Baby In Vain er et skud tung syre lige i centralnervesystemet.

related.name: COMPADRE
related.short_description: Club music with Middle Eastern shade

related.name: MARIE KEY
related.short_description: Airy, Danish-language pop from a sharp pen.

related.name: HIGHASAKITE
related.short_description: Alternative pop in full war paint

related.name: MARTIN RYUM
related.short_description: Classical 60s poetry in fresh musical clothes

related.name: ELOQ
related.short_description: Gritty beats from Copenhagen sound chief

10.text: Funk with Addis Ababa in the blood

description.uk:
The 60s and 70s was a very special period in Ethiopian music. In the new millennium music collectors have discovered and distributed this musical treasure of golden funk, jazz, afrobeat and soul. The music of this period in time has a distinct beat, which is not found in James Brown or Fela Kuti. Clearly Badume’s Band is in love with these glory days and though the nine man ensemble consists of Frenchmen they earlier let their saxophones glitter as a backing band for the grand old man of the musical golden age; Mahmoud Ahmed. Led by the Ethiopian singer Selamnesh Zemene, Badume’s Band recreate the Addis Ababa of 1970. Together they embody not just a past but also a future of Ethiopian, urban music.

Label: Innacor / Import
description.dk:
60’erne og 70’erne var en helt særlig periode for etiopisk musik. I det nye årtusinde har musiksamlere opdaget og spredt en musikskat af guldbetrukket funk, jazz, afrobeat og soul musikken fra denne epoke har et distinkt beat, hvis lige man hverken møder hos James Brown eller Fela Kuti. Badume’s Band er tydeligvis også forelskede i denne svundne alder. Og selvom det ni mand stærke kollektiv er fransk, har de ladet deres saxofoner glimte som backingband for selve musikguldalderens grand old man, Mahmoud Ahmed. Badume’s Band genskaber Addis Ababa anno 1970 anført af den etiopiske sangerinde Selamnesh Zemene. Sammen sikrer de ikke bare en fortid, men også en fremtid for etiopisk storbymusik.

Label: Innacor / Import

11.text: The hip hop queen of the Internet

description.uk:
She achieved star status before the world (i.e. the Internet) had even finished listening to a single song from this dirt dropping MC and singer. The EP 1991 took it’s name from Azealia Banks’ birth year. Soon everybody realised that pure talent was entering the stage through the cloud of hype, beefs and buzz. Azealia Banks departs from hip hop to create her very own regime – commanding other genres of music to kneel before her superior flow, wit and edge. 2013 may be a year even more important than 1991: This year should see the release of Banks’ debut album and she will show Roskilde Festival the stuff she is really made off.

Label: Interscope / Universal
description.dk:
Hendes stjernestatus var intakt, inden verden (læs: internettet) havde hørt mere end et enkelt nummer fra denne skidtsnakkende MC og sangerinde. Ep’en 1991 fik sit navn efter Azealia Banks’ fødselsår. Det blev også klart for alle, at gennem skyen af hype, beefs og buzz træder et soleklart talent ind på scenen. Azealia Banks bruger hiphoppen som udgangspunkt til at skabe sit helt eget regime og kommanderer musikgenrerne ned på knæ med sit overlegne flow, vid og bid. 2013 bliver et måske vigtigere år end selv 1991: I år skulle Banks’ debutplade endelig lande og hun får lov at vise Roskilde Festival, hvilket stof hun i virkeligheden er lavet af.

Label: Interscope / Universal

related.name: RIHANNA
related.short_description: Super pop star and young diva

description.uk:
Some best know him as the drummer and producer in WhoMadeWho. But Tomas Barfod is an important figure through his work in Filur, Jatoma and lately the critically acclaimed solo album Salton Sea as well. On the album the Los Angeles-based wiz kid dives into an electronic universe in which house, techno and ambient can be found alongside typical ear candy like ”November Skies”. Tomas Barfod is one of the prides of Denmark’s electronic scene. His diversity and ability to create alien worlds of sound gives him a well-deserved spot on the throne next to Trentemøller.

Label: Friends of Friends
description.dk:
Nogle kender ham bedst som trommeslager og producer for WhoMadeWho. Men Tomas Barfod er også en vigtig skikkelse i kraft af sit arbejde med Filur, Jatoma og, senest, sin egen anmelderroste soloplade Salton Sea. På denne plade dykker den Los Angeles-bosatte tusindkunstner ned i et elektronisk univers, hvor house, techno og ambient optræder side om side med deciderede ørehængere som ”November Skies”. Tomas Barfod er en af Danmarks stoltheder på den elektroniske scene. Med hans alsidighed og sans for at bygge fremmede planeter af lyd fortjener han en plads på tronen ved siden af Trentemøller.

Label: Friends of Friends

description.uk:
The Norwegian singer Nils Bech crosses the boundaries between art, compositional music and pop. He sings in a delightfully affected manner with an almost ostentatious Scandinavian accent: Imagine a cross between Antony Hegarty and Jens Lekman and you are not far off. On the album Look Inside Nils Bech has firmly set his classically trained vocals in an impressionistic dream world of baroque, electronic pop, which is artistically ambitious, intricately detailed and sound like it has been composed among drag queens in glittering satin. Divulge in a trip into the decadent, purple maelstrom accompanied by a grandiose, characteristic voice.

Label: Fysisk Format / Import
description.dk:
Den norske sanger Nils Bech krydser grænserne mellem kunst, kompositionsmusik og pop. Han synger herligt krukket og med en næsten demonstrativ skandinavisk accent: Forestil dig et kryds mellem Antony Hegarty og Jens Lekman, og du er på sporet. På Look Inside har Nils Bech plantet sin klassisk trænede stemme i en impressionistisk drømmeverden af barok, elektronisk pop, som er kunstnerisk ambitiøs, sindrigt detaljeret og lyder, som om den er komponeret blandt drag queens iført glitrende satin. En tur ind i den dekadente, lilla malstrøm med en stor, speciel stemme.

Label: Fysisk Format / Import

related.name: TREMORO TARANTURA
related.short_description: Improvisational noise orchestra for the adventurous

description.uk:
”Blåsar Vekk” (blowing away), Bendik call one of their tunes. And the title actually fits this band's alternative pop.

The three Norwegians hover in the same air space as Mew and fellow Norwegians Lukestar, admiring the view.

Bendik are keen on combining the grandiose with icy harmonies, inducing the sensation of a chilly Northern wind.

At the same time, Bendik differ from their Scandinavian contemporaries, applying a more electronic touch. Silje Hastensen’s powerful vocals are mostly surrounded by windswept, frostbitten synths.

Label: Riot Factory / Import
description.dk:
”Blåsar Vekk” hedder en af Bendiks sange. Og det er faktisk meget rammende for trioens alternative pop.

De tre nordmænd hænger et sted i samme høje luftlag som Mew og landsmændene Lukestar og nyder udsigten.

Bendik har en forkærlighed for at blande det majestætisk storladne med en frysende kold vellyd, så man næsten kan mærke polarvinden rive.

Samtidig nuancerer Bendik det nordiske udtryk i kraft af et mere elektronisk islæt. Silje Halstensens kraftfulde vokal er især omgivet af vindblæste, frostbidte synthesizers.

Label: Riot Factory / Import

related.name: HIGHASAKITE
related.short_description: Alternative pop in full war paint

related.name: KARPE DIEM
related.short_description: Hip hop with loads of humour and humanism

description.uk:
Its Game Over to uninspired dance music. Binärpilot has moved to next level already.

Web designer Alexander Støvers dedicates his jams to “robots, geeks, hackers, and nerds of this world”, and the Norwegian’s home-produced tunes sound like a steroid-pumped soundtrack to old, flashing computer games of pixilated plumbers saving the world.

The intergalactic space travels of Binärpilot have more laser and meteor showers than 100 superheated console adventures.

Label: Microhertz / Import
description.dk:
Game Over til uinspireret dansemusik, Binärpilot er for længst rykket op på næste level.

Webudvikler Alexander Støvers dedikerer sine jams til ”denne verdens robotter, nørder og hackere”, nordmandens hjemmeproducerede tunes lyder da også som et steroidpumpet soundtrack til gamle blinkende computerspil, hvor pixellerede blikkenslagere kommer verden til undsætning.

Binärpilots intergalaktiske rumrejser har mere laser og meteorregn end 100 overophedede eventyr på spillekonsollen.

Label: Microhertz / Import

description.uk:
Sao Paolo's Bixiga 70 lend their name from afrobeat legend Fela Kuti’s backingband Africa 70. No coincidence. This funky collective of no less than 10 Brassilians sure know their way around afrobeat. Furthermore, they throw a host of other Latin American rhythms, tones and traditions into the high waters, making anything possible – especially the horn and percussion are duelling to blow you away if you do not start dancing your way through this light blue flood of funk, cumbia, samba, TBC… A mix of genres full of 70es groove and fire in the loins.

Label: Traquintana/Import
description.dk:
Sao Paolos Bixiga 70 låner deres bandnavn fra afrobeat-legenden Fela Kutis backingband Africa 70. Man forstår hvorfor. Det funky 10 mand store kollektiv kan deres afrobeat helt ud til fingerspidserne. Herudover smider de også et utal af latinamerikanske rytmer, toner og traditioner ud i oprørte musikalske vande, hvor næsten alting kan ske – især horn- og slagstøjssektionen kappes om at blæse dig væk, hvis du ikke danser igennem til denne lyseblå syndflod af funk, cumbia, samba, fortsæt selv... Et genremiks fyldt med 70’er-groove og ild i lænderne.

Label: Traquintana/Import

17.text: Noisy rock’n’roll in sunglasses and leather jacket

description.uk:
”Whatever Happened To My Rock ’n’ Roll”, asked BRMC back in 2001 as they, along with The Strokes and The White Stripes, helped rock music find its spark once again. Seven records later – and now with Danish drummer Leah Shapiro along for the ride – they have become acclaimed rock ambassadors. Their moody songs combine classic Americana with British noise rock in a cloud of fuzz guitars, black exhaust fumes and snarling beat poetry. Time to mount your bike and race along: Specter At The Feast from 2013 finds the band with a tight grip around their beloved rock’n’roll.

Label: Abstract Dragon / Cooperative
description.dk:
”Whatever Happened To My Rock ’n’ Roll”, spurgte Black Rebel Motorcycle Club i 2001, da de sammen med The Strokes og The White Stripes pustede nyt liv i rockens orange gløder. Syv plader senere er trioen – nu med danske Leah Shapiro bag gryderne – veletablerede rockambassadører i læderjakke og solbriller. Deres humørsyge sange kombinerer klassisk americana og britisk støjrock i en damp af fuzzguitar, sorte udstødningsgasser og snerrende beatnick-poesi. Stig på kværnen og drøn af sted, Specter At The Feast fra 2013 vidner om et band, der i dén grad stadig tager hånd om deres elskede rock’n’roll.

Label: Abstract Dragon / Cooperative

18.text: Electronic R&B with pounding human heart

description.uk:
He inhabits a brand new music universe, James Blake, a remote region where heart pounding soul, folk and R&B share molecules with dubstep, hip hop, ambient and shiny electronica. 24-years-old, he is a major voice in a generation unburdened by genres. James Blake had the Cosmopol stage filled to the brim during his last visit in 2011: This year we provide a bigger stage for unfurling Blake’s latest album, Overgrown. The sophomore album finds the quiet Brit blurring the borders between organic and electronic dimensions even more.

Label: 1-800 Dinosaur / Universal
description.dk:
Han er beboer i et helt nyt musikunivers, James Blake, en udkant hvor hjertedunkende soul, folk og R&B udveksler molekyler med dubstep, hiphop, ambient og kromblinkende electronica. Med sine 24 år er han en af de vigtigste stemmer i en generation, der har aflagt ideen om genrer som en tyngende hæmsko. James Blake fyldte Cosmopol til yderste teltbardun under sit sidste Roskilde-visit i 2011: I år giver vi ham en større scene til at udfolde sit seneste album, Overgrown, hvor den stilfærdige englænder fingernemt foretager yderligere kortslutninger mellem det organiske og det syntetiske.

Label: 1-800 Dinosaur / Universal

related.name: DISCLOSURE
related.short_description: Electronic house duo with an ear for hits

related.name: ANDY STOTT
related.short_description: Atmospheric electronica with a heavy bass

description.uk:
With a feisty mix of belligerent girl vocals and searing guitar works Blood Command attack and conquer the overall male dominance of post hardcore. The band is not all about the gore, though. They lose the aggression, inspired by bands such as Fugazi, At the Drive-In and Refused, here and there in favour of melodies and pretty minor key guitars. Several places lead singer Silje Tombre and her platoon actually dive voluntarily into the catchy pop chorus. Blood, sugar and bile combined in a perfect Molotov cocktail.

Label: Fysisk Format / Import
description.dk:
Med en voldsom blanding af krigeriske pigevokaler og gnistspruttende guitararbejde sparker Blood Command døren ind til den ellers så mandsdominerede post-hardcoregenre og river nogle lemmer løs. Blood Command forlader sig dog ikke kun på deres hang til det rå blodbad. De løsner ofte op for aggressionen og den oprørske grundtone med en række melodier og molstemte guitarer, der forlader inspirationen fra 90’ernes post-hardcorebands som Fugazi, At the Drive-In og Refused. Flere steder kaster Silje Tombre og hendes hårdtarbejdende armé sig lige i armene på den gode popmelodi. Blod, sukker og galde i en perfekt molotovcocktail.

Label: Fysisk Format / Import

description.uk: They named themselves after the club where German goth queen Nico did her first shows with The Velvet Underground. And the link between Teutonic darkness and druggy American rock is obvious on board The Blue Angel Lounge. They sound like a band who wear shades and leather jacket 24-7, their psych rock has the lush fizzle of a pain killer sinking into a glass of water. Anton Newcombe of The Brian Jonestown Massacre is a fan and has toured with the band. If you’ve ever found his music just a little groovy, be sure to take a trip into the noisy bliss of The Blue Angel Lounge as well.
description.dk: De har opkaldt sig efter klubben, hvor den tyske gothdronning Nico gav sine første koncerter sammen med The Velvet Underground. Og forbindelsen mellem det dystre Tyskland og amerikansk narkorock er slående hos The Blue Angel Lounge. De lyder som et band, der går med solbriller og læderjakke døgnet rundt, deres psychrock bruser lækkert som en hovedpinepille just dumpet ned i et glas vand. Anton Newcombe fra The Brian Jonestown Massacre er fan, producer og har turneret med bandet. Hvis du blot én gang i dit liv har vippet lidt med foden til hans musik, skal du også med en tur ind i The Blue Angel Lounges støjende rus.

related.name: BLACK REBEL MOTORCYCLE CLUB
related.short_description: Noisy rock’n’roll in sunglasses and leather jacket

description.uk:
”I love the desert”, Bombino says in the film about him. He's part of the desert nomads the Tuaregs whose music and whole way of life were threatened by the Niger and Mali regimes.

The regime took a strong stance against the song and dance of the whole population, and the guitar was seen as an icon of rebellion. But even during exile, Bombino has managed to secure a home through music.

The guitar player with the rock star potential has become an ambassador for peace through other means than violence. His raw and poetic guitar playing is like witnessing a West African Jimi Hendrix shrouded in desert cloths.

Label: Nonesuch / Warner
description.dk:
”Jeg elsker ørkenen”, siger Bombino i filmen om ham. Han stammer fra ørkennomaderne tuaregerne, hvis musik og livsform længe var truet af regimet i Niger såvel som i Mali.

Regimet har slået hårdt ned på befolkningens sange og spil, og guitaren blev set som selve symbolet på oprør. Men selv i eksil i de omkringliggende lande har Bombino været med til at sørge for et hjem i musikken.

Guitaristen med det tydelige rockstjernepotentiale er blevet et ikon for fred via andre midler end vold. Hans rå og poetiske guitarspil er som at lægge øre og øje til en vestafrikansk Jimi Hendrix svøbt i ørkenklæder.

Label: Nonesuch / Warner

related.name: CHELSEA LIGHT MOVING
related.short_description: Noise rock with legendary lead singer

related.name: GOAT
related.short_description: Funky trance rock with an African flavour

related.name: JOHN GRANT
related.short_description: Brutally heartbreaking songs with an electronic touch

description.uk:
The brother duo The Bots master punk rock'n'roll, aiming for both the melodies and the carnal groove. As a matter of course, they find an unprecedented point on the colour scheme of retro rock, somewhere in between The White Stripes and The Black Keys.

Mikaiah and Anaiah Lei have fine-tuned their skills on the electric guitar and the drums since childhood – and they released their first album when they were 15 and 12, respectively. That was in 2009.

Today, they exude an almost unnatural authority, both regarding songwriting and stage show. The Bots are fully fledged in an age when most bands are still learning to crawl.
description.dk:
Brødreduoen The Bots mestrer punket rock’n’roll, som både vil melodien og det kødelige groove. Med største selvfølgelighed finder de et hidtil uset punkt på retrorockens farveskala, et sted mellem The White Stripes og The Black Keys.

Mikaiah og Anaiah Lei har fintunet deres evner på elspaden og trommerne siden barnsben og udgav deres første album, da de var henholdsvis 15 og 12. Det var i 2009.

I dag udstråler de en næsten naturstridig myndighed og autoritet, både hvad sangskrivning og sceneshow angår. The Bots er flyvefærdige i en alder, hvor de fleste bands stadig kun overvejer at krybe.

related.name: GOAT
related.short_description: Funky trance rock with an African flavour

description.uk:
Mads Bergland and Simon Littauer picked the name Broke since they were on rock bottom financially and education-wise. As a picture, even, of their whole crisis-torn generation. Determined to challenge mainstream Denmark, the couple has replaced school books with apocalyptic, battered dance music. The electronic beats are brewed from kraut rock, disco and post punk in a steaming acid bath full of unhealthy fumes.

Label: Fake Diamonds
description.dk:
Mads Bergland og Simon Littauer valgte navnet Broke, da de var aldeles på røven både økonomisk og studiemæssigt. Ja, som et billede på hele finanskrisens ungdom. Opsatte på at udfordre mainstream-Danmark har makkerparret med stor succes skiftet skolebøgerne ud med apokalyptisk, smadret dansemusik. De elektroniske beats er brygget på lige dele krautrock, disco og postpunk i et usundt dampende syrebad.

Label: Fake Diamonds

related.name: ELOQ
related.short_description: Gritty beats from Copenhagen sound chief

related.name: HIGHASAKITE
related.short_description: Alternative pop in full war paint

related.name: COMPADRE
related.short_description: Club music with Middle Eastern shade

related.name: MARIE KEY
related.short_description: Airy, Danish-language pop from a sharp pen.

related.name: KENTON SLASH DEMON
related.short_description: Deep house from the rear edge of the universe

related.name: K-X-P
related.short_description: Punk rock with a mechanical heart

description.uk:
At almost frightening pace, Jake Bugg has cemented his name with a batch of solid tunes that sound as if they were written by a much older soul.

The young fellow has taken the stage as a young Bob Dylan and all the established stars are eager to sing his praise as well.

His songs take the best of 60s folk and 90s Brit rock and mould their own melodic blues.

Although the sources of inspiration are familiar, Jake Bugg is a refreshing brush of fresh air. Even the most nostalgic types will have to face the fact that classic songwriting is alive and well.

Label: Mercury / Universal
description.dk:
På ingen tid har Jake Bugg hamret sit navn fast med en stak slidstærke sange, der lyder som undfanget af en meget ældre sjæl.

Ungpurken har kapret tronen som en ny Bob Dylan. Også etablerede stjerner snubler over hinanden for at skamrose ham.

Den unge brites sange krammer det bedste fra 60’ernes folk og 90’ernes britrock i sin egen melodiske blues.

Og trods de velkendte inspirationskilder er Jake Bugg et forfriskende pust. Klar til at forvisse selv den mest sammenbidte nostalgiker om, at den klassiske sangskrivning skam lever i bedste velgående.

Label: Mercury / Universal

related.name: THE LUMINEERS
related.short_description: Stamp-and-clap folk rock from shooting stars

description.uk:
The hum and buzz of summer permeates Bwoy De Bhajan’s streams of challenging but pleasant sounds.

The promising producer has a penchant for India. At the same time, the talented teenager is clearly influenced by Western electronica of the more experimental kind.

Despite the drowsy groove of the music, this music has plenty of delicate touches, edgy beats, wonky bass lines and Eastern mystique to get lost in.

Label: Soundesc
description.dk:
En fornemmelse af summende sommer gennemsyrer Bwoy De Bhajans varme strømme af udfordrende vellyd.

Den lovende producer har en forkærlighed for Indien, og man mærker mange steder i musikken længslen efter den brændende sol og den brændende mad. Samtidig er den talentfulde teenager tydeligt påvirket af vestlig electronica af den mere eksperimenterende slags.

Trods musikkens overvejende dovne groove er her altså masser af krummelurer, kantede beats, radbrækkede baslinjer og østlig mystik at fortabe sig i.

Label: Soundesc

description.uk:
Vinyl magic and turntables are rarely mentioned without someone also mentioning C2C. The illustrious spin doctors are now ready.

Prepare yourself and your dancing shoes for a turntable concert tightly packed with hip hop, soul, electronica and more genre acrobatics than we can mention before the start of the concert.

In recent years, the four Frenchmen have split up into two successful projects: Hocus Pocus and Beat Torrent have both visited Roskilde earlier.

After getting back together again, C2C have raised the stakes further. Their first proper album ever, Tetra, demonstrates an ambition beyond the DMC DJ team championship, which the four lads have won four times in a row.

Label: On and On / import
description.dk:
Vinylmagi og turntables kommer sjældent på tale, uden at en en eller anden med længsel i stemmen nævner C2C. Nu står de hæderkronede spindoktorer klar.

Bered dig og dine dansesko på en turntable-koncert tætpakket som et kuglelyn med hiphop, soul, electronica og flere genremæssige krumspring, end vi kan nå at nævne inden koncertstart.

De seneste år har de fire franskmænd splittet sig op i to succesfulde projekter: Hocus Pocus og Beat Torrent har begge lagt vejen forbi Roskilde tidligere.

Efter at have fundet sammen igen har C2C forhøjet puljen yderligere. Deres første egentlige album nogensinde, Tetra, vidner om en ambition hinsides dj-verdensmesterskaberne, som de fire venner har vundet fire gange i træk.

Label: On and On / import

description.uk:
Reggaeton mixes Spanish rap, salsa, dancehall and other tropical beats. The genre has its origin in the poorest neighbourhoods of Puerto Rico.

Tego Calderón is responsible for boosting the genre among white people and Latinos outside the slum – a lot of people consider the guy with the curly afro haircut and the sunglasses the king of the genre.

We are proud to present Tego Calderón for the first time in Northern Europe. Fans of Latin pop as well as US hip hop are provided with a splendid chance to wriggle their asses together.

Label: Jiggiri / Import
description.dk:
Reggaeton er en krydsning af spansksproget rap, salsa, dancehall og andre tropiske beats, genren har sit udspring i Puerto Ricos fattigste kvarterer.

Tego Calderón er en af dem, der fik musikgenren til at vokse sig stor både hos hvide og latinamerikanere uden for slummen – faktisk er manden med solbrillerne og mikrofonhåret de fleste steder anerkendt som genrens konge.

Vi er stolte over at kunne præsentere Tego Calderón for første gang i Nordeuropa: Fans af både latin-pop og amerikansk hiphop får her en sjældent fin chance for at vrikke måsen i fællesskab.

Label: Jiggiri / Import

28.text: Alternative country rock with New Orleans flavour

description.uk:
American country and Mexican mariachi have been the most important coordinates in Calexico’s across-the-border rock.

Since 1996, John Convertino and Joey Burns have played rustic serenades filled with the smell of gritty highways and scorched tex-mex grill spice for fans of both Bruce Springsteen and spaghetti western composer Ennio Morricone.

On Algiers from 2012 the two gringos have ventured to the West Coast of Mississippi in motley New Orleans. Here we find traces of Haiti, Cuba and Africa surging in. The new impressions emphasize the notion of Calexico as a charming crossroads suited for very diverse musical orientations.

Label: On and On / Import
description.dk:
Amerikansk country og mexicansk mariachi har i årevis været de vigtigste koordinater i Calexicos grænsekrydsende rock.

Siden 1996 har John Convertino og Joey Burns spillet rustikke serenader for fans af både Bruce Springsteen og Ennio Morricones lydspor til de klassiske spaghettiwesterns – fyldt med duften af snavsede landeveje og branket tex-mex grillkrydderi.

På genkomstalbummet Algiers fra 2012 har de to gringos taget turen til Mississippis vestbred i spraglede New Orleans. Her strømmer spor af Haiti, Cuba og Afrika til. De nye indtryk forstærker Calexicos karakter af et charmerende gadekryds, hvor forskelligartede indtryk myldrer sammen.

Label: On and On / Import

description.uk:
Two DJs have made quite an impact on the nightlife of Reykjavik. Captain Fufanu are two young lads playing minimal, deep techno. The duo is working on their debut album right now. Using their first tracks as anything to go by, the duo knows about bangers for the clubbers as well as colder, more atmospheric electronica.

Prepare yourself as the energy boost of Reykjavik hits Roskilde.

Label: Reyk Veek / Import
description.dk:
To DJs har sat et tydeligt afspor i Reykjaviks natklubliv. Captain Fufanu består af et par unge knægte, der spiller minimal, dyb techno. Makkerparret arbejder på deres debutalbum lige nu. Ud fra de første skæringer at dømme forstår duoen sig ikke kun på at skabe bangers til glade klubtyper, de har også fin sans for den mere atmosfæriske og kuldskære electronica.

Vær med på pletten, når energiboostet fra Reykjaviks klubnætter rammer Roskilde.

Label: Reyk Veek / Import

description.uk:
He has crafted beats for Robyn who considers him a worthy exponent for tomorrow’s electronic music scene. Carli Løf is an overwhelmingly talented DJ and producer. The eclectic Swede has built up a CV bulging with transatlantic impact and VIP collaborators.

With a multicoloured clash of bass, rave and hip hop, Carli has been hailed as one of the major shooting stars of 2013.

Label: Fool's Gold / Import
description.dk:
Han har smedet beats for Robyn, der betragter ham som en sikker garant for den elektroniske musiks fremtid. Carli Løf er en svimlende talentfuld dj og producer, den eklektiske svensker har kompileret et cv, der strutter med transatlantisk pondus og VIP-samarbejdspartnere.

Med et pangfarvet sammenstød mellem bas-, rave- og hiphopkultur er Carli udråbt til et af de helt store stjerneskud i 2013.

Label: Fool's Gold / Import

related.name: COMPADRE
related.short_description: Club music with Middle Eastern shade

description.uk:
Saul ”Chase” Milton and Will ”Status” Kennard have taken electronic music from the London club basements and onto the biggest stages of Europe’s biggest festivals, including Roskilde. Chase & Status show how to take the adrenaline and sweat from punk and metal and transfer them into wildly intense celebrations of electronic music. In 2013, the duo returns with new music and a bigger show than last time in 2011; that year also found the duo filling the Cosmopol stage to the brim. Prepare your dance shoes for a hectic rave combining the best parts of drum’n’bass, dubstep, pop and rock in a magnificent collision.

Label: Mercury / Universal
description.dk:
Saul ”Chase” Milton og Will ”Status” Kennard har trukket den elektroniske musik ud fra London-klubberne og helt op på de største scener på Europas største festivaler, herunder Roskilde. Chase & Status viser, hvordan den elektroniske musik kan tage energien, sveden og adrenalin-niveauet fra punk og metal og lave fester, der bulderkoger lige så vildt og intenst. I 2013 vender de tilbage med ny musik og et større show end i 2011, hvor de pakkede Cosmopol. Bered dine dansesko på et hektisk rave, hvor det bedste fra drum’n’bass, dubstep, pop og rock tørner sammen.

Label: Mercury / Universal

32.text: Noise rock with legendary lead singer

description.uk:
Vintage hipster Thurston Moore has already changed alternative rock from within as Sonic Youth’s main vocalist and guitarist. Even though this band is on hiatus, the ever youthful pioneer has no intention of leaving the stage to the kids.

Instead, Chelsea Light Moving sees a new fresh team taking the stage, keeping up the gritty, searing guitar rock. Chelsea Light Moving is sure to please old fans in worn out Sonic Youth T-shirts. But the new line-up might also lure a new generation into noise, punk and New York City.

Label: Matador Records / Playground
description.dk:
Vintage hipster Thurston Moore har allerede forandret den alternative rock indefra som primær vokalist og guitarist i Sonic Youth. Selvom dette band er kørt i garagen, har den evigt ungdommelige guitarpioner ikke tænkt sig at overlade scenen til de våde-bag -ørerne.

I stedet har han med Chelsea Light Moving sat et nyt friskt hold, som sammen med ham kan videreføre den snavsede og skærende guitarrock. Chelsea Light Moving fortsætter tilsyneladende i et spor, som vil tilfredsstille gamle fans iført slidte Sonic Youth T-shirts. Det nye line-up kan også meget vel tillokke en ny generation med hang til støj, punk og New York City.

Label: Matador Records / Playground

related.name: PISSED JEANS
related.short_description: Hardcore punk for your inner Neanderthal

related.name: K-X-P
related.short_description: Punk rock with a mechanical heart

related.name: GOAT
related.short_description: Funky trance rock with an African flavour

description.uk:
Record label, band, musical brotherhood. Chinese Man is a lot of things - don’t expect any Chinese ancestry here, though. With a mashup of funk, house, jazz, reggae and hip hop the French DJ collective makes the party spin from their turntables.

Chinese Man are music lovers with a broad approach to turntablism and a penchant for obscure samples and crackling nostalgia. With visuals and vocalists on top of the versatile beats, you are certain to find a feast for your ears and eyes.

Prepare to twist your behind; 2013 is Year of the Snake in the Chinese calendar.
description.dk:
Pladeselskab, band, musikalsk broderskab. Chinese Man er mange ting, kinesisk afstamning skal man dog ikke forvente. Med et mashup af funk, house, jazz, reggae og hiphop får det franske dj-kollektiv festen til at spinde fra deres turntables.

Chinese Man består af en gruppe musikelskere med en bred indgangsvinkel til turntablism og en forkærlighed for obskure samples og støvet nostalgi. Med visuals og vokalister hen over det alsidige sammenkog er der altid garanti for et show, der sætter ørerne, øjnene og de nedre regioner i gang.

Bered dig på at sno din bagdel, når Chinese Man sætter festen i gang – 2013 er Slangens År i den kinesiske kalender.

description.uk:
He has pushed things forward on Sweden’s urban music scene. Lately Chords has resided in New York City. On his recent album Looped State of Mind the influence of the American, legendary city is palpable. R&B, hip hop and urban pop are mingled by the hyper talented Swede in a manner that would leave both Drake and Kanye West nodding appreciatively. Despite calling his Brooklyn-produced album a “laptop record”, Chords takes the stage with a large live band, aiming for a thoroughbred concert experience.

Label: Svenska Inspelningar / Universal
description.dk:
Han har været med til at skubbe tingene kraftigt fremad på Sveriges urbane scene, de seneste fire år har Chords tilbragt i New York City. På hans seneste album Looped State of Mind mærker man tydeligt, hvordan han har opsuget nye vibes i sin Brooklyn- lejlighed og blevet til meget mere end en regional helt. R&B, hiphop og urban pop blander den hypertalentfulde svensker sømløst, så både Drake og Kanye West ville nikke anerkendende. På trods af at han kalder sit selvproducerede newyorkeralbum en ”laptopplade”, indtager Chords scenen med stort liveband i en fuldblodskoncertoplevelse.

Label: Svenska Inspelningar / Universal

35.text: Club music with Middle Eastern shade

description.uk:
The night clubs go Middle Eastern when Compadre set fire to the beat and start a musical and absolutely un-bloody Jihad towards the hit lists. With attitude to spare, the trio’s grooves have spread in their native Sweden: Their early songs are a bass-heavy, neon yellow mixture of hip hop, Persian folk music and gritty pop that would make M.I.A. blush with pride.

Label: Vicious Bitch / Import
description.dk:
Klubmusikken får et mellemøstligt makeover, når Compadre sætter ild til beatet og indleder musikalsk og absolut ublodig jihad mod hitlisterne. Med attitude i kilometermål har trioen fået deres grooves til at sprede sig over det ganske svenske land: De første offentliggjorte numre fra bandet er en bastung, neongul blanding af hiphop, persisk folkemusik og slummet pop, der ville få M.I.A. til at rødme stolt.

Label: Vicious Bitch / Import

related.name: ELOQ
related.short_description: Gritty beats from Copenhagen sound chief

description.uk: He has been called one of Brazil’s most innovative pop artists and the feather light music of Felipe Cordeiro draws heavily on sensual dances like lambada and carimbó. However, the songwriter with the well-kept moustache will find more fans among lovers of alternative pop than fans of the 80s hit ”Lambada”. His acclaimed album is called Kitsch Pop Cult and the title encapsulates the nostalgic retro feel this tropical songwriter perfectly conjures up in his songs. Felipe Cordeiro plays stylish, psychedelic pop with a loving, albeit disrespectful, take on the musical traditions of his homeland.
description.dk: Han er udråbt til en af Brasiliens mest nyskabende popkunstnere, og Felipe Cordeiros fnuglette pop trækker på sensuelle danse som lambada og carimbó. Sangskriveren med det velplejede overskæg vil dog vinde flere hjerter blandt elskere af alternativ pop end hos fans af 80’er-hittet ”Lambada”. Hans roste album hedder Kitsch Pop Cult, titlen giver et godt indtryk af den lidt nostalgiske retrofornemmelse, som denne tropisk klingende sangskriver fremmaner til perfektion i sine sange. Felipe Cordeiro spiller stilfuld psykedelisk pop med et kærligt, men respektløst tag på sit fædrelands musiktraditioner.

description.uk:
With an arsenal of old analogue synthesizers, Canadian band Crystal Castles paint beautiful images of a cold world.

Ethan Kath and Alice Glass both come from a background in punk. They inject the energy into their trance-inspired electronica. Glass is in front – one moment angry and shrill, the next fervently sighing.

The band has turned down the shock effects from the early albums – and the latest, III, shows a triumphant greatness in the music.

What is left is a violently beating heart and an insistence that although the world may be relentless, the sound of it can still be beautiful as a snow queen.

Crystal Castles have toured almost non-stop past couple of years. Expect a band in great form hitting Roskilde this summer.

Label: Fiction / Universal
description.dk:
Armeret med gamle analoge synthesizere skaber canadiske Crystal Castles smukke billeder af en kold verden.

Ethan Kath og Alice Glass har begge baggrund i punk. Energien herfra overfører de til deres trance-inspirerede electronica. Helt forrest står Glass – det ene øjeblik hidsig og skingert fremfarende, det næste øjeblik inderligt sukkende.

Bandet har skruet ned for chokeffekterne fra de tidlige udspil, og seneste album, III, viser en triumferende storhed i musikken.

Tilbage står et heftigt bankende hjerte og en insisteren på, at selvom verden kan være ubarmhjertig, så kan lyden af den godt fremstå smuk som en snedronning.

Crystal Castles har turneret nærmest non-stop de sidste par år. Forvent derfor et band i storform, som rammer Roskilde denne sommer.

Label: Fiction / Universal

related.name: AZEALIA BANKS
related.short_description: The hip hop queen of the Internet

related.name: JAMES BLAKE
related.short_description: Electronic R&B with pounding human heart

38.text: Twisted electronica in the glow of the mirror ball

description.uk:
Despite his classic noble gentleman's attire, Daedelus is not a man who prefers order and clean lines in his music.

Sugar-speedy jazz, chipmunk voices, disorienting beats and old, nostalgic sounds are just some of the elements that are reshaped in the American rhythm saboteur’s seemingly radioactive laptop.

To match the music, Daedelus has developed a cool stage show. A wall of mirrors combined with lights and projections create the impression of standing inside a giant mirror ball. This kind of magic cannot be done just anywhere, so we’re proud to present this at Roskilde.

Label: Ninja Tune / VME
description.dk:
På trods af sin klassisk noble gentlemanpåklædning er Daedelus ikke en mand, der foretrækker orden og rene linjer i sin musik.

Sukkerspeedet jazz, egernstemmer, desorienterende beats og nostalgisk lyd af verden i går er blot nogle af de elementer, der omformes i den amerikanske rytmesabotørs tilsyneladende radioaktive laptop.

For at matche musikken har Daedelus udviklet et labert sceneshow. En væg af spejle skaber sammen med lys og projektioner indtrykket af at stå midt i en kæmpemæssig spejlkugle. Den slags magi kan man ikke lige sømme sammen hvor som helst, så vi er stolte over at præsentere dette unikum hos os.

Label: Ninja Tune / VME

description.uk:
In trance-like, long songs, Dakhabrakha creates a self-confessed "ethnic chaos" of sensitive falsetto vocals, accordion, cello, bass-dark jazz and Ukrainian folk music.

The expression is spiritual, melodious and here and there almost a bit scary like the most shadowy corners of a remote bazaar.

The four-piece draws new zigzag lines between the continents – elements of both Indian, Arabic, African, Russian and Australian descent pop up along the way. People missing the American singer Jeff Buckley will also discover an Eastern European cousin in Dakhabrakha’s male singer, Marko Halanevych.
description.dk:
I tranceagtige, lange numre skaber Dakhabrakha ifølge dem selv et ”etnisk kaos” af følsomme falsetvokaler, harmonika, cello, bas-mørk jazz og ukrainsk folkemusik.

Udtrykket er spirituelt, melodiøst og her og der næsten småuhyggeligt som de mest skyggefulde hjørner af en fjern basar.

Kvartetten trækker nye zigzaglinjer mellem kontinenterne: Elementer af både indisk, arabisk, afrikansk, russisk og australsk afstamning dukker op undervejs. Folk, der savner den amerikanske sanger Jeff Buckley, vil ligeledes opdage en østeuropæisk slægtning i Dakhabrakhas mandlige sanger, Marko Halanevych.

description.uk:
With his half-mad appearance, inimitable rap and eccentric choice of productions, Danny Brown is a much more spectacular acquaintance than the somewhat anonymous artist name suggests.

He has grown up in Detroit, is a self-confessed music geek and has continued the legacy of the cap-clad king of the city J Dilla in the company of Black Milk.

Danny Brown's lyrical universe often revolves around bad medications and the grim conditions of Motor City. His mental condition is not all that bad, however, as he leaves room for plenty of quivering women's thighs and hefty doses of humour.

Look forward to a hefty round in the ring with this dentally challenged rhyme dribbler whose musical backdrop alternates between sugar-coated soul and sparkling electronics.

Label: Fool's Gold / import
description.dk:
Med sin halvgale fremtoning, uforlignelige rap og excentriske valg af produktioner er Danny Brown et noget mere spektakulært bekendtskab, end det lidt anonyme kunstnernavn antyder.

Han er opvokset i Detroit, musiknørd om en hals og har også videreført arven fra den kasketklædte bykonge J Dilla i selskab med Black Milk.

Danny Browns tekstunivers kredser ofte om uartige medikamenter og de grumme tilstande i Motor City. Sindstilstanden er dog ikke mere forsuret end, at der er plads til masser af bævrende kvindelår og heftige doser humor.

Glæd dig til en heftig tur i manegen med en tandsætsudfordret rimdribler, hvis musikalske bagtæppe veksler mellem karamelslikket soul og gnistrende elektronik.

Label: Fool's Gold / import

related.name: JOEY BADA$$
related.short_description: Young hip hop hope from Brooklyn

related.name: KENDRICK LAMAR
related.short_description: The new hip hop king of the West Coast

41.text: Folk music from China with a disturbingly western twist

description.uk:
The former punk rocker Song Yuhze formed Dawanggang after his travels in western China. The ensemble is rich in insight and ideas and has its musical foundation in the wailing tones of Chinese folk music. Yuhze combines these notes with something uniquely western – and quite disturbing. The narratives as well as the vast expanses of the countryside of the gargantuan nation is present in the music, but the experimenting, almost avant-garde, approach to the traditional sound is an equal mix between Scott Walker and The Beijing Opera.

Label: Jaro / Import
description.dk:
Den tidligere punkrocker Song Yuhze stiftede efter rejser i Vestkina Dawanggang. Et ensemble rigt på udsyn og indfald med et musikalsk fundament hvis skærende klange hviler på kinesisk folkemusik. Tonerne herfra kombinerer Yuhze med noget absolut vestligt – og ret foruroligende. Det er altså det kæmpe lands fortællinger, landestrækninger og luftrum, der kommer frem i musikken, men med en eksperimenterende, nærmest avantgardistisk tilgang til de traditionelle toner, der er lige så meget sen Scott Walker som Peking-operaen.

Label: Jaro / Import

related.name: GEOMUNGO FACTORY
related.short_description: Groovy sitar music with ancient origins

related.name: MARTIN RYUM
related.short_description: Classical 60s poetry in fresh musical clothes

related.name: COMPADRE

related.name: TREMORO TARANTURA

description.uk:
Gifted MC Felix De Luca already made some noise with his EP The Rebirth Of An Artist – an opus one about ”weed, women, sneakers and Danish design”.

The rebirth indicated in the title is that of the young rapper. He has previously demonstrated his talent and decidedly non-Danish-sounding flow under the moniker Verb Ink.

Felix De Luca thrives in the slipstream of sharp, Danish hip hop making noises in the underground right now.

Label: Soundesc
description.dk:
Den danske, engelsksprogede mc Felix De Luca har allerede lavet en del larm med ep’en The Rebirth Of An Artist – et opus 1 om ”tjald, kvinder, sneakers og dansk design”.

Genfødslen i titlen er den unge rappers egen: Han har tidligere bevist sit talent og aldeles udanske flow under kunstnernavnet Verb Ink.

Felix De Luca lægger sig lunt i slipstrømmen af skarp, dansk hiphop, som rumsterer i undergrunden lige nu.

Label: Soundesc

related.name: MARIE KEY
related.short_description: Airy, Danish-language pop from a sharp pen.

related.name: ELOQ
related.short_description: Gritty beats from Copenhagen sound chief

description.uk:
On the comeback record Anastasis, Dead Can Dance, the black princes of the 80s, break a 16-year-long silence.

Roskilde Festival presents their first Danish concert ever, the only one of its kind in Scandinavia this summer.

Through a fog of chanting vocals, reverb and thick synthesizers, Dead Can Dance calls forth the bewitched sweetness of Arabian nights and the odours and steams of the Far East.

Brendan Perry and Lisa Gerrard chased their distinct, flickering muse back at a time when the ethnic provinces in the music felt way more remote than today. Now that Dead Can Dance are back to cast their spell, they do so as true pioneers.

Label: PIAS / Target
description.dk:
På genkomstpladen Anastasis (græsk for genfødsel) har Dead Can Dance, 80’ernes sorte fyrster, brudt 16 års tavshed.

Roskilde Festival blænder op for deres første danske koncert nogensinde, den eneste af sin slags i Skandinavien denne sommer.

Gennem en dyne af messende vokaler, dirrende rumklang og tykke synthesizertoner fremmaner Dead Can Dance arabiske nætters forheksede sødme og fjernorientens dampe og dufte.

De centrale, gennemgående medlemmer Brendan Perry og Lisa Gerrard jog deres egen flimrende muse helt tilbage i 80’erne, hvor de etniske provinser skildret i musikken var meget mere fjerntliggende end i dag. Når de nu endelig vifter røgelsespindene igen, er det som pionerer og stilskabere.

Label: PIAS / Target

description.uk:
John Cohen belongs in the darkest corner of electronic music, the place where the pop-interpreters of said genre (none mentioned, none forgotten) are in for a good flogging. Dead Fader’s music contains a dystopian, industrial tonality, which makes it sound like something that just might keep gnawing at your soul after you have returned from the festival longing for a good night’s sleep. Using abstract, distorted club music, noise, infernal volume levels, amputated sound bites and unveiled ugliness Dead Fader creates an energetic, electronic nightmare. Have a recess from the harmonies and choruses of the world.

Label: Small But Hard / Import
description.dk:
John Cohen hører til i den elektroniske musiks sorteste hjørne, hvor genrens mere poppede fortolkere (ingen nævnt, ingen glemt) får rygstykkerne pisket. Med sin dystopiske og industrielle tone lyder Dead Faders musik som noget, der kunne finde på at gnave videre løs i din sjæl, efter at du er taget hjem fra festivalen til en umiddelbart god nats søvn. Med abstrakt, forvrænget klubmusik, støj, infernalsk larm, amputerede lydbidder og utilsløret grimhed skaber Dead Fader et energisk, elektronisk mareridt. Et frikvarter fra denne verdens vellyd og omkvæd.

Label: Small But Hard / Import

description.uk:
Dead Rat Orchestra has been one of England’s most weird and innovative orchestras for a decade. Their colourful playground of instruments typically includes violin, accordion and a variety of guitars. But often they also employ wooden logs, axes, balloons, toys and whatever else is at hand. No matter the choice of instruments, they continue to traverse the boundaries of genre without taking permanent residence anywhere in particular. Dead Rat Orchestra play instrumental, semi-improvisational folk music which here and there resemble an acoustic variant of the tour companions Godspeed You! Black Emperor.

Label: Antigen / Import
description.dk:
I et årti har Dead Rat Orchestra været et af Englands mest mærkelige og nyskabende orkestre. Deres brogede instrumentpark inkluderer typisk violin, harmonika og guitarinstrumenter. Ofte bruger de også træstammer, økser, balloner, legetøj og andet tilgængeligt. Uanset valg af instrumenter er de hele tiden på tærsklen af forskellige genrer uden at tage fast bolig et enkelt sted. Dead Rat Orchestra spiller instrumental, halvt improvisatorisk folkemusik, der her og der lyder som en mere akustisk udgave af turnekammeraterne Godspeed You! Black Emperor.

Label: Antigen / Import

description.uk:
Danish kings of copy/paste Den Sorte Skole have gathered 10,000 fragments from 300 dusty vinyl records from 51 different countries for their magnus opus, Lektion III.

A new chapter in an odyssey of samples that has already brought the unit to Roskilde with great results in the past.

The latest record has more global scents, ambition and acid influence than before. At the same time, Den Sorte Skole hints at a few fresh, exclusive tracks to get the Roskilde party started.
description.dk:
De danske konger af musikalsk copy/paste er gået nye veje på deres seneste udspil, Lektion III. Den seneste skive er en samplet odysse, der tager os fra fra libanesisk surf og tidlig tysk electro til indisk bollywood og fransk psychrock i ét svimlende, genrenedbrydende trip.

Sample-troldmændenes seneste opus er mere globalt duftende, udfordrende og syret end tidligere: Et nyt, modigt spadestik i en anderledes musikalsk muld – samtidig varsler Den Sorte Skole et par helt jomfruelige tracks til at sætte festen i gang. Og den visuelle kunstnergruppe Dark Matters leverer en billedside, der bliver lige så rig på mørk syre og fantasi som musikken.

related.name: ELOQ
related.short_description: Gritty beats from Copenhagen sound chief

related.name: KENTON SLASH DEMON
related.short_description: Deep house from the rear edge of the universe

related.name: MARIE KEY
related.short_description: Airy, Danish-language pop from a sharp pen.

description.uk:
Hardcore, mathcore, metal, progressive rock. A myriad of genre labels have been glued to The Dillinger Escape Plan through their six sheets long career.

The quartet from New Jersey made their name with extreme metal that not only is raging, screaming and brutal, but also jazz virtuoso-like and filled with surprising genre detours.

Their live shows are chaotic and violent bursts of energy, where the complexities occasionally explode in a ferocity that has made the band's concerts legendary and infamous. The Dillinger Escape Plan has the same half perverse delight in breaking the rules, which also characterizes their friend and former business partner Mike Patton.
description.dk:
Hardcore, mathcore, metal, progressiv rock. Et utal af genremærkater har været limet på The Dillinger Escape Plan gennem deres seks plader lange karriere.

Kvartetten fra New Jersey har skabt sit navn med ekstremmetal, der ikke bare er frådende, skrigende og brutal, men også jazzagtig virtuos og fyldt med overraskende genreafstikkere.

Deres liveshows er kaotiske og voldsomme energiudladninger, hvor kompleksiteten her og der eksploderer i en vildskab, som har gjort bandets koncerter legendariske og berygtede. The Dillinger Escape Plan har den samme halvperverse fryd ved at bryde reglerne, der også kendetegner deres kammerat og tidligere samarbejdspartner Mike Patton.

related.name: KVELERTAK
related.short_description: Metallic hardcore punk with humour and hooks

48.text: Electronic house duo with an ear for hits

description.uk:
Two young brothers are climbing towards the top of the British electronic scene right now. They operate under the name Disclosure, and on their first single release they have paved the way for the future of pop, house and dubstep.

It's chic, urban and touches upon several hot spots on the electronic genre map. If you want to see what tomorrow brings you should definitely check out Disclosure.

Guy and Howard Lawrence's debut album doesn’t come out until the spring of 2013. Nevertheless, they have already been close to the UK top 10 with the pop song "Latch".

Label: PMR / import
description.dk:
To purunge brødre bevæger sig stilsikkert fremad på Englands elektroniske scene lige nu. De opererer under navnet Disclosure og har på deres første singleudspil vist vejen for fremtidens pop, house og dubstep.

Det er chikt, storbyelegant og rører adskillige varme punkter på det elektroniske genreskema. Alle, der vil se, hvad morgendagen bringer, bør sætte et kryds ud for Disclosure.

Guy og Howard Lawrences egentlige debutplade udkommer først i foråret 2013. Ikke desto mindre har de allerede været tæt på den engelske top 10 med popnummeret ”Latch”.

Label: PMR / import

related.name: JAMES BLAKE
related.short_description: Electronic R&B with pounding human heart

description.uk:
Guitars and drums are all it takes to make it to heaven. Drenge are aware of this, nonchalantly the UK duo carves a bloody wound on the spine of guitar rock.

This is garage rock of the blackest kind. However, the tunes still carry the guiding light of melody beneath the grainy noise and carnage.

With minimal instrumentation, the two young hopes create a delightful racket full of the musicality, disgust and released frustration of punk, grunge and noise rock.

Label: Infectious / import
description.dk:
Guitar og trommer er nok til at skubbe porten til himmerige ind. Det ved duoen Drenge, der aldeles nonchalant snitter et styrtblødende kødsår hen over guitarrockens rygrad.

Dette er garagerock af sorteste skuffe, men med et vågelys af melodi inde i det grynede støjflimmer.

To unge håb skaber med få midler et skønt rabalder, der i traditionen fra den bedste punk, grunge og støjrock kombinerer musikalitet, væmmelse og frisat frustration.

Label: Infectious / import

description.uk:
Norwegians know how to do shoegazing just right – roaring, dreamy guitar noise with yearning angelic vocals hovering on top.

Dråpe’s first EP is full of noise pop taking off on pink clouds for the upper part of the atmosphere.

In an interview, vocalist Hanne Olsen Solem recently expressed her hopes and dreams of playing Roskilde Festival and releasing an album.

2013 finds both dreams coming true. Their debut album, Canicular Days, has just arrived less than two months before the Norwegians take our Pavilion Junior stage.

Label: Riot Factory
description.dk:
Nordmænd kan det der med shoegazer – fræsende, drømmende guitarstøj med længselsfulde englevokaler farende omkring.

Dråpes første ep er pakket med støjpop, der letter på lyserøde skyer mod den øvre atmosfære.

Bandets sangerinde Hanne Olsen Solem har i et interview sagt, at det er hendes drøm at spille på Roskilde Festival og at udgive et album.

I 2013 går begge drømme i opfyldelse. Deres debutalbum, Canicular Days, er lige udkommet, mindre end to måneder inden nordmændene indtager vores Pavilion Junior-scene.

Label: Riot Factory

description.uk:
Ska, Balkan sounds, hip hop, rock, reggae, funk metal. Dubioza Kolektiv get around the genres in a manner comparable to their hectic tour schedule all over Europe. On first sight they may look like your imagined Balkan brutes. But Dubioza Kolektiv, if any, have fought the stereotypes as well as corruption, battling at the fronts in favor of peace and democracy. In many respects, be they political or musical, Dubioza Kolektiv could be considered an East European, brassy Rage Against The Machine, ready to shred the Roskilde night in pieces.

Label: Menart / Import
description.dk:
Ska, balkan, hiphop, rock, reggae, funkmetal. Duboiza Kolektiv kommer lige så energisk omkring genrerne, som de turnerer bredt i hele Europa. Måske lever de ved første blik op til forestillingen om Balkan-typer. Men Dubioza Kolektiv har om nogen taget kampen op mod stereotyperne og korruptionen i en indsats for fred og demokrati. I mange henseender, både politisk og musikalsk, kan Dubioza Kolektiv betegnes som en blæserspruttende, østeuropæisk udgave af Rage Against The Machine, klar til at flå Roskilde-natten i stykker.

Label: Menart / Import

description.uk:
Is it possible to become an audience favourite, making beautiful compositional music with high ceilings? If you’re Efterklang, it is. They have made audience members all over the world hold their breath back, playing fragile chamber pop with strong nuances and colours. And after Casper Clausen established himself as a lead singer, the solemn music has started to resemble the late works of Talk Talk.

Efterklang has signed with legendary 4AD. The trio from the small island of Als makes its fourth visit as an internationally acclaimed band despite the Danish-sounding band name, meaning reverberation.

Label: 4AD / Rumraket
description.dk:
Kan man blive publikumsfavorit ved at lave smuk, højloftet kompositionsmusik? Efterklang har gjort det. Verden rundt har de fået publikum til at holde vejret tilbage, når de har spillet deres sarte, men nuancestærke kammerpop. Og efter at Casper Clausen har etableret sig som vokalist, har den højtidelige musik fået en dimension, der kalder på erindringer om sen Talk Talk.

Efterklang har pladekontrakt hos legendariske 4AD. Trioen slår vejen forbi for fjerde gang med et show, der kommer til at cementere, hvorfor alsingerne med det danskklingende bandnavn i dag er et internationalt hyldet orkester.

Label: 4AD / Rumraket

53.text: Atmospheric pop full of dreamy synthesizers

description.uk:
Norwegian act Eik specialises in 80s-tinted nostalgia and colour-saturated soundscapes full of disco and synth pop. The duo, which turns into a quartet on stage, creates dreamy electronica full of gentle synths and wonderful minor tones with impressive ease.

Eik is a must-see for both electronica geeks and pop lovers who have worn out their copy of Best of the 80s.

Label: Planet Noise / VME
description.dk:
Norske Eik specialiserer sig i 80’er-nostalgi og farvemættede lydbilleder fyldt med disco og synthpop i nordlyset. Duoen, der vokser til kvartet live, skaber med imponerende sikkerhed drømmende electronica fyldt med malende synthesizers og underskønne moltoner.

Eik bør være et must både for electronicanørder og popelskere, der har tyndslidt deres Best of the 80’s-cd.

Label: Planet Noise / VME

related.name: HIGHASAKITE
related.short_description: Alternative pop in full war paint

related.name: COMPADRE
related.short_description: Club music with Middle Eastern shade

54.text: Minimalistic masterpiece performed by Danish ensemble

description.uk: Steve Reich’s kaleidoscopic masterpiece Music for 18 Musicians has only been performed on Danish soil once before. The dizzying and spherical minimalism of the concerto is a hit with music listeners of very different tastes but it is considered one of the composer’s most difficult pieces to play. Ekkozone has performed modern compositions under various monikers in both Europe and the USA before. Experience their interpretation of a piece by a trendsetting artist, whose influence has reached the post rock and experimenting electronica of our time as well.
description.dk: Steve Reichs kalejdoskopiske mesterværk Music for 18 Musicians har kun én gang før været opført på dansk grund. Koncertværkets svimlende og sfæriske minimalisme går rent ind hos musiklyttere med vidt forskellig smag, men regnes for at være et af komponistens sværeste stykker at opføre. Ekkozone har under tidligere navne tidligere opført moderne kompositionsmusik i både Europa og USA. Oplev dem fortolke en stilskabende kunstner, hvis kraftige indflydelse også slår ud i vor tids postrock og eksperimenterende electronica.

description.uk: Somewhere on the pink Richter scale between M.I.A. and Rihanna we find Elliphant. During no time Ellinor Olovsdotter has made a variety of media want to know more. Her pungent pop is dirty and rubs its shabby, synthetic beats in the face of its happy victim. A talented dance floor queen’s personal mixture of dancehall, techno and pop, inspired by trips to London and Goa.
description.dk: Et sted på den pink richterskala mellem M.I.A. og Rihanna finder vi Elliphant. Ellinor Olovsdotter har på kort tid fået alverdens medier til at labbe hendes numre i sig. Hendes gadetøsede pop er kras, beskidt og dunker sin tilhører lige i fjæset med sine syntetiske, skrabede beats: en talentfuld furies personlige opkog af (først og fremmest) dancehall, techno og pop med inspiration opsamlet i både London og Goa.

56.text: Gritty beats from Copenhagen sound chief

description.uk:
Copenhagen’s answer to J Dilla has returned to Roskilde Festival to make some more noise – this time with a new album in the bag and international interest on the rise. Do musical genre monikers like trap, wonky and crunk give you clammy palms and tics around the eyes? No worries. Eloq can make even the uninitiated move their sneakers with his bubbly jacuzzi-mix of bass, gritty beats and high-pitched synthesizers. This venomous neon cocktail has made Eloq a leader figure in Copenhagen’s hip hop scene as well as a beloved producer, dj and remixer.

Label: Cheff
description.dk:
Københavns eget svar på J Dilla er tilbage på Roskilde Festival for at lave noget mere larm – denne gang med nyt album i sadeltasken og stigende international interesse. Gør musikalske genrebetegnelser som trap, wonky og crunk dig klam i håndfladerne og flakkende i blikket? No worries. Eloq kan også få de uindviedes dansesko i gled, når han blander bas, skrattende beats og skingre synthesizers i sin egen jacuzziboblende mikstur. En giftig neoncocktail, der har gjort Eloq til en lederskikkelse på den københavnske hiphopscene såvel som en yndet producer, dj og remixer.

Label: Cheff
