57.text: Hip hop king of the underground

description.uk:
He rewrote the blueprint of alternativ hip hop in the 90s and 00s along with Company Flow, as a solo rapper and as a head of Def Jux. Today El-P enjoys regal status among those who favour and regard hip hop as a progressive art. His text universe is ignited by political anger, discontent and paranoia. We also cherish the verbose doomsayer for his productions, filled to the brim with dirt, grit, coldness and laser lights from the future. El-P has returned from hibernation with the roaring comeback record Cancer 4 Cure.

Label: Fat Possum / Cosmos Music
description.dk:
Sammen med Company Flow, som solist og som chef for Def Jux var El-P med til at omskrive køreplanen for den alternative undergrundshiphop i 90’erne og 00’erne. I dag har han omtrent royal status hos folk, der ser og ønsker hiphoppen som en progressiv kunstart. Tekstuniverset er optændt af politisk vrede, lede og paranoia. Man forbinder også den skarptungede sortseer fra Brooklyn med produktionerne, der er fyldt med skrammel, snavs, kulde og zappende laserlys fra fremtiden. El-P har efter flere års stilhed endelig udgivet den tordnende genkomstplade Cancer 4 Cure.

Label: Fat Possum / Cosmos Music

58.text: Epic sword metal with blasting melodies

description.uk:
Thor, Odin and Loke are shaking their curls somewhere in mighty Valhalla each time Ensiferum take the stage. The melodic Finns are one of the sharpest names of folk-oriented metal. Ancient Northern fire is blazing from the reactors when Ensiferum combine the rhythms and minor scales of folk dance with blasting choruses, bombast and plenty of fiery metal riffing. With 2012’s Unsung Heroes, Ensiferum have carved the writing on the wall in durable runes: They are true heroes of epic sword metal.

Label: Spinefarm / Universal
description.dk:
Thor, Odin og Loke ryster hårlokkerne et sted inde i Valhall, hver eneste gang Ensiferum indtager scenen. De melodiske finner er et af de skarpeste navne inden for den folkemusik-inspirerede metalscene. Der er ældgammel nordisk ild i reaktorerne, når Ensiferum kombinerer folkedansens rytmer og molskalaer med stormsusende ørehængeromkvæd, bombastiske armbevægelser og masser af fyrig metalspade. Med Unsung Heroes fra 2012 har Ensiferum indprentet skriften på væggen i vejrfaste runer: De er sande mestre af den episke sværdmetal.

Label: Spinefarm / Universal

description.uk:
He is in his 20s, not from the 20s. Still, Frank Fairfield sounds like a poetic yokel from between the two Great Wars.

The young songwriter and music archaeologist lived more or less like a bum in California, but he was discovered by those able to recognize his potential. Today, he supports Fleet Foxes on tour and puts out acclaimed records of heart break, whiskey, poverty and impending collapse. The young gentleman garnishes his rustic Americana with plenty of banjo and potent violin.

Label: Tompkin Square / Import
description.dk:
Han er i sine 20’ere, ikke fra 20’erne. Alligevel lyder Frank Fairfield som en poetisk bondetamp, der er kommet ned fra et ensomt beliggende bjergbælte i sin Ford T engang på et tidspunkt mellem de to store krige.

Den unge sangskriver og musikarkæolog levede mere eller mindre som bums i nutidens Californien, men blev opdaget af nogle, der kunne se hans potentiale. I dag har han turneret med Fleet Foxes og udgivet roste plader, der er fyldt med hjertesorg, whisky, uafvendelig fattigdom og forestående børskrak. Den unge gentleman garnerer sin rustikke americana med masser af banjo og potent violin.

Label: Tompkin Square / Import

description.uk:
FIDLAR is an acronym for Fuck It Dog, Life’s A Risk and their straightforward summer surf punk fits the skater attitude perfectly. Seize the day by its balls. It’s here and now. Jay Reatard and Joey Ramone aren’t here anymore; it is up to us now. The four potheads play no nonsense songs about cheap beers, skateboards and drugs. FIDLAR does not require a graduation diploma or a driver’s license as long as you are ready for a bunch of dirty, Californian Rock ’n’ Roll.

Label: Mom + Pop/ Cooperative
description.dk:
Øl, f**** og punkmusik, anyone? FIDLAR står for Fuck It Dog, Life’s A Risk, og deres ukomplekse sommersurfpunk stemmer godt overens med denne skaterattitude. Grib dagen. Helst i nosserne. Det er her og nu. Hverken Jay Reatard eller Joey Ramone er her længere, vi må selv klare ærterne. De fire bonghoveder spiller lige-på-og-derud-ad-sange om billig humle, skateboards og stoffer. FIDLAR kræver ikke studentereksamen eller stort kørekort, så længe du er med på en omgang beskidt, californisk rock’n’roll.

Label: Mom + Pop/ Cooperative

related.name: PISSED JEANS
related.short_description: Hardcore punk for your inner Neanderthal

related.name: CHELSEA LIGHT MOVING
related.short_description: Noise rock with legendary lead singer

description.uk:
It’s almost like Night of the Living Dead at Roskilde Festival.

Behind the name Flatbush Zombies you find a couple of creative potheads from the crimed-ridden area near Prospect Heights in Brooklyn. The gold teeth belong to Meechy Darko and Zombie Juice whose rap is based on four classic hip hop subjects: smoke, money, ladies and freshly baked waffles. Erick Arc Elliot produces the un-dead duo who has also rapped alongside A$AP Rocky.

Flatbush Zombies deliver philosophical horrorcore with a stoned twist: if D.R.UG.S. sounds like an uninspired title for a mixtape, please note that the title is an abbreviation of Death and Reincarnation Under God's Supervision.
description.dk:
Der er dømt Night of the Living Dead på Roskilde Festival.

Bag navnet Flatbush Zombies gemmer sig et par kreative tågehoveder fra det belastede område nær Prospect Heights i Brooklyn. Guldgebisserne Meechy Darko og Zombie Juice rapper med udgangspunkt i hiphoppens fire klassiske grundpiller: røg, penge, damer og friskbagte vafler. Erick Arc Elliot producerer for den u-døde duo, der også har rappet med A$AP Rocky.

Flatbush Zombies leverer småfilosofisk horrorcore med et stenet twist: hvis D.R.UG.S. lyder som et uinspireret navn til et mixtape, bemærk da venligst, at titlen er en forkortelse af Death and Reincarnation Under God’s Supervision.

related.name: JOEY BADA$$
related.short_description: Young hip hop hope from Brooklyn

related.name: KENDRICK LAMAR
related.short_description: The new hip hop king of the West Coast

description.uk:
Flume has made music since he was 13 years old. That is less than 10 years ago. Still this Australian talent sounds ready to sneak in between Flying Lotus and James Blake to name but a few examples. The producer and beat designer creates his own twisted and looping mix of edgy beats and dreamy, summer lazy music, which in its slow rhythms simultaneously contains electronic echoes of R&B, dub step and pop. The otherwise rock oriented magazine Rolling Stone are among the fans of Flume. Show up and discover how the young Australian creates electronic music, which resonates beyond the confines of the genre.

Future Classic / Import
description.dk:
Siden han var 13 år gammel, har Flume lavet musik. Det er mindre end 10 år siden. Alligevel lyder det australske talent klar til at smyge sig ind blandt eksempelvis Flying Lotus og James Blake. Produceren og beatsmeden laver sit eget forvredne, loopede miks af kantede beats og drømmende, sommerdoven musik, der i overvejende hvilepuls på én gang rummer elektroniske ekkoer af R&B, dubstep og pop. Det elles så rockorienterede musikmagasin Rolling Stone er allerede fan af Flume. Mød op og find ud af, hvordan den unge australier laver elektronisk musik, så den vækker stor genklang også uden for genrens cirkler.

Label: Future Classic / Import

related.name: DISCLOSURE
related.short_description: Electronic house duo with an ear for hits

related.name: JAMES BLAKE
related.short_description: Electronic R&B with pounding human heart

description.uk: The wolves have returned to the Danish peninsula of Jutland (true story). Friendly Beastly Coyote, too, yowls loud enough from his home in distant, Jutlandic Nykøbing Mors for the urban audience in Copenhagen to take notice. His electronic tracks were nominated for Underground Music Awards in 2012. At Roskilde Festival 2013, Friendly Beastly Coyote is sure to induce a rave that will have the wolves howling further in unison.
description.dk: Ulvene er vendt tilbage til Jylland. Friendly Beastly Coyte hviner og hujer ligeledes, så det bliver hørt langt væk fra nordvestjyske Nykøbing Mors, hvor den selvudråbte perfektionist skaber sin elektroniske musik. Den unge jydes danseegnede tracks udløste en nominering til Underground Music Awards i 2012. På Roskilde Festival 2013 kommer Friendly Beastly Coyote også til at skabe et rave, der vil få ulvene til at hyle i kor.

64.text: Groovy sitar music with ancient origins

description.uk: ”You can’t make innovations, if you don’t know the tradition”, says one of the members of Geomungo Factory. The quartet has a mission: To introduce the world to the string music of South Korea as played on the massive sitar instruments of that nation, which are strummed using a small stick of bamboo. The instruments, which are called Geomungo, date as far back as the 4th century. But there is a distinctly modern sound to the alien notes. The music is groovy and full of playful rhythms and the four Koreans play like a well-oiled clockwork. Geomungo Factory use both pedals and amplifiers on the old instruments to extract new nuances and surprising breakthroughs.
description.dk: ”Man kan ikke lave nyskabelser, hvis man ikke kender traditionen”, siger en af Gemungo Factorys medlemmer. Kvartettens mission er at introducere verden for Sydkoreas strengemusik, spillet på landets kæmpestore sitarinstrumenter som man betjener ved hjælp af en lille bambuspind. Instrumenterne, kaldet geomungo, daterer helt tilbage til det 4. århundrede. Samtidig er der en distinkt, moderne lyd i de fremmedartede toner. Musikken er groovy og fuld af legesyge rytmer, og de fire koreaneres sammenspil er som et velsmurt urværk. Geomungo Factory udsætter de gamle instrumenter for både pedaler og forstærker og udvinder på denne måde helt nye nuancer og overraskende genrebrud.

related.name: COMPADRE
related.short_description: Club music with Middle Eastern shade

description.uk:
Electro sounds of today and tomorrow join soul and funk sounds of the past in Ghost Venue’s musical crystal ball.

On the debut album Looking Back On Broken Pieces, Theodor Storm Kristensen has made an album full of hazy nostalgia smacking slightly of jazz and lazy hip hop – at other times the bass grooves go full-on futuristic and hard-hitting.

Ghost Venue takes the dusty beats of yesteryear and torches them with flaming neon, in the live setting a drummer adds extra energy to the haunting sounds.
description.dk:
Nutiden og fremtidens electro møder fortidens soul og funk i Ghost Venues musikalske krystalkugle.

Theodor Storm Kristensen har med fuldlængden Looking Back On Broken Pieces lavet en plade fuld af diset nostalgi, småjazzet bismag, doven hiphopfornemmelse – og nu og da fuld futuristisk kraft i de hårdtslående basgrooves.

Ghost Venue tager fortidens støvede beats og antænder dem med flammende neon, live puster en trommeslager ekstra liv i spøgerierne.

66.text: Edgy girl rapper with global outlook

description.uk:
Serbian-born, self-proclaimed pussy-power rapper Gnucci finally takes the stage on her own, having served under the flags of prior Roskilde acts such as Spoek Mathambo, Mash Up International and Schlachthofbronx.

Her in-your-face and globally inspired rap has been through a small name change. After abandoning her artist surname Banana, it seems there is no peel left to slip in and that the time has come for us to get to know the gifted brunette entirely on her own terms.

Label: Famalam / Sony Music
description.dk:
Den serbiskfødte, selvbetitlede pussy power-rapper Gnucci indtager endelig scenen på egen hånd – før har hun været under vingerne hos tidligere Roskilde-navne som Spoek Mathambo, Mash Up International og Schlachthofbronx.

Hendes lige-i-fjæset og globalt inspirerede rap har undergået en lille navneforandring. Nu, efter at have smidt kunstnerefternavnet Banana, er det som om, der ikke længere er nogen skræl at glide i, og vi for alvor skal lære brunetten med det skarpe mundtøj at kende på hendes egne præmisser.

Label: Famalam / Sony Music

description.uk: ”Denmark’s strongest live act.” Thus Go Go Berlin dub themselves and from early on it has been clear that they posses more than mere self-confidence. The party rock unit have toured with bands such as the like-minded The Blue Van and during no time, Go Go Berlin have gathered a loyal fan base all over Denmark. This is classic rock’n’roll played with energy, nerve and lust for life. They make the crowds enthused with classic rock skills and are not about to compromise their ascent anytime soon, the debut album will be recorded in London.
description.dk: ”Danmarks bedste liveband.” Sådan beskriver Silkeborgs Go Go Berlin sig selv og det har været tydeligt fra første færd, at de har mere end blot selvtilliden i orden. Det festlige rockband har turneret sammen med ligesindede The Blue Van og har hurtigt vundet sig en loyal fanbase over det ganske land. Her er klassisk rock og rul spillet med energi, nerve og livsappetit. Go Go Berlin skaber begejstring med deres klassiske rockhåndværk og går ikke på kompromis, debutalbummet bliver indspillet i London.

68.text: Funky trance rock with an African flavour

description.uk:
World Music is the title of Goat’s much-hyped and critically acclaimed debut album from 2012. And the title is a clear indication of what you can expect from this masked, mysterious giant orchestra.

The Swedes play psychedelic rock that sounds as if it were cooked in equal parts bong water, Swedish wild strawberries and African extracts.

With electric guitar, accordion, organ and a well-developed sense of funk and trance, Goat invites us on a wild ride towards a gaudy parallel world. A magical place filled with bright colours, where musical genres have evaporated, and hips just keep on wiggling.

Take the goat by the horns and dance.

Label: Stranded / import
description.dk:
World Music kalder Goat deres hypede og roste debutplade fra 2012. Og titlen er en klar indikation på, hvad du kan vente dig af dette maskeklædte, hemmelighedsfulde kæmpeorkester.

Svenskerne spiller psykedelisk rock, der lyder, som var den kogt på lige dele bongvand, svenske skovjordbær og afrikanske ekstrakter.

Med elguitar, harmonika, orgel og en veludviklet sans for funk og trance inviterer Goat os med på en vild tur mod en spraglet parallelverden. Et magisk sted fyldt med løbende knaldfarver, hvor musikalske genrer er fordampede, og hofterne vrikker.

Tag geden ved hornene og dans.

Label: Stranded / import

related.name: K-X-P
related.short_description: Punk rock with a mechanical heart

related.name: CHELSEA LIGHT MOVING
related.short_description: Noise rock with legendary lead singer

related.name: PISSED JEANS
related.short_description: Hardcore punk for your inner Neanderthal

related.name: JOHN GRANT
related.short_description: Brutally heartbreaking songs with an electronic touch

description.uk:
The foaming swamps of Louisiana have created few beasts as rotten and hideous as Goatwhore. The 15-year-old quartet’s fifth album is called Blood for the Master. Without too many detours or errands, the record demonstrates the mastery Goatwhore have developed, during a career of intensive touring making Bob Dylan’s Never Ending Tour look like a stroll with his guitar around the local pub. Goatwhore kick ass in a hostile mix with black, death and thrash ingredients: For these Southern boys it’s just good, ol’ heavy metal at the end of the day. Watch out for this goat, people, it has foam around its mouth and bloody murder in its eyes.

Label: Metal Blade/Target
description.dk:
Delstaten Louisianas dampende sumpe har skabt få bæster så pilrådne og hæslige som Goatwhore. Den 15 år gamle kvartets femte album hedder Blood for the Master. Uden de store svinkeærinder understreger pladen det mesterskab, Goatwhore har udviklet i løbet af en storturnerende karriere, der får Bob Dylans Never Ending Tour til at ligne en sviptur med guitaren omkring den lokale centerpub. Goatwhore tæver ubønhørligt løs i et hektisk miks, der tester positivt for både black, death og thrash: For de her sydstatsdrenge er det alt sammen bare good, ol’ heavy metal til syvende og sidst. Pas på denne her ged, folkens, den har fråde omkring munden og mord i øjnene.

Label: Metal Blade/Target

70.text: Brutally heartbreaking songs with an electronic touch

description.uk:
John Grant guested Roskilde Festival 2011 in the wake of his breakthrough album, Queen of Denmark, treating his audience with intimate piano version of his 70’es-esque ballads. On his new album Pale Green Ghosts this brutally honest bohemian has directed his gaze at the 80es and electronic music without abandoning his heartbreaking song craft. The former lead singer of long-overlooked The Czars enjoys an uplifting momentum these days, making him a likely candidate to a larger stage this time around.

Label: Bella Union / Cooperative
description.dk:
John Grant gæstede Roskilde Festival 2011 i kølvandet på gennembrudsalbummet Queen of Denmark, hvor vi fik hans 70’er-klingende ballader serveret i intime klaverversioner. På sit nye album Pale Green Ghosts har den hudløse boheme sadlet om. Blikket er vendt mod 80’erne og den elektroniske musik, uden at Grant af den grund opgiver sit udgangspunkt i den hjerteknusende og nogle gange rystende ærlige sangskrivning. Den tidligere forsanger i oversete The Czars nyder et bekræftende momentum, der denne gang kalder på en større scene end sidst.

Label: Bella Union / Cooperative

related.name: CHELSEA LIGHT MOVING
related.short_description: Noise rock with legendary lead singer

related.name: GOAT
related.short_description: Funky trance rock with an African flavour

description.uk:
Since 1994 they have made mosh pits everywhere red-hot. Hatebreed visit Roskilde Festival for the first time since 2004.

The Americans breed their own monster with balls of steel, iron gills and fiery eyes. ‘Celtic Frost hardcore’ front man Jamey Jasta dubs the genre, conveying a mix of thrash and hardcore sure to make any healthy lad or lady ready to romp.

Hatebreed have just released a new album, The Divinity of Purpose - featuring, according to the quotable singer, “all pit, no shit”. We'll let them prove this at Roskilde, consider yourself invited as well.

Label: Sony Music / Nuclear Blast
description.dk:
Siden 1994 har de fået moshpittene til at ryge – Hatebreed gæster Roskilde Festival for første gang siden 2004.

Amerikanerne yngler deres helt eget monster med stålnosser, jerngæller og ild i øjnene. ’Celtic Frost hardcore’ kalder frontmand Jamey Jasta selv genren. Et miks med udgangspunkt i thrash og hardcore, der bør få enhver knægt eller mø med trang til at ryste lemmerne i gang og af sted.

Hatebreed har lige sluppet en ny skive, The Divinity of Purpose, et album som ifølge selvsamme frontmand er ”all pit, no shit”. Dette skudsmål får de hermed lov til at efterleve på Roskilde, og du er inviteret med.

Label: Sony Music / Nuclear Blast

72.text: Psychedelic jazz funk collective from the far reaches of the Milky Way

description.uk:
13 Degrees of Reality - the latest album by The Heliocentrics – draws on music from more than 13 different places. The psychedelic funk collective mixes Latin American, African, German and British sources of inspiration – from Miles Davis to James Brown. And that leaves out the inspiration from the rest of the Milky Way: The Heliocentrics obviously share their enthusiasm for outer space with jazz legend and main source of inspiration Sun Ra. The Heliocentrics travel – partially improvising – into a glowing constellation of genre, thumping bass, beats and syncope; a dimension full of blinking colours and dissolved consciousness.

Label: Now-Again / Import
description.dk:
The Heliocentrics’ seneste album 13 Degrees of Reality trækker på musik fra mere end 13 steder. Det psykedeliske funkkollektiv blander latinamerikanske, afrikanske, tyske og britiske inspirationskilder, fra Miles Davis til James Brown. Og så har vi ikke været inde på inspirationerne fra den øvrige mælkevej: The Heliocentrics deler tydeligvis jazzlegenden og hovedinspirationen Sun Ras interesse for himmelrummet. I en lysende konstellation af genrer, gyngende bas, beats og synkoper rejser The Heliocentrics halvt improviserende ind i en dimension fyldt med blinkende farver og nedsmeltet bevidsthed.

Label: Now-Again / Import

73.text: Alternative pop in full war paint

description.uk:
With thumbs up from Pitchfork, Bon Iver and a devoted Norwegian music press, Highasakite is ready to become the new major Nordic music act.

Their alternative pop is filled with hit potential and catchy melodies. "Indian Summer" has already spread its heavy-hearted sweetness on the radio. The song is almost a signature song for the Norwegians who like to play concert wearing Indian outfits.

with her characteristic sitar in front, Ingrid Helene Håvik is a Nordic star both as a vocalist and a front woman.

Highasakite has the right mix of sugar and acid in their music to rise far up towards the sky.

Label: Riot Factory / EMI
description.dk:
Med løftede tommelfingre fra Pitchfork, Bon Iver og en forelsket norsk musikpresse står Highasakite til at blive det nye store nordiske musiknavn.

Deres alternative pop er fyldt med hitpotentiale og fængende melodier. ”Indian Summer” har allerede spredt sin tunghjertede sødme i radioens sendeflader. Sangen er lidt af et signaturnummer for nordmændene, der ynder at give koncert iført indianerudsmykning.

Ingrid Helene Håvik er med sin karakteristiske sitar i front en nordisk stjerne både som vokalist og frontkvinde.

Highasakite har den rette blanding af sukker og syre i deres musik til at stige langt op mod himmelrummet.

Label: Riot Factory / EMI

description.uk:
The bright voice of Danish alt rockers Figurines is breaking new ground. On Før Vi Blev Lette Christian Hjelm sings in Danish and writes catchy songs with the same ease as he creates crooked guitar rock with his more internationally oriented band. The debut album is full of effortless pop tunes and has both won him new fans as well as calmed the old ones. Christian Hjelm has bravely chosen to travel down a different route. He already deserves to be mentioned alongside other Danish song writers such as Nikolaj Nørlund, Peter Sommer and Jens Unmack.

Label: Playground
description.dk:
Den lyse og lette stemme fra Figurines har åbnet for en ny dimension af sit talent. På Før Vi Blev Lette springer Christian Hjelm ud som dansksproget sanger og viser, at han på egen hånd kan skrive nyklassiske sange på modersmålet med samme lethed, som han laver skæv guitarrock med sit mere internationalt orienterede band. Debutpladen er fyldt med simpelt glidende popkvad, der ubesværet har kapret både nye fans og beroliget de gamle. Christian Hjelm har lavet en modig nyorientering og fremstår allerede som en nationalskjald, der er værd at nævne i sammenhæng med eksempelvis Nikolaj Nørlund, Peter Sommer og Jens Unmack.

Label: Playground

related.name: MARIE KEY
related.short_description: Airy, Danish-language pop from a sharp pen.

related.name: KAKA
related.short_description: The rising star of Danish dancehall

description.uk:
Marock’n’roll. That's the title of their collection of greatest hits. And it sums up Hoba Hoba Spirit quite well. With journalist and social critic Reda Allali in front, the band has been part of a minor Moroccan music revolution.

Since the band switched on the amplifiers in the late 90s, they have combined rock and the tones of ancient Morocco in a way that has practic allyturned them into a national treasure.

The fearless music collective combine traces of The Clash, Bob Marley and North African gnawa rhythms in their own melodic and accessible music. With its criticism of modern society, Hoba Hoba Spirit could serve as the perfect soundtrack to the Arab Spring.

Label: Hot Lunch / Import
description.dk:
Marock’n Roll, hedder opsamlingspladen med deres største hits. Og det er en god sammenfatning af Hoba Hoba Spirit. Med journalisten og den bredmundede samfundsrevser Reda Allali i front har bandet været del af en mindre marokkansk musikrevolution.

Siden bandet først tændte forstærkerne i slutningen af 90’erne, har de kombineret rock og ældre marokkansk musikkultur, så de næsten er blevet nationalklenodie.

Det frygtløse musikkollektiv blander spor af The Clash, Bob Marley og nordafrikanske gnawa-rytmer i deres melodiøse og tilgængelige musik. Med sin drilske samfundskritik kunne Hoba Hoba Spirit udgøre det perfekte soundtrack til det arabiske forår.

Label: Hot Lunch / Import

description.uk:
House, moody R&B and British dubstep are just some of the elements in Holy Other’s darkened sound that has placed him under the genre banner witch house.

With copy-pasted ghostlike vocals, clicking rimshots and keyboards in minor, the critically-acclaimed British producer paints a picture of a quiet, slow sunrise over the hometown of Manchester.

But in the middle of the semidarkness and the grey-blue tones, Holy Other also presents a beauty – a perfect soundtrack for silent, euphoric walks in empty streets at night.

Label: Tri Angle / import
description.dk:
House, mut R&B og britisk dubstep er blot nogle af de elementer i Holy Others formørkede lyd, der har placeret ham under genrebanneret witch house.

Med copy-pastede spøgelsesvokaler, klikkende kantslag og keyboards i mol sætter den britiske producer og kritikerkæledægge en scene af en lydløs, pinsomt langsommelig solopgang over hjembyen Manchester.

Men midt i halvmørket og de gråblå toner fremmaler Holy Other også en enorm skønhed, et perfekt soundtrack til tavst euforiske vandringer i menneskeforladte nattegader.

Label: Tri Angle / import

related.name: ANDY STOTT
related.short_description: Atmospheric electronica with a heavy bass

related.name: JAMES BLAKE
related.short_description: Electronic R&B with pounding human heart

description.uk:
With a great ear for golden melodies, Ice Cream Cathedral move self-assuredly in the air-thin part of the atmosphere. On their first album The Drowsy Kingdom the Copenhagen trio has found their own niche between synthesizers, nostalgic retro pop and warm streams of new age, drawing an independent line like the vapor trail from an aeroplane on a clear blue sky. Anja T. Lahrman’s crystal clear vocals secure the human presence in a music electrically charged with sadness and dream.

Label: Oh! My
description.dk:
Med deres første album The Drowsy Kingdom har den københavnske trio Ice Cream Cathedral fundet rette hylde mellem synthesizers, nostalgisk retropop og varme strømme af new age-vellyd, hvor de trækker en selvstændig linje efter sig som kondensstriben fra et fly på en skyfri himmel. Anja T. Lahrmans krystalklare vokal sikrer nærværet i en musik, der ellers er elektrisk ladet med vemod og drøm.

Label: Oh! My

related.name: MARIE KEY
related.short_description: Airy, Danish-language pop from a sharp pen.

related.name: HIGHASAKITE
related.short_description: Alternative pop in full war paint

related.name: ELOQ
related.short_description: Gritty beats from Copenhagen sound chief

related.name: COMPADRE
related.short_description: Club music with Middle Eastern shade

description.uk:
With pure punk attitude and powerful live shows Iceage have become the first row of "new way of Danish fuck you” while enjoying considerable international interest. Their second album, You’re Nothing, proves their nihilism and pessimism to be fully intact. At the same time they have increased not only the icy coldness but also the experiments in their tamed explosion of (post) punk and hardcore. Their despairing mayhem pounds and scorns against everything, everybody, all of it, in an aggressive ice storm. Iceage are certainly angry and full of young disillusion, yet also possess a certain charming devil-may-care that only true talents get away with.

Label: Escho
description.dk:
Med uforfalsket punkattitude og slagkraftige sceneshows er Iceage blevet forreste led i bølgen "new way of Danish fuck you" og oplever kraftig international interesse. Deres andet album You're Nothing beviser intakt nihillisme og pessimisme, samtidig har de skruet yderligere op for både frysekulden og eksperimenterne i deres tæmmede eksplosion af (post)punk og hardcore. Deres fortvivlede smadder hamrer og glammer løs mod alting, alt og alle i en sønderknusende isstorm af aggression. Vredt, fuld af ung disillusion, men også med en sjusket og charmerende fandenivoldskhed, som kun sande talenter slipper godt af sted med.

Label: Escho

related.name: PISSED JEANS
related.short_description: Hardcore punk for your inner Neanderthal

related.name: CHELSEA LIGHT MOVING
related.short_description: Noise rock with legendary lead singer

description.uk:
When the light singing voice of Indians was announced for Roskilde Festival 2012, this new project was shrouded in secrecy. In 2013 things look very different.

The solo project of Søren Løkke Juul is now an international success signed with iconic record label 4AD. Influential music media such as NME and Pitchfork praise the Dane’s debut record Somewhere Else.

With a broad palette, the versatile musician creates weightless pop, combining acoustic folk with psychedelic electronica and atmospheric soundscapes.

Label: 4AD / Playground
description.dk:
Da den lyse sangstemme fra Indians blev offentliggjort til Roskilde Festival 2012, var han stadig en velbevaret hemmelighed. I 2013 er situationen anderledes.

Søren Løkke Juuls soloprojekt er lige nu en international succes med pladekontrakt hos det ikoniske pladeselskab 4AD. Toneangivende medier som NME og Pitchfork roser danskerens debutplade Somewhere Else.

Med en bred palet skaber den danske multiinstrumentalist vægtløs pop, der kombinerer akustisk folk med psykedelisk electronica og atmosfæremættede lydflader.

Label: 4AD / Playground

related.name: CHELSEA LIGHT MOVING
related.short_description: Noise rock with legendary lead singer

80.artistName: INGRID feat. LYKKE LI, PETER BJORN AND JOHN, MIIKE SNOW, COCO, J. ÅHLUND and GUESTS

description.uk: Over loads of black coffe, an impressive sample of Sweden’s most successful pop acts decided to take music matters in their own hands. The label and collective Ingrid became the result. And although Lykke Li, Peter Bjorn And John, Miike Snow, American sidekick Coco Morier and Jocke Åhlund certainly deliver on their own they have unfurled an umbrella together allowing new ideas, songs and whims to blossom. So far, Ingrid have only made highly selected club shows. For Roskilde Festival they are creating an unique music event, packed with surprises and visual delights. The line-up will take the stage as one large band and treat us with both fresh compositions and well-known hits served in new ways.
description.dk: Over en masse sort kaffe besluttede en række af Sveriges mest succesfulde popmusikere at tage musikken i egen hånd. Pladeselskabet og kollektivet Ingrid blev resultatet. Og selvom Lykke Li, Peter Bjorn And John, Miike Snow, kollektivets amerikanske indslag Coco Morier og Jocke Åhlund har leveret varen under egne navne, har de nu slået en paraply op, hvorunder de kan lade helt nye indfald blomstre. Ingrid har kun lavet enkelte shows før på mindre klubscener. Til Roskilde Festival har de skabt en enestående musikbegivenhed, der bliver pakket med overraskelser og visuel sanseforkælelse. Opstillingen vil gå på scenen som ét samlet band og divertere med både friske kompositioner og velkendte hits serveret på helt nye måder.

description.uk:
Do robots and androids go to nightclubs sometime in the future? If they do, they might dance, sweat petrol and kiss each other to music reminiscent of Jam City.

With the debut album Classical Curves, the young London producer Jack Latham has created a piece of electronic futurism. Filled with zigzagging melody samples, distorted forms and shattered glass. Somewhere inside the shining chrome you find a wreckage of soul, house, techno and pop.

But Latham reinvents, mutates and transforms it all as if Gyro Gearloose were let loose behind a mixing console. Get ready to dance as if it were 2099.

Label: Night Slugs / import
description.dk:
Går robotter og androider på natklub engang i fremtiden? Hvis de gør, vil de måske danse, svede benzin og score hinanden til musik, der minder lidt om Jam City.

Med debutalbummet Classical Curves har den unge London-producer Jack Latham skabt et stykke elektronisk futurisme af højeste karat. Fyldt med zigzaggende melodistumper, forvredne former og splintret glas. Et sted nede i det blinkende krom rumsterer vragdele af soul, house, techno og pop.

Men Latham genopfinder, muterer og omdanner som en anden Georg Gearløs sluppet løs bag en mikserpult. Gør dig klar til at danse, som var det 2099.

Label: Night Slugs / import

82.text: Young hip hop hope from Brooklyn

description.uk:
He is very young, has only just celebrated his 18th birthday. But Joey Bada$$ is a New York rapper on fire.

He is part of Pro Era, a young group of hip hoppers who seems to have a well-developed love for A Tribe Called Quest, Nas and Wu-Tang Clan.

This crew may be New York's equivalent of Los Angeles' Odd Future, and Joey Bada$$ is one of the Brooklyn collective's most noted members. Please welcome one of the fresh voices.
description.dk:
Han er purung, har kun akkurat fejret sin 18 års fødselsdag. Men Joey Bada$$ er en New York-rapper med ild i turbinerne.

Han er del af Pro Era, en ung gruppe hiphoppere der efter alt at dømme har en veludviklet kærlighed til A Tribe Called Quest, Nas og Wu-Tang Clan.

Dette crew kan blive New Yorks pendant til Los Angeles’ Odd Future, og Joey Bada$$ er en af Brooklyn-kollektivets mest bemærkede medlemmer. Tag godt imod en af de helt friske.

related.name: KENDRICK LAMAR
related.short_description: The new hip hop king of the West Coast

description.uk:
Anders Rask, front man and singer of Kadie Elder, has a background in folk music, but Kadie Elder finds the young Dane’s bursting with electricity and crackling power. This is clear on the band’s first single “Widen Rift”, introducing an electronic pop full of lush production and ingenious detail. Join Kadie Elder from the very beginning.

Label: 20Thirteen
description.dk:
Kadie Elders sanger og frontmand Anders Rask har en baggrund i folkemusikken, men med Kadie Elder løber der pludselig elektroder og knitrende strøm gennem århusianerens sange. Det er tydeligt på bandets første single ”Widen Rift”, der med sin køligt indbydende produktion og sindrige detaljer burde tiltale alle yndere af elektronisk pop. Vær med fra begyndelsen.

Label: 20Thirteen

related.short_description: Airy, Danish-language pop from a sharp pen.

related.name: MARTIN RYUM
related.short_description: Classical 60s poetry in fresh musical clothes

related.name: HIGHASAKITE
related.short_description: Alternative pop in full war paint

84.text: The rising star of Danish dancehall

description.uk:
Danish dancehall is undergoing a boost of Babylonian proportions. Please welcome the genre’s rising star: Kaka. His flow mood has placed him squarely in the centre of the rasta-coloured map of Denmark. Songs like ”Dansk Dancehall” has placed Kaka in the front lines ready to make summer smiles and funky dance moves appear everywhere. With Kaka at the helm the genre looks set for a long life of Jamaican riddims and Copenhagen-esque one-liners.

Label: Donkey Recs
description.dk:
Dansk dancehall nyder et boost af babylonske dimensioner. Tag godt imod genrens gulddreng Kaka, hvis flow og humør har fået ham ind centralt på det rastafarvede danmarkskort. Med sange som ”Dansk Dancehall” har Kaka nu stillet sig i forreste geled, hvor han er klar til at bringe sommersmilet frem over hele krydderen og helt ned i danseskoene. Med Kaka ved roret står genren til et langt liv fyldt med jamaicanske riddims og ærkekøbenhavnske oneliners.

Label: Donkey Recs

related.name: MARIE KEY
related.short_description: Airy, Danish-language pop from a sharp pen.

85.text: Hip hop with loads of humour and humanism

description.uk:
A Hindu and a Muslim, Chirag Patel and Magdi Ytreeide, two very untraditional Norwegians of different heritage than European have really seized the day. Karpe Diem are more or less national heros, in the eyes of all who wish for a tolerant and benevolent Norway. The two guys play festive pop and straight forward hip hop with Nordic phrases and sympathetic views combined with large amounts of humour. The duo has produced a long line of hit singles like it was oil from the underground. Even on stage these two guys are already a kind of veterans despite the fact that they are only around 30 years old.

Label: Sony Music Norway / Import
description.dk:
En hindu og en muslim, Chirag Patel og Magdi Ytreeide, to meget forskellige nordmænd af anden oprindelse end europæisk, har i dén grad grebet dagen. Karpe Diem er nærmest blevet folkehelte hos alle, der ønsker et tolerant og næstekærligt Norge. De to spiller festlig, poppet og ligetil hiphop, som med sine nordiske gloser, sympatiske udsyn og rigelige mængder humor er yderst skandinavisk. Makkerparret har i lang tid rystet hitsingler ud af ærmet, som var det olie fra undergrunden. Også på scenekanten er de to gutter allerede en slags veteraner på trods af, at de kun er omkring de 30.

Label: Sony Music Norway / Import

86.text: Deep house from the rear edge of the universe

description.uk: With Kenton Slash Demon, Jonas Kenton and Silas Moldenhawer (who are also part of When Saints Go Machine) live out their penchant for especially house, techno and pitch-black disco. This is club music meant for dancing but the sounds are often also as inscrutable and deep as a night sky full of stars. Kenton Slash Demon have been well on their way for a long time and without much fuss the duo is finding an audience both on the wormholes of the internet as well as the dance floor. Expect a DJ set that will take you to the rear end of the universe.
description.dk: Med Kenton Slash Demon udlever Jonas Kenton og Silas Moldenhawer – den ene halvdel af When Saints Go Machine – deres forkærlighed for især house, techno og begsort disco. Klubmusik man kan danse til, men som ligeledes er mere uudgrundelig end en stjernerig nattehimmel. Kenton Slash Demon har ulmet sagte længe og har uden fægtende armbevægelser vundet indpas både i internettets ormehuller og på dansegulvet. Forvent et dj-sæt, der vil tage dig til universets bagkant.

related.name: ELOQ
related.short_description: Gritty beats from Copenhagen sound chief

87.text: Airy, Danish-language pop from a sharp pen.

description.uk:
With the tongue in her cheek and a dose of genuine poetry mixed in her pen, Marie Key has established herself as one of the most original songwriters and lyricists in Denmark. On stage she also knows how to balance tears and laughter on a knife-edge.

Her first albums had a predominantly acoustic expression. On the last two albums, she has developed a more electronic sound that has catapulted the curly head towards the pink universe of pop and the radio.

Marie Key is a refreshing and different acquaintance. Both when she dives into simple and heavy themes.

Label: Sony Music
description.dk:
Med tungen i kinden og en dosis ægte poesi blandet i sin pen har Marie Key etableret sig som en af tidens mest originale sangskrivere og tekstforfattere. Også live kan hun balancere tårer og latter på en knivsæg.

Hendes første plader havde et overvejende akustisk udtryk. På hendes sidste to af slagsen har hun i fællesskab med Andreas ”Maskinen” Sommer udviklet en mere elektronisk lyd, der har katapulteret krøltoppen ind i poppen og radiobølgernes lyserøde univers. Her er hun et forfriskende og anderledes bekendtskab. Både når hun dyrker det jordnære og det alvorstunge.

Label: Sony Music

description.uk:
He is a jester wearing several caps: Away from his turntables Kid Koala moonlights as a graphic novelist and designer. Ask any music nerd, though, and his trademark will forever be his virtuoso skills at the record players: He uses his turntables as a melodic instrument, bending a single long note under the needle at different speeds, thus creating a seasick, psychedelic and jazzy sound all of his own. On his latest record, 12 Bit Blues, Kid Koala puts blues music under the needle, but this guy can take any genre and dip it in his own luminous paintbox.

Label: Ninja Tune / VME
description.dk:
Han er en spilopmager med mange kasketter og har også væk fra sine turntables en karriere som tegneserieforfatter og grafiker. For musiktosser er Kid Koalas varemærke dog hans virtuose brug af pladespilleren: Han bruger sine turntables som et melodisk instrument, hvor en enkelt, lang node trækkes under nålen i forskellige hastigheder, og resultatet bliver søsygt, psykedelisk og jazzet. På sin seneste skive, 12 Bit Blues, var det bluesmusikken, som kom under nålen, og i forlængelse af denne skive indtager Kid Koala Roskilde Festival med sit ekstravagante vinyl vaudeville 2.0 show, fyldt med både kostumer, dansere og robotter.

Label: Ninja Tune / VME

description.uk:
R.A.P. Music, the title of Killer Mike’s most recent and best album, is, tellingly enough, short for ’Rebellious African People’s Music’. Working with Brooklyn magus El-P, Killer Mike has sharpened his attack and made a meteor-like hip hop record. His politically charged hip hop universe is shivering with tongue-sharp rap, sparkling attitude and futuristic beats. Dirty south hip hop with a touch of alternative New York. Killer Mike’s status as inspired protest hip hopper in the tradition of Public Enemy has never been as lethally strong as right now.

Label: Grind Time Official / Import
description.dk:
R.A.P. Music, titlen på Killer Mikes nyeste og bedste album, står sigende nok for ’Rebellious African People’s Music’. I samarbejde med Brooklyn-troldmanden El-P har Killer Mike hvæsset sine kløer og skabt en komet af en hiphopplade. Killer Mikes politisk ladede hiphopunivers er spændt med tungeskarp rap, gnistrende attitude og futuristiske beats. Sydstatshiphop med et strejf af det alternative New York. Killer Mikes status som inspireret protesthiphopper i traditionen fra Public Enemy har aldrig stået så dolkeskarpt som lige nu.

Label: Grind Time Official / Import

related.name: KENDRICK LAMAR
related.short_description: The new hip hop king of the West Coast

related.name: JOEY BADA$$
related.short_description: Young hip hop hope from Brooklyn

description.uk:
Straightforward rock’n’roll is Kyle Thomas’ true calling despite duties in a series of very different bands. This productive slacker writes laidback garage rock tunes shining like a Cadillac; these songs will make you forget about ever feeling older than 17. All the tunes are written, sung and served with an attitude that incarnates 60es and 70es melodic golden age of rock. Prepare for a dose of rock from a major talent, who’s obviously head over heels in love with the genre.

Label: Sub Pop / Target
description.dk:
Ligefrem rock’n’roll er Kyle Thomas’ sande kald trods talrige tjanser i en stribe vidt forskellige bands. Den produktive slacker skriver tilbagelænede garagerocksange, der blinker som et nylakeret dollargrin og får én til at føle, man indeni alligevel aldrig bliver ældre end 17. Skrevet, sunget og serveret med en attitude som om det at ramme 60’er/70’er-rockens melodiske guldåre bare er et spørgsmål om at samle trommestikker, guitar og bas op og komme i gang. Glæd dig til en rockdosis lige i mellemgulvet fra et stortalent, der tydeligvis er smaskforelsket i genren.

Label: Sub Pop / Target

description.uk:
Balkan and Eastern Europe is more than hectic, high-speed wedding music. Kottarashky & The Rain Dogs take us to the cosmopol of Sofia as of right now.

Kottarashky broke through with the laptop-based Opa Hey! With the backing band The Rain Dogs he wanted to introduce a more organic approach.

The dexterous orchestra serves a chilled brew of East European folk music, dub, funk and soul, and Aleksandar Dobrev’s clarinet secures nerve, verve and beauty in the laid-back movements.

Kottarashky & The Rain Dogs is music with a slow pulse, like drifting through modern Sofia on a summer day.

Label: Asphalt Tango / Import
description.dk:
Balkan og Østeuropa er mere end febrilsk bryllupsmusik i højeste puls. Kottarashky & the Rain Dogs tager os en tur med til storbyen Sofia anno lige nu.

Kottarashky slog bredt igennem med den laptopbaserede Opa Hey!, men har med sine musikanter i The Rain Dogs udvidet med fuldt liveband.

Det velspillende orkester serverer en chillet, kosmopolitisk blanding af østeuropæisk folkemusik, dub, funk og soul, og Aleksandar Dobrevs klarinetspil sikrer nerve, nærvær og skønhed i de tilbagelænede satser.

Kottarashky & the Rain Dogs er musik, der overvejende holder hvilepulsen – som at slentre gennem det moderne Sofia på en sommerdag.

Label: Asphalt Tango / Import

related.name: COMPADRE
related.short_description: Club music with Middle Eastern shade

related.name: HIGHASAKITE
related.short_description: Alternative pop in full war paint

related.name: GEOMUNGO FACTORY
related.short_description: Groovy sitar music with ancient origins

related.name: KENTON SLASH DEMON
related.short_description: Deep house from the rear edge of the universe

92.text: Pioneers of electro do unique 3D show

description.uk:
Imagining electronic music without Kraftwerk is practically impossible. The legends from Düsseldorf were the first modern band to use electronic instruments solely.

The seminal band created the soundtrack for our computer world and were the inspiration for a wide range of musical genres such as electro, synthpop and techno.

Kraftwerk return to Roskilde Festival with their extraordinary 3D show, which has carried away London’s Tate Modern as well.

Roskilde Festival hands out glasses to the audience, securing a visual space age feeling worthy of the future-minded computer sounds.

Label: Astralwerks / EMI
description.dk:
Det er nærmest umuligt at forestille sig elektronisk musik i nogen form uden Kraftwerk. Legenderne fra Düsseldorf var det første moderne band, som udelukkende benyttede elektroniske instrumenter.

De skabte så at sige soundtracket til vores computerverden og udgjorde inspirationsgrundlaget for en række af musikgenrer såsom electro, synthpop og techno.

Kraftwerk vender tilbage til Roskilde Festival med deres særlige 3D-show, som også har vakt begejstring på bl.a. Londons Tate Modern.

Roskilde Festival deler briller ud til publikum, så alle er sikret en visuel rumalderfornemmelse, der matcher den fremsynede datamatmusik.

Label: Astralwerks / EMI

description.uk: Krar is the name of a kind of lyre, an Ethiopian descent of string instrument said to have been played even way back in ancient Egypt. Despite the long ancestry, the aged instrument has never sounded as it does in the hands of Krar Collective. With a bucketful of electricity vocalist and virtuoso Temesegen Tareken make the strings light up and spark in your ears. He is backed up by Genet Asefa and Amare who enrich the hypnotic string tones with song, dance, exclamations of joy, hand claps and highly physical drumming. The music of Krar Collective collects parts of its sound in the traditional, religious ceremonies of Ethiopia, still you sense from the rocking, even funky, pulse that the trio is currently residing in London.
description.dk: Krar er navnet på en slags lyre, en etiopisk familie af strengeinstrumenter, der efter sigende har rejst gennem historien helt fra det gamle Egypten. Den lange stamtavle til trods har det ældgamle instrument aldrig lydt, som det gør hos Krar Collective. Med en spandfuld elektricitet får vokalist og strengemester Temesegen Tareken strengene til at lyne og slå gnister i ørerne. Han er flankeret af Genet Asefa og Amare, som sammen beriger de hypnotiske strengetoner med sang, dans, glædesudråb, håndklap og yderst kropslige trommer. Krar Collectives musik henter dele af sin lyd i Etiopiens traditionelle, religiøse fejringer, samtidig mærker man på den rockede, nærmest funky puls, at trioen i dag er bosat i London.

related.name: GEOMUNGO FACTORY
related.short_description: Groovy sitar music with ancient origins

description.uk:
Thrash metal acts as a source of eternal youth for several of the genre's classic bands. Just look at Kreator, German metal kings who after more than 30 years into their career still makes the stage boil.

Since the early 80s, the Germans have been spitting out albums that have enrolled their sound in the genre's DNA. The last one is the Phantom Antichrist from 2012, showing a band in self-assured great shape.

All of you that just at one time or another have considered long hair or denim vest: come and test your endurance of thrash metal of the old school, stuffed to overflowing with sublime riffs, blistering guitar solos and sprinting drums.

Label: Sony
description.dk:
Thrash metal virker som en kilde til evig ungdom for flere af genrens klassiske bands. Bare kig på Kreator, germanske metalkonger der mere end 30 år inde i deres karriere stadig får scenerne til at koge.

Siden begyndelsen af 80’erne har tyskerne spyttet albums ud, der har indskrevet deres sound i genrens DNA. Det seneste af slagsen er Phantom Antichrist fra 2012, der viser et band i selvsikker storform.

Alle jer, der bare på et eller andet tidspunkt har overvejet langt hår eller denimvest: Kom en tur under riven med en omgang thrash metal af den gamle skole, stoppet til bristepunktet med sublime riffs, lynende guitarsoloer og spurtende trommer.

Label: Sony

description.uk:
Kris Kristofferson has an impressive catalogue that includes some of country music’s best known songs, and an influence on other musicians that places him among the titans of American music. Armed with nothing more than a guitar, harmonica and plenty of personal grit, the silver-haired multi-artist plays authentic country with a taste of bourbon, Nashville and stories about his own life’s ups and downs. Kris Kristofferson’s latest album, Feeling Mortal, is packed with songs of mortality and hard-earned wisdom, and according to many, the latest work of the former boxer and US Army Captain with the poetic pen is among the best of his career. Get ready to meet one of the greatest at Roskilde Festival.

Label: KK / Cosmos Music
description.dk:
Med knap 30 albums og et utroligt liv på bagen er Kris Kristoffersons seneste udgivelse gennemsyret af dødelighed. Countrymusikken lever dog i bedste velgående. Og genren havde ikke lydt, som den gør, uden denne amerikaners poetiske sangskrivning. Bevæbnet med guitar og mundharpe spiller veteranen rustik country, der emmer af bourbon, Nashville og levet liv. Stemmen er tæret og forreven, men også hårdfør og mere slidstærk end det mest hærdede læder. Kris Kristoffersons sangkatalog og indflydelse giver ham en plads i musikkens Mount Rushmore ved siden af eksempelvis Willie Nelson, Johnny Cash og Hank Williams.

Label: KK / Cosmos Music

96.text: Metallic hardcore punk with humour and hooks

description.uk:
The Norwegians tighten the grip. Kvelertak has made the international audience gasp for air with their blend of hardcore punk, black metal and erection-inducing garage rock.

Even though the lyrics about fimbulwinter, mead and bloodlust are sung in a true Stavanger dialect, the international audience has really taken the band to heart. Kvelertak adds a shot of humour and more straightforward rock to the sinister Norway.

With a new album on the way from Kvelertak, the weather forecast reports a musical thunderstorm over Northern Europe, which will make everything go black – even in the back rows.

Label: Indie Recordings / import
description.dk:
Nordmændene strammer grebet. Kvelertak har skabt iltmangel hos det internationale publikum med deres blanding af hardcorepunk, black metal og erektionsstruttende garagerock.

Selvom teksterne om fimbulvinter, mjød og blodtørst synges på ægte Stavanger-dialekt, har også det internationale publikum i dén grad taget bandet til sig. Kvelertak tilfører det dystre Norge et skud humor og mere ligefrem rock.

Med en ny plade undervejs fra Kvelertak står barometeret på en musikalsk tordenstorm over Nordeuropa, der vil få blikket til at sortne selv på de bagerste rækker.

Label: Indie Recordings / import

related.name: THE SWORD
related.short_description: Classic hard rock with muscular riffs

97.text: Punk rock with a mechanical heart

description.uk:
How trashy and whacked-out can you play electronic rock? Using German favorites like Kraftwerk and Neu! as starting points, K-X-P take the formula even further.

On their second album the band has intensified the punk intensity, still the German-sounding mechanics rummages persistently underneath the bulldozer beats of the Finns.

Their live shows are journeys into a black maelstrom where the music’s malignant and industrial gravity emerges clearly like black smoke against the summer sky.

Label: Melodic / Import
description.dk:
Hvor skramlet og udknaldet kan man lave sin elektroniske rock? Med udgangspunkt i forbilleder som Kraftwerk og Neu! lykkes det K-X-P at skubbe yderligere til grænserne.

På deres andet album har bandet skruet op for punkfornemmelsen, samtidig med at den tyskinspirerede mekanik rumsterer ihærdigt neden under finnernes bulldozerbeats.

Finnernes liveshows er intense rejser ind i en sort malstrøm, hvor K-X-Ps nærmest ondsindede og industrielle tyngde står klart frem som kulsort røg op mod sommerhimmelen.

Label: Melodic / Import

related.name: CHELSEA LIGHT MOVING
related.short_description: Noise rock with legendary lead singer

related.name: GOAT
related.short_description: Funky trance rock with an African flavour

98.text: The new hip hop king of the West Coast

description.uk:
After promising run-ups, Kendrick Lamar has now made the leap into the list of grand hip hop acts. good kid, m.A.A. d. city is recognised as the work of a major artist and already considered a bona fide masterpiece.

And the Nordic audience has already witnessed how he masters his craft in a live setting as well, laidback, with superior improvisations and vintage hip hop magic oozing from each syllable and stanza.

Kendrick Lamar has given classic hip hop a major comeback. Mr. “ya bishhh” raps about his family and the streets, leaving hip hop lovers with a sweet itch in the soul reminiscent of yesteryear’s West Coast hip hop majesties.

Label: Interscope / Universal
description.dk:
Efter lovende tilløb er Kendrick Lamar sprunget lige ind i hiphoppens kongerække. Med good kid, m.A.A.d. city har rapperen fra Compton signeret et mesterværk.

Og han har allerede bevist for det nordiske publikum, at han kan levere varen live – tilbagelænet, overlegent improviserende og med vintage hiphopmagi gemt i næsten hver stavelse og strofe.

Kendrick Lamar har givet den klassiske hiphop en kæmpe genrejsning. Mr. ”ya bishhh” rapper overrumplende om sin familie og gaderne, så det klør lækkert i sjælen på enhver, der nogensinde har lagt øre til vestkystens hiphopmajestæter.

Label: Interscope / Universal

related.name: JOEY BADA$$
related.short_description: Young hip hop hope from Brooklyn

related.name: MIGUEL
related.short_description: The new golden boy of R&B

description.uk:
Quarantine, Laurel Halo’s breakthrough, is a work with enough pitfalls, loops and textures to become record of the year with the musical gourmets at The Wire magazine. On this album, she abducted dance music and took it somewhere altogether new. When Laurel Halo takes the stage, she does so with a more pumping show. Here you recognise the Brooklyn producer’s techno and dance foundation more strongly. At the same time, her set is sure to reveal her flair for experimentation and claustrophobia.

Label: Hyperdub / Import
description.dk:
Quarantine, Laurel Halos gennembrud, var et værk tætpakket med så mange faldgruber, loops og teksturer, at den blev årets plade i 2012 hos finsmagerne fra musikbladet The Wire. Her bortførte hun den maskinelle dansemusik og tog den helt nye steder hen. Når Laurel Halo indtager scenen sker det med et mere pumpende show. Her kommer den Brooklyn-bosatte amerikaners ståsted i techno og dance tydeligere frem, samtidig fornægter produceren og sangerindens tæft for det eksperimenterende og klaustrofobiske sig næppe.

Label: Hyperdub / Import

related.name: ANDY STOTT
related.short_description: Atmospheric electronica with a heavy bass

description.uk:
Maybe Oslo is actually the Paris of the North?

Ulrik Denizou Lund and Ketil Jansen founded Lemâitre in 2010. Judging from their electro-acoustic instrumentation and warm disco feeling, they aim to become the Norwegian equivalent to French acts such as Justice, Phoenix and Daft Punk.

And from California to Lithuania, people have noticed the two childhood friends. The international audience will surely continue dancing when Lemâitre this year release another ep of organic electro beats, called Relativity 3.

Label: Sony Music
description.dk:
Måske er Oslo faktisk nordens Paris?

Ulrik Denizou Lund og Ketil Jansen dannede Lemâitre i 2010. Med deres elektroakustiske instrumentering og varme discofornemmelse går de tydeligvis efter at skabe en norsk opdatering af franskmændene Justice, Phoenix og Daft Punk.

Og hele vejen fra Californien til Litauen har man hurtigt fået øje på de to barndomsvenner. Med den kommende ep Relativity 3 kommer det internationale publikum fortsat til at danse med på Lemâitres organiske electrobeats.

Label: Sony Music

101.text: Guitar wizard with a spectacular resume

description.uk:
Playing gigs with Leonard Cohen, Crosby & Co., Dolly Parton and not least Jackson Browne and Warren Zevon has made David Lindley a legend among musicians. The roguish American virtuoso and collector of instruments has had a remarkable solo career on the sideline. In the late 60s he formed Kaleidoscope, which is easily described as the first western world music band in history. Today this unique character combines rock, reggae and much more in his own crooked mixture – played on an arsenal of string instruments collected since the very beginning of his more than 45 year long career.

Label:
description.dk:
Med spilletjanser for Leonard Cohen, Crosby & Co., Dolly Parton og, ikke mindst, Jackson Browne og Warren Zevon er David Lindley en legende blandt udøvende musikere. Sideløbende har den amerikanske virtuos, lurifaks og instrumentsamler haft en bemærkelsesværdig karriere på egen hånd. I slutningen af 60’erne dannede han bandet Kaleidoscope, der meget vel kan anses som historiens første vestlige verdensmusikband. I dag kombinerer denne ener rock, reggae og meget mere i sin egen vindskæve blanding – spillet på et helt arsenal af strengeinstrumenter, som han har samlet siden begyndelsen af sin mere end 45 år lange karriere.

Label:

102.text: Grime hip hop a la Copenhagen

description.uk:
The legendary American critic Robert Christgau described Linkoban’s flow as better than that of many native English speakers. The great praise was but a single voice in the chorus of enthusiasm after her concert at Pavilion Junior last year. Linkoban hails from Copenhagen but her music and the edgy performance simultaneously reeks of London, New York, Tokyo and Singapore. Cheap rave synths, ghetto beats and the atmosphere of Japanese horror movies walk hand in hand when Linkoban gives us the sound of grime in the 10s: Equal parts horror, dancehall and radioactive pop.

Label: Superbillion / Playground
description.dk:
Den amerikanske kritikerlegende Robert Christgau har omtalt Linkobans flow som bedre end mange engelskfødtes. Den store anmelder var blot én af mange, som var begejstret efter hendes koncert på Pavilion Junior sidste år. Linkoban har København som hjemstavn, men hendes musik og kantede performance emmer af London, New York, Tokyo og Singapore på én gang. Billige ravesynths, ghettobeats og japansk skrækfilmsatmosfære går hånd i hånd, når Linkoban viser, hvordan grime-hiphop skal lyde i 10’erne: lige dele horror, dancehall og radioaktiv pop.

Label: Superbillion / Playground

related.name: ELOQ
related.short_description: Gritty beats from Copenhagen sound chief

related.name: KAKA
related.short_description: The rising star of Danish dancehall

related.name: MARIE KEY
related.short_description: Airy, Danish-language pop from a sharp pen.

related.name: KENTON SLASH DEMON
related.short_description: Deep house from the rear edge of the universe

description.uk:
”It was almost annoying how good they were.” The words come from punk brothers Iceage after witnessing Lower’s first gig.

With their discordant and hostile postpunk, Lower are one of the most promising names on Copenhagen’s underground punk scene.

Depressive, even desperate the music may be. But Lower are also part of a very uplifting chapter in the tale of Danish punk.

Label: Escho
description.dk:
”Det var næsten irriterende, at de kunne være så gode”. Ordene er sagt om Lower af punkbrødrene Iceage efter at have hørt dem til en koncert.

Med deres dissonante og fjendtlige postpunk er Lower et af de mest lovende navne på Københavns undergrundspunkscene – der i virkeligheden blot tæller tre håndfulde drenge, som hærger guitar, bas, stemmebånd og trommer på kryds og tværs i forskellige bands.

Depressiv, ja desperat er musikken måske, men Lower er en central del af et yderst opløftende kapitel inden for dansk punk.

Label: Escho

related.name: PISSED JEANS
related.short_description: Hardcore punk for your inner Neanderthal

104.text: Stamp-and-clap folk rock from shooting stars

description.uk:
At some concerts singing along and bursting out in excitement seem just natural. This is the case in the company of The Lumineers.

Their stomp-and-clap folk rock is conquering the world at the moment. And it's no surprise that Marcus of Mumford & Sons hailed The Lumineers a personal favourite.

The band's self-titled debut was released last year and has along with a number of life-affirming concerts turned into a shooting star, not least due to their love ode "Ho Hey".

Front man Wesley Schultz' voice has a soulful sound that will take you from tragedies to swinging in the chandeliers.

The Lumineers is a band that should be playing in a small living room. The demand brings a need for a more spacious stage but no matter what, the intimacy of the music will surely fill the space underneath the tent canvas.

Label: Decca / Universal
description.dk:
Nogle koncerter kalder på sing-alongs og begejstringsråb. Sådan er det i selskab med The Lumineers.

De leverer tramp-og-klap-folkrock, som går sin sejrsgang verden over for tiden. Man forstår godt, hvorfor Marcus fra Mumford & Sons har kaldt The Lumineers for en personlig favorit.

Bandets selvbetitlede debut udkom sidste år og har sammen med en række livsbekræftende koncerter skudt dem op på stjernehimlen, ikke mindst takket være kærlighedsoden "Ho Hey".

Frontmand Wesley Schultz synger med en sjælfuld klang, der kan starte i en tragedie for så at svinge sig i lysekronen, når bandet spiller op til fest.

The Lumineers burde allerhelst spille i en lille dagligstue. Efterspørgslen kræver dog en større scene, og musikkens intimitet skal uanset hvad nok fylde rummet under teltdugen ud.

Label: Decca / Universal

description.uk:
The partners who run Maskinen are close to achieving royal status in Sweden – not only because they crossed swords with the royal family on the platinum selling single ”Krossa alla fönster”. Their mixture of bass, rap, rave, baile funk and pop has turned the Swedish party sensation into a national treasure – their Wu Tang-like logo has even become a favourite tattoo template among the beautiful Swedish people. Now Maskinen is rolling across Øresund: The two boys are ready to prove why their name is written in capital letters on Swedish festival posters.

Label: Pope / Import
description.dk:
Makkerparret, der driver Maskinen, er tæt på at opnå royal status i Sverige – og det er ikke kun fordi, de har lagt sig ud med kongehuset på den platinsælgende single ”Krossa alla fönster”. Med deres blanding af bas, rap, rave, baile funk og pop er den svenske festsensation blevet folkeeje – deres Wu Tang-agtige logo er ligefrem blevet yndet tatoveringsmotiv blandt det smukke folk. Nu ruller Maskinen over sundet: De to gutter står klar til at bevise, hvorfor de på svenske festivalplakater bliver skrevet med allerstørste bogstaver.

Label: Pope / Import

description.uk:
The sextet of Meridian Brothers do avantgarde pop from another dimension. The foundation is Latin and tropical rhythms from their homeland.

In a bubbling witch's brew of sunshine and madness, band leader Eblis Álvarez takes us into his vision of Latin America.

The crooked sounds are made out of lounge-like organs, seasick rhythms and steel brass. Latin king Tito Puente would recognise some of the tones – avant-garde pirates such as The Residents would recognise others, as would nutty composers such as Karlheinz Stockhausen.

A semi-bizarre blend you will discover to be surprisingly addictive.

Label: Soundway / Import
description.dk:
Sekstetten Meridian Brothers spiller avantgardepop fra en anden dimension. Udgangspunktet er hjemlandets latin og tropiske rytmer.

I et boblende heksebryg af solskin og galskab tager bandleder og lurifaks Eblis Álvarez os med ind i sin vision af Latinamerika.

De løjerlige lyde består især af loungeagtige orgler, søsyge rytmer og struttende stålblæsere. Latinkongen Tito Puente ville nikke genkendende til visse af tonerne – det samme ville avantgardepirater som The Residents og smågale komponister som Karlheinz Stockhausen.

Et halvbizart blandingsprodukt, der er overraskende vanedannende.

Label: Soundway / Import

107.text: Thrash giants roll over the Orange Stage.

description.uk:
The undisputed metal giants have not played Roskilde Festival since 2003.

This year Metallica take over the Orange Stage with some of rock’s most durable riffs and songs.

James, Lars, Kirk and Robert take a break from the recording of their next album to play Roskilde Festival – their only European concert this summer!

With their muscular, fiery and melodic thrash, they are absolute rulers of their genre. At the same time, a series of hits have made them idols to an extent unheard of among most of their riff-loving peers.

Label: Blackened / Universal
description.dk:
Metalgiganterne over dem alle har ikke spillet Roskilde Festival siden 2003.

I år tvinger Metallica Orange Scene i knæ igen med nogle af den tunge rocks mest slidstærke riffs og centrale sange.

James, Lars, Kirk og Robert tager en pause fra indspilningen af deres næste plade for at spille på Roskilde Festival – deres eneste europæiske koncert denne sommer!

Med deres muskuløse, iltre og melodiøse thrash står de som genrens absolutte kongenavn. Samtidig har de med en hel stribe hits vundet det brede publikums hjerte i et omfang, som er de færreste af deres riff-glade våbenbrødre forundt.

Label: Blackened / Universal

description.uk:
Ever feel a longing for really dirty and gritty guitar rock? Metz have been listening to your prayers. The Canadian trio is inspired by the most ear-bleeding guitar rock of the 90es. Since 2007 they have been refining their mayhem and finally in 2012 the selftitled debut record was ready. Metz, of course, is released on Sub Pop, legendary, original home of Nirvana. Catchy earworms or pop bangers are not Metz’ main concern. Instead, they aim to shake their audience through by the joy-inducing friction from guitars, bass and drums.

Label: Sub Pop / Target
description.dk:
Savner du din guitarrock beskidt, smadret og brysk? Metz har hørt dine bønner. Den canadiske trio er inspireret af 90’ernes mest øreblødende guitarrock. Siden 2007 har de raffineret deres smadder, som endelig er fæstnet i fast form i 2012 med en selvbetitlet debutplade. Metz er naturligvis udkommet på legendariske Sub Pop, oprindeligt hjemsted for Nirvana. Catchy ørehængere eller pophits er ikke øverste prioritet hos Metz. Mød i stedet op for at blive rusket rundt af tre drenge med en kæmpe forkærlighed for den lykkebringende og hylende friktion, kun guitar, bas og trommer kan skabe.

Label: Sub Pop / Target

related.name: CHELSEA LIGHT MOVING
related.short_description: Noise rock with legendary lead singer

related.name: PISSED JEANS
related.short_description: Hardcore punk for your inner Neanderthal

related.name: GOAT
related.short_description: Funky trance rock with an African flavour

109.text: The new golden boy of R&B

description.uk:
Miguel is a central part of the encouraging boost R&B is currently going through. The genre has been high jacked from glittery music videos and given back its soul and heart. Miguel is a womanizer and sexy MF with a weakness for female thighs and cleavage. At the same time he is a progressive musical mind who clearly wishes to continue the tradition of Marvin Gaye and Prince; complete with psychedelic rock arrangements and soulful song writing. The wonder boy Miguel commands a full package of stage presence, sex appeal and snappy dance moves. Prepare to be seduced.

Label: RCA / Sony Music
description.dk:
Miguel er en central del af det opmuntrende boost, som R&B oplever lige nu. Genren er blevet kapret fra de glinsende musikvideoer og har fået sjæl og hjerte tilbage. Miguel er en trussetyv og sexy MF med svaghed for kvindelår og kavalergang. Samtidig er han også et progressivt musikalsk gemyt, der tydeligvis ønsker at videreføre genren i traditionen fra Marvin Gaye og Prince, med alt hvad dertil hører af psykedeliske, rockagtige arrangementer og besjælet sangskrivning. Vidunderdrengen Miguel råder over hele pakken med sin sceneudstråling, sexappel og skarpe dansetrin. Bered dig på at blive forført.

Label: RCA / Sony Music

related.name: KENDRICK LAMAR
related.short_description: The new hip hop king of the West Coast

description.uk:
Zimbabwe’s maybe greatest music export right now is charming an international audience with their uplifting songs. Mokoomba, fronted by Mathias Muzaza's lush voice, were raised in the small village of Victoria Falls as a part of the Tonga minority.

Countries such as Zambia, Angolo and South Africa were never that far away, though. Maybe here we find the explanation for their brew of Southern, African traditions, filled to the brim with swaying hips, hand claps and festive brass. With the language and rhythms of their own minority as a starting point, they even add funk, pop and Latin rhythms.

The end result is dance music with universal appeal, almost certain to leave listeners happy and with a nice suntan.

Label: Zig Zag World / Import
description.dk:
Zimbabwes måske bedste musikeksport lige nu charmerer et internationalt publikum med deres opløftende sange. Mokoomba, med vidunderstemmen Mathias Muzaza i centrum, er vokset op i landsbyen Victoria Falls som del af tonga-mindretallet.

Lande som Zambia, Angola og Sydafrika har dog aldrig ligget langt væk. Også derfor er deres musik som et helt koncentrat af sydlige, afrikanske traditioner – fyldt med svaj i hoften, håndklap og festlige messingblæsere. Med deres egen minoritets sprog og rytmer som udgangspunkt smider de tilmed funk, pop og latin-rytmer oven på.

Resultatet er en dansemusik, der har universel appel, og som man næsten bliver solbrændt af blot at lægge øre til.

Label: Zig Zag World / Import

related.name: GEOMUNGO FACTORY
related.short_description: Groovy sitar music with ancient origins

description.uk:
Using the violin as its spinning fulcrum, Mother Lewinsky creates a different pop imprint full of cheeky ambushes and surprising twists.

The three masterminds behind this grand live orchestra all play in other bands – Tako Lako, Mescalin, Baby and Surf in Stereo – but use Mother Lewinsky as a playground where they can explore the potential in using strings to create a delicious pop sound.

Alternative rock and classical music have been enjoying a serious flirt for a while now. Mother Lewinsky is a superior Danish example of a band marrying up these two genres to create something bigger than the sum of its parts.
description.dk:
Med violinen som omdrejningspunkt ønsker Mother Lewinsky at skabe en anderledes popmusik fyldt med benspænd og overraskelser.

De tre hjerner bag det store live-orkester spiller i andre bands – Tako Lako; Mescalin, Baby og Surf in Stereo – men de ser Mother Lewinsky som en oplagt mulighed for at udforske strygernes potentiale og samtidig skabe laber pop.

Alternativ rock og klassisk musik flirter med hinanden som aldrig før i denne tid. Mother Lewinsky er et af de bedste danske eksempler på denne spændende udvikling.

related.name: COMPADRE
related.short_description: Club music with Middle Eastern shade

related.name: ELOQ
related.short_description: Gritty beats from Copenhagen sound chief

related.name: MARIE KEY
related.short_description: Airy, Danish-language pop from a sharp pen.

related.name: MARTIN RYUM
related.short_description: Classical 60s poetry in fresh musical clothes

related.name: HIGHASAKITE
related.short_description: Alternative pop in full war paint

description.uk:
My Bubba describe their songs as lullabies from the countryside. And though many of the catchy tracks have the same wooden colours as for instance First Aid Kit there is more than just forest soil under the feet of the Swede and the Icelander. ”Fuck The Pain Away” by the electro provocateur Peaches is among My Bubba’s favourite tracks to cover. Using acoustic guitar, harp and banjo the two girls deliver concerts full of surprises, humour and delightful, acoustic folk.

Label: Fake Diamond
description.dk:
Vuggeviser fra landet, kalder My Bubba selv deres sange. Og selvom mange af de iørefaldende numre har de samme træfarver som hos eksempelvis First Aid Kit, er her også andet end ren skovmuld under svenskerens og islændingens fødder. ”Fuck The Pain Away” af electro-provoen Peaches er blandt My Bubbas foretrukne covernumre, med akustisk guitar, harpe og banjo giver de to piger koncerter rige på overraskelser, humor og underskøn akustisk folk.

Label: Fake Diamond

description.uk: Michael David Quattlebaum Jr. attacks mainstream culture wearing full make-up and takes the stage as ’teenage female rapper’ Mykki Blanco. Being a flamboyant transvestite rapper, he angers anyone who sees hip hop as a bastion for “real men”. On a bed of dirty electronica, Mykki Blanco offers a tour into the (very) alternative night life. A provocative show which aims to sabotage the differences between man and woman, theater and reality, punk and hip hop.
description.dk: Michael David Quattlebaum Jr. går lige i struben på normalkulturen, når han ifører sig fuld krigsmaling og indtager scenen som ’teenage female rapper’ Mykki Blanco. Som flamboyant transvestitrapper er han en rød satinklud i ansigtet på enhver, der ser hiphoppen som mandfolkenes sikre bastion. På en bund af beskidt electronica tilbyder Mykki Blanco et blik ind i en alternativ nattelivskultur. Et provokerende show, der saboterer forskellene mellem mand og kvinde, teater og virkelighed, punk og hiphop.

related.name: AZEALIA BANKS
related.short_description: The hip hop queen of the Internet

description.uk:
The international music world is picking up on how to write Danish letter Ø. This is largely due to MØ, Denmark’s most sparkling meteor of 2013. During no time, she has sneaked herself onto the global arena, which has met her with loving arms like a new Grimes or Lykke Li. Despite the virginal artist name (‘mø’ is an Old Norse word for a woman unwed), Karen Marie Ørsted is no fragile violet. Her glamouros pop songs have an urban, gritty attitude, and MØ is able to use her lush voice for rapping as well as singing.

Label: Sony Music
description.dk:
Den internationale musikverden er i gang med at lære, hvordan man skriver bogstavet Ø. Det skyldes især MØ, dansk musiks mest gnistrende komet i 2013. På kort tid har hun med største selvfølge smyget sig ind på den globale arena, hvor hun er blevet modtaget med åbne arme som en ny Grimes eller Lykke Li. Trods det jomfruelige kunstnernavn er Karen Marie Ørsted ikke nogen bly viol: Hendes glamourøse popsange har en asfaltsnavset attitude, og MØ kan skifte hurtigt fra skønsang til beskidt rap.

Label: Sony Music

description.uk:
When The National did Roskilde Festival in 2007, their emotional and mournful rock was still a well-kept secret among the chosen few. Their stock kept going up after this concert and a mutual, loving relationship between Denmark and the Brooklyn-based band emerged.

In 2013 they take Roskilde Festival with a brand new record, Trouble Will Find Me, in their backpack – several prior works, like Boxer and Alligator, are already considered contemporary classics.

The National know how to depict modern life at its most despairing. Baritone Matt Berninger is a lyricist and singer who bears comparison to the likes of Leonard Cohen and Morrissey.

Label: 4AD / Playground
description.dk:
Da The National spillede på Roskilde Festival i 2007, var deres mutte barytonrock stadig en velbevaret hemmelighed for de få. Herefter steg deres aktie betydeligt i de efterfølgende år og et gensidigt kærlighedsforhold mellem Danmark og Brooklyn-bandet opstod. I 2013 indtager de Roskilde Festival med en spritny plade, Trouble Will Find Me, i rygsækken – flere af deres tidligere albums, som Boxer og Alligator, er allerede nyklassikere. The National er mestre i at skildre det moderne livs mere fortvivlede stunder. Og den mørkrøstede Matt Berninger er en lyriker og sanger, som tåler sammenligning med Leonard Cohen og Morrissey.

Label: 4AD / Playground

related.name: JAMES BLAKE
related.short_description: Electronic R&B with pounding human heart

description.uk:
Playing ambitious chamber rock, Navneløs (Danish for nameless) visit classical music, post rock and jazz without ever quite settling down. At one point the music is minimalistic. Suddenly pompous. Soon, often, breathtakingly beautiful. With cello, piano, steel brass, noisy guitars and the strong vocals of Lin Rosenbeck, Navneløs beautifully evade the tyranny of categories.

Label: Indieaner
description.dk:
I en ambitiøs kammerrock kommer Navneløs omkring klassisk, postrock og jazz uden at mærke den store trang til at slå sig tungt ned et enkelt sted. Det ene øjeblik er musikken minimalistisk. Pludselig pompøs. Snart – ofte – bjergtagende smuk. Med cello, klaver, messingblæsere, støjende guitarer og Lin Rosenbecks karakterfulde vokal i spidsen er Navneløs på en smuk, ung flugt fra kategoriernes tyranni.

Label: Indieaner

description.uk:
The Japanese dark lord Keiji Haino has joined forces with the Australian Oren Ambarchi and the American Stephen O'Malley who has previously shrouded Roskilde in darkness with Sunn O))).

Don’t expect a sunnier performance this time.

Nazoranai takes you on a trip far into a mind where madness is screaming and the darkness is unending. Haino’s guitar sounds as if it were stringed with barbed wire, and his madman vocals contribute to the nightmare.

With extremely long song titles and songs that never want to end, you are taken into a darkness blacker than the Roskilde night.

Label: Ideological Organ / Import
description.dk:
Den japanske mørkemester Keiji Haino har slået pjalterne sammen med australske Oren Ambarchi og amerikanske Stephen O'Malley, som tidligere har spredt buldermørke på Roskilde med de kutteklædte Sunn O))).
