Forvent ikke en mere solbeskinnet forestilling denne gang.

Nazoranai tager dig med på tur ind i sindets krinkelkroge, hvor vanviddet skriger, og mørket aldrig hører op. Hainos guitar lyder som strenget op med pigtråd, og hans vanvidsvokal bidrager til mareridtet.

Med afsindigt lange sangtitler og sange, der aldrig ønsker at ende, føres du ind i et mørke, der er sortere end Roskilde-natten.

Label: Ideological Organ / Import

118.text: Dynamic DJ trio with party skills

description.uk:
DJ and producer trio Nonsens has put the sunny, Danish island of Bornholm on the neon-blinking map. The guys get the party going and set your adrenaline ablaze with a poisonous green mix of rave, electro, hip hop and trap.

With bad-ass beats, freaky remixes, and pitched, brash synths, Nonsens have true sound anarchy and pure party vibes written in their agenda.
description.dk:
Dj- og producertrioen Nonsens har på kort tid fået solskinsøen Bornholm på det neonblinkende landkort. Gutterne får festen til at bølge og din indre adrenalin til at lyse skriggrønt i en overrumplende blanding af rave, electro, hiphop og trap.

Med sine bad-ass beats, udsyrede remix og pitchede, pågående synths er Nonsens sikre feststartere, klar til at sætte dagsordenen med en omgang ægte bornholmsk lydanarki.

description.uk: The Nubian tribes originally lived in Egypt and the Sudan close to their beloved river; the Nile. The famous body of water is the heart, pulse and soul in Nubanour’s music. Using their special tambourine-like frame drums as the core, the white-clad ensemble sings about the joys and sorrows of their people. Unfortunately the latter takes up most of the repertoire. The music of Nubanour has a droning, chant-like quality rooted in centuries of ordeal. In their groovy and captivating music, clapping and dance we encounter an exiled people yearning to return to the well of their origin.
description.dk: Det nubiske naturfolk var oprindeligt bosat i Egypten og Sudan omkring deres elskede Nil. Den berømte flod er hjertet, pulsen og sjælen også i Nubanours musik. Med deres særlige tamburinagtige rammetrommer som midtpunkt besynger det hvidsvøbte kollektiv sit folks sorger og glæder. Desværre er der mest af det første. Nubanours musik har en sørgmodigt messende klang, som udspringer af et hårdt prøvet folks århundrede lange historie. Med groovy og besættende musik, klap og dans møder vi et overset folk, der i dag lever i eksil, tørstende efter deres oprindelige kildeudspring.

120.artistName: NUMBERS feat. RUSTIE, JACKMASTER, ONEMAN, SPENCER, DEADBOY, REDINHO and SOPHIE
120.text: The best electronic sounds from Glasgow and beyond

description.uk:
The lads behind Numbers started their careers with a club in a basement under an Indian restaurant outside of Glasgow. They were too young to attend clubs themselves.

Today they are important figures. Numbers is a fusion of three influential Glasgow labels. No genre barriers are present here.

On this Roskilde tour de force we get techno, electro, hip hop, UK funky, dubstep - you name it. Numbers and their entourage attack the dogmas of electronic music in an irreverent manner. Still, you sense a strong veneration towards classics such as Daft Punk and Model 500.

Label: Numbers / Import
description.dk:
Drengene bag Numbers indledte karrieren med at lave deres egen klub i en kælder under en indisk restaurant uden for Glasgow. De var endnu for unge til selv at gå på klub.

I dag sætter de dagsordenen sammen. Numbers er en sammensmeltning af tre toneangivende Glasgow-labels. Her er ingen genrerestriktioner.

På denne Roskilde-tour de force kommer vi godt rundt i techno, electro, hiphop, UK funky, dubstep - you name it. Numbers og deres opbud af hotte navne er præget af en respektløs tilgang til den elektroniske musiks dogmer. Samtidig mærker man en stor kærlighed til genrens klassikere som Daft Punk og Model 500.

Label: Numbers / Import

description.uk:
Of Monsters And Men's grandly orchestrated folk pop is loaded with hands-in-the-air joy of life, clapping of hands and wonderful sound of horns, and it has fallen right into the grace of an international audience.

The five man collective of multi-instrumentalists fills the space of the stage with a feeling of community, which is the perfect match for the joyous crowd at a festival in the summer.

The voices of Nanna Bryndís Hilmarsdóttirs and Ragnar “Raggi” Þórhallssons suit each other beautifully and with their dark nature poetry they create an unmistakably Icelandic feel. Of course, the Icelanders already consider Of Monsters And Men a national treasure.

Label: Universal Republic / Import
description.dk:
Of Monsters And Men er gået rent ind hos et internationalt publikum med deres stort orkestrerede folkpop fyldt med hænderne-i-vejret livsglæde, håndklap og truttende blæsere.

Det fem mand store kollektiv af multiinstrumentalister fylder scenerummet med en følelse af samhørighed, som er skabt til den glade menneskeflok på en sommerfestival.

Nanna Bryndís Hilmarsdóttirs og Ragnar “Raggi” Þórhallssons stemmer klæder hinanden fænomenalt og sammen med bandets mørke naturpoesi, skaber de en umiskendeligt islandsk fornemmelse. Of Monsters And Men er da også for længst blevet decideret folkeeje i hjemlandet.

Label: Universal Republic / Import

related.name: THE LUMINEERS
related.short_description: Stamp-and-clap folk rock from shooting stars

122.text: London bass devoid of firm genre labels

description.uk:
British dj and producer Jim Coles thrives on the tangled landscape of electronic music. Genre labels only supply a vague contour here. The bass music of Om Unit draws on sources such as dubstep, instrumental hip hop and jungle. The latter was the take-off back in the beginning when Coles got into electronic music as a teenager. Today, he also runs his own record label called Cosmic Bridge. Om Unit is placed on first row among innovators of London’s bass-heavy beats.

Label: Civil Music / Import
description.dk:
Den britiske dj og producer Jim Coles stortrives i den elektroniske musiks brogede landskab, hvor genrebetegnelser kun bidrager til et stiplet omrids. Om Units basmusik trækker på bl.a. dubstep, instrumental hiphop og jungle. Sidstnævnte 90’er-lyd var udgangspunktet, da Coles som teenager kastede sig over den elektroniske musik. I dag har han også sit eget pladeselskab ved navn Cosmic Bridge. Om Unit er helt oppe foran blandt navnene, der anviser fremtiden for Londons bastunge, spraglede beats.

Label: Civil Music / Import

description.uk:
Mario Galeano from Colombia and Will Holland from Great Britain have gathered a regular dream team to explore the tropical sounds of Colombian music. The sun-drenched mixture is full of accordion, saxophone, congas and piano. Younger musicians add elements of dub and hip hop while some of the most skilled players from Latin music’s 70es heyday are playing as well. The South African folk music of cumbia is central in the mix, but other styles from the same region are present as well. This party is full of warm vibes, aimed at both your ears and dancing shoes.

Label: Soundway / Import
description.dk:
Colombianske Mario Galeano og britiske Will Holland har samlet et regulært drømmehold, som udforsker og hylder den colombianske tropemusik. Det solbeskinnede opkog er fyldt med harmonikaer, sax, congas og klaver. Med adskillige yngre kræfter om bord fanger Ondatrópica nutidens og fremtidens puls med elementer af dub og hiphop, samtidig er nogle af genrens tunge drenge fra 70’ernes guldalder også inde over. Den sydamerikanske folkemusik cumbia er udgangspunktet, men langt fra eneste fællesnævner, når Ondatrópica skaber lune vibes både for øret og danseskoene.

Label: Soundway / Import

124.artistName: ORGI-E / KLAMFYR feat. F1RSTEHOLDET & OPA OPA ORKESTAR

description.uk:
One of Danish hip hop’s grand womanisers is back at Roskilde.

Orgi-E AKA Klamfyr is a proud son of Copenhagen’s slummy suburbia and also a member of acclaimed Danish rap trio Suspekt.

The dirty-mouthed rapper continues on his own in the same vein with X-rated hip hop balanced with moments of catchy pop.

The Danish rap idol brings brand-new super group F1rsteholdet as well as the Balkan brass band Opa Opa Orkestar.
description.dk:
Singlepikken indtager Roskilde! Dansk hiphops største trussetyv kan meget vel være Orgi-E.

Udgangspunktet er Københavns mytiske Vestegn, hvor andelen af stammetatoveringer, silikonebryster og amatørpornoskuespillere overskrider landsgennemsnittet med flere længder.

Det stolte bysbarn og Suspekt-medlem har på solopladen Klamfyr fortsat traditionen fra sit gamle band med masser af hård, dansksproget hiphop, der konstant veksler mellem stådreng, satire, sortsyn og sukkerpop.

Med sig på Roskilde Festival har Orgi-E den spritnye supergruppe F1rsteholdet og balkanblæserne Opa Opa Orkestar.

description.uk:
Stavanger in western Norway spits out a steady, black stream of metal bands.

Attention has grown around Overthrow, especially after the debut album Adjust to Darkness saw the light of day. Their sonic punch-in-the-stomach has triggered positive comparisons to Converge, Cancer Bats and, of course, the other darkened fellow townsmen in Kvelertak.

With an aggressive mix of metal, hardcore punk and genuine rock'n'roll, Overthrow makes your blood boil and your muscles flex.

Label: Indie Recordings / import
description.dk:
Stavanger i det vestlige Norge spytter metalbands ud i en lind, sort strøm.

Især efter at debutpladen Adjust to Darkness så dagens lys, er opmærksomheden vokset omkring Overthrow. Deres soniske mavepumpere har udløst positive sammenligninger med Converge, Cancer Bats og naturligvis de andre formørkede bysbørn i Kvelertak.

Med en aggressiv blanding af metal, hardcorepunk og regulær rock’n’roll får Overthrow blodet til at bulderkoge og musklerne til at dirre.

Label: Indie Recordings / import

related.name: KVELERTAK
related.short_description: Metallic hardcore punk with humour and hooks

description.uk:
”The Fall meets Neil Young.“ This is the bizarre way Parquet Courts at one point described their own sound. With a neat mixture of punk and indie rock from both sides of the Atlantic, the New York-based band has waltzed from the obscure underground into the spotlight among 2013’s hottest newcomers. These fellas have their own sloppy way of playing crumpled guitar rock. With itchy guitars and febrile vocal rants inspired by Heaven-knows-what-or-who, Parquet Courts may very well end up as idols among music lovers with a penchant for the permanently crooked.

Label: What's Your Rupture? / Import
description.dk:
”The Fall møder Neil Young”. På denne bizarre, men tillokkende måde har Parquet Courts på et tidspunkt beskrevet deres egen lyd. Med en net dosering af punk og indierock fra begge sider af Atlanten har Parquet Courts valset lige fra den obskure undergrund og ind blandt 2013's hotteste opkomlinge. Gutterne har en charmerende skødesløs tilgang til deres bulede guitarrock. Med kradsende guitarer og febrilske snakkevokaler inspireret af Himlen-må-vide-hvad-eller-hvem har Parquet Courts alle kort på hånden til at blive idoler for musikfans med hang til det kronisk skæve.

Label: What's Your Rupture? / Import

related.name: CHELSEA LIGHT MOVING
related.short_description: Noise rock with legendary lead singer

related.name: PISSED JEANS
related.short_description: Hardcore punk for your inner Neanderthal

related.name: JOHN GRANT
related.short_description: Brutally heartbreaking songs with an electronic touch

description.uk:
Pink noise: A fitting description of Pinkunoizu. An experimenting, wild and exotic sound coated in the sugar of melody as opposed to the grating white noise. Inspirations and references flutter like a malfunctioning compass: A moment in a lounge in Japan is followed by mass in a Catholic monastery which in turn is followed by a trip down a mosquito-infested, African river. This delirious mash of post punk, pop, jazz and krautrock has won the Danes recognition beyond national borders. Pinkunoizu: A nutritional form of candyfloss you actually want to consume.

Label: Full Time Hobby
description.dk:
Lyserød støj: en god beskrivelse af Pinkunoizu. Den er eksperimenterende, vilter og eksotisk, men også betrukket med melodisk sukker modsat den rigtigt øresønderrivende hvide støj. Inspirationskilderne og referencerne blafrer som et defekt kompas: Det ene øjeblik er vi i en japansk lounge, pludselig er vi til messe i et munkekloster, snart er vi på en afrikansk flod fyldt med summende malariamyg. Det deliristiske opkog af postpunk, pop, jazz og krautrock har vundet danskerne en international anerkendelse, der overstiger den lokale af slagsen. Pinkunoizu: den særlige form for nærende candyfloss man faktisk har lyst til at indtage.

Label: Full Time Hobby

128.text: Hardcore punk for your inner Neanderthal

description.uk:
Sometimes the internal Neanderthal makes a sound. Pissed Jeans is an embittered, annoyed punk band who seemingly were put in the world to please the dissatisfied cave dweller with a copious amount of angry, noisy hardcore punk. Look forward to some cleansing war music played by a bunch of everyday people, who know what it feels like to be standing in the rush hour train going home from a dead end job with a full bladder and empty stomach. Using crushing riffs and ritualistic destruction these Americans almost succeed in making it beautiful to be among those, who always seem to pick the slow line in the supermarket.

Label: Sub Pop / Target
description.dk:
Nogle gange giver den indre neandertaler lyd fra sig. Pissed Jeans er et indigneret, irriteret punkband, der virker sat i verden til at dokumentere den indre, utilfredsstillede hulemand i en omgang larmende vred hardcorepunk. Glæd dig til en udrensende krigsmusik spillet af en gruppe hverdagsmennesker, der kender til at stå i myldretidstoget på vej hjem fra blindgydejobbet med fyldt blære og rumlende mave. Med knusende riffs og rituel smadder får amerikanerne næsten gjort det til en smuk ting at være blandt dem, der evigt og altid vælger den langsomme kø i Netto.

Label: Sub Pop / Target

related.name: CHELSEA LIGHT MOVING
related.short_description: Noise rock with legendary lead singer

description.uk:
With a heart laden with melancholy memories of summer Postiljonen aim their sights at yours. The Swedish/Norwegian trio deal with azure dream pop – the air thick with evaporated water from the Mediterranean and dreams of love as fragile as soap bubbles. Postiljonen skillfully tickle the eternally nostalgic summer-centre of our hearts using soothing synthesizers, 80s-like productions and vocals wrapped in effects and fog.

Label: Hybris / Import
description.dk:
Med hjertet tungt af vemodige sommerminder styrer Postiljonen lige mod dit. Den svensk/norske trio gør sig i en azurblå drømmepop, hvor luften er tyk af fordampet middelhavssaltvand og sæbebobleskrøbelige kærlighedsdrømme. Postiljonen er dygtige til at kildre det evigt sommernostalgiske center i hjertet ved hjælp af dulmende synthesizers, 80’er-agtige produktioner og vokaler indpakket i effekter og tåge.

Label: Hybris / Import

description.uk:
They sing in their strange mother tongue. Still, Pää Kii are living the punk philosophy better than many of their English peers.

Despite lacking a rehearsal room, they have been nominated for a Nordic Music Prize for their energetic and fast-selling debut album.

Pää Kii – Finnish for shut up – is straightforward punk in the vein of the genre’s 70s heyday. Devoid of detours of any kind. The rocking and rolling punk songs make you want to wear a Ramones leather jacket and take Finnish 101.

Label: Stupido / import
description.dk:
De synger på deres fremmedartede modersmål. Ikke desto mindre har Pää Kii bedre kontakt med punkfilosofien end mange af deres engelsksprogede våbenbrødre.

Et øvelokale har de ikke. Alligevel har de formået at blive nomineret til en Nordic Music Prize for deres energiske og hurtigtsælgende debutplade.

Pää Kii – finsk for hold kæft – er ligefrem punk i stilen fra slutningen af 70’erne. Kemisk renset for svinkeærinder. De rock’n’rollede punkviser udløser kraftig trang til at eje en Ramones-læderjakke og tage finsk på aftenskolekursus.

Label: Stupido / import

description.uk:
”I was raised on breast milk and Sade”. The quote is from Quadron singer Coco O. Sure enough the Danish duo are born with a flair for the creation of sexy satin soul and R&B. With a crisp and delicate sound, the other half of Quadron, producer and multi-instrumentalist Robin Hannibal, is currently among the strongest and most successful producers and arrangers in Scandinavia. Prince and Adele have already pronounced themselves among Quadron’s fans. The Danes are ready with a new album and are moving towards a more up-tempo version of the soft tones.

Label: Epic
description.dk:
”Jeg voksede op på brystmælk og Sade” siger Quadrons sangerinde Coco O. Og den danske duo har sandelig også medfødt flair for at skrive satinsexet soul og R&B. Quadrons anden halvdel, producer og multiinstrumentalist Robin Hannibal, er snildt at regne for en af Nordens stærkeste og mest succesfulde producere og arrangører lige nu med sin sprøde og delikate lyd. Prince og Adele har allerede tonet rent flag som fans af Quadron, danskerne har en ny plade på trapperne og varsler en mere optempo retning for de bløde toner.

Label: Epic

related.name: MARIE KEY
related.short_description: Airy, Danish-language pop from a sharp pen.

description.uk:
2013 will clearly be a new landmark year for Queens of the Stone Age. Fans have longed for new material from these sought-after stone agers since 2007 – incidentally the same year they last visited Roskilde Festival.

Brand new, hard rocking album … Like Clockwork is finally here, fully determined to “hold the horrible, lick the lunacy” according to front man Josh Homme himself.

Queens of the Stone Age’s psychedelic heavy rock reeks of both cactus acid, sex and petrol. At the same time they have conquered the airwaves with hits that have made the Neolithic gang one of the most beloved rock groups of the 21st century.

Label: Rekords Rekords / import
description.dk:
2013 bliver tydeligvis et nyt mærkeår for Queens of the Stone Age. Fans har sukket efter ny lyd fra disse højtvibrerende fortidslevn siden 2007 – i øvrigt samme år de sidst gæstede Roskilde Festival.

Det spritnye, kampsvedige rockalbum … Like Clockwork er lige udkommet.

Queens of the Stone Ages psykedeliske tungrock hørmer af både kaktussyre, sex og benzin. Samtidig har de kapret radiobølgerne med hits, der har gjort stenalderbanden til et af det 21. århundredes mest elskede rockgrupper.

Label: Rekords Rekords / import

related.name: BLACK REBEL MOTORCYCLE CLUB
related.short_description: Noisy rock’n’roll in sunglasses and leather jacket

related.name: THE SWORD
related.short_description: Classic hard rock with muscular riffs

related.name: KVELERTAK
related.short_description: Metallic hardcore punk with humour and hooks

description.uk:
Using piano, acoustic guitar and some cool electronics as stepping-stones Kristina Renée has taken the first steps towards creating a name for herself among lovers of pop music with an element of Nordic soul. She is a singer/songwriter of the melancholic kind. The songs from her first release are melodious, thoughtful and celestial in a way, which makes it difficult to imagine that they were not written in the Arctic regions of the world. Still, she points out in an interview that her coming full-length debut may point in another direction entirely.

Label: Sony Music
description.dk:
Med klaver, akustisk guitar og lidt kølig elektronik som afsæt er Kristina Renée med små, sikre skridt på vej til at fæstne sit navn hos yndere af popmusik med et element af nordisk soul. Hun er en singer/songwriter af den lidt melankolske slags. Sangene på hendes første udspil er melodiøse, tænksomme og med højt til loftet på en facon, hvor det er svært at forestille sig dem skrevet uden for det høje nord. Samtidig pointerer hun i et interview, at hendes kommende debutfuldlængde sagtens kan komme til at pege i en helt anden retning.

Label: Sony Music

description.uk:
Jeppe Lauritzen places his own style somewhere between atmospheric ambient and clubbier sounds. His drowsy electronica is surrounded by distorted voices with edgy rhytms underneath.

Rewolmer is music suited for both daydreaming and introspective dancing. With his EP Error Perfect Rewolmer has captured the attention of blog media both abroad and in his own country. Crackling, synthetic beauty the way it is only produced in the laboratory of electronic music.

Label: SoundEscape
description.dk:
Jeppe Lauritsen placerer selv sin stil et sted mellem den atmosfæriske ambient og den mere klubbede lyd. Hans døsige electronica er omgivet af forvrængede sangstemmer med kantede rytmer nedenunder.

Rewolmer er musik, som både egner sig til stillesiddende dagdrømmeri og indadvendt dans. Med sin EP Error Perfect har Rewolmer skabt opmærksomhed omkring sin personlige lyd både i indland og udland. Knitrende, syntetisk skønhed, som den kun kan opfostres i den elektroniske musiks laboratorium.

Label: SoundEscape

135.text: Super pop star and young diva

description.uk:
Recent years have brought us few pop divas of Rihanna's caliber.

With a frequent stream of albums – a new one, Unapologetic, has just been released – she has planted her stilettos firmly at the top of the game when it comes to R&B, pop and hip hop. Any American rapper with the right ambitions has also sung with the girl with the iconic voice.

Rihanna's charisma, sharp dance moves and long line of hits dominate a show filled with glamour, sex appeal and inescapable choruses.

The birth year is 1988. Nevertheless, Rihanna is already an experienced performer with a bountiful and varied song catalog. Ready to make the whole area in front of the Orange Stage sing and dance along.

Label: Def Jam / Universal
description.dk:
De seneste år har bragt os få popdivaer af Rihannas kaliber.

Med en tæt strøm af albums – et nyt af slagsen, Unapologetic, er lige udkommet – har hun plantet sine stiletter solidt i den øverste dronningeloge inden for R&B, pop og hiphop. Enhver amerikansk rapper med ambitionsniveauet i orden har ligeledes sunget over for pigebarnet med den ikoniske røst.

Rihannas karisma, skarpe dansetrin og lange stribe af klokkeklare hits dominerer et show fyldt med glamour, sexappel og uafrystelige omkvæd.

Fødselsåret lyder 1988. Ikke desto mindre er Rihanna allerede en erfaren performer med et bugnende og varieret sangkatalog. Klar til at få hele pladsen foran Orange Scene til at skråle og danse med.

Label: Def Jam / Universal

related.name: AZEALIA BANKS
related.short_description: The hip hop queen of the Internet

description.uk:
With an arsenal of synths, vocoders and bulging bass lines, Robeat Boys have made the night clubs of Copenhagen sweat profusely, now it’s Roskilde’s turn.

The disco-smitten electro of the two pals will put a smile on your face and make your heart beat faster. Any notion of standing still is under pressure while this droid duo is serving its sexy beats and infectious vocal melodies.
description.dk:
Med et arsenal af synths, vocoders og brunstige baslinjer har Robeat Boys fået de københavnske klubber til at kampsvede. Nu er det Roskilde Festivals tur.

De to kammersjukkers disco-smittede electro vil få dit hjerte til at dunke og din mund til at smile. Enhver tilbøjelighed til at stå stille er truet under mødet med droideduoens smækre beats og inficerende vokalmelodier.

137.text: Intelligent and embittered entertainment in the company of hardcore legend

description.uk:
A legendary hardcore singer, actor, pacifist, comedian, and journalist … the list goes on. Henry Rollins has brought his toned physique, wide jawline and hyper active mind to most of the arenas of the world: Older festival guests remember him from Black Flag, the (slightly) younger audience will recall the crossover-hit ”Liar”, some will have seen him in acting parts in Sons of Anarchy and Lost Highway and fans of comedy and spoken word will have laughed during his amazing monologues. At this year’s Roskilde Festival he will give no fewer than four performances in which he will demonstrate his brutal wit and political indignation. Enjoy an intelligent break from the music in the company of a great personality.

Label: 2.13.61 / Import
description.dk:
Legendarisk hardcoreforsanger, skuespiller, pacifist, komiker, journalist, fortsæt selv. Henry Rollins med de store muskler, det brede kæbeparti og den hyperaktive hjerne har betrådt de fleste arenaer: Ældre festivalgæster forbinder ham med Black Flag, de (lidt) yngre husker hans crossover-hit ”Liar”, nogle genkender ham fra roller i Sons of Anarchy og Lost Highway, fans af comedy og spoken word har grint til hans fantastiske monologer. I år optræder han på Roskilde Festival hele fire gange, hvor han vil servere demonstrationer på sit brutale vid og sin politiske indignation. En begavet pause fra musikken i selskab med en stor personlighed.

Label: 2.13.61 / Import

138.text: Classical 60s poetry in fresh musical clothes

description.uk:
The awe-inspiring stanzas of Inger Christensen prompted Martin Ryum to put music to the words of the late poet. The guitarist and singer from the noise rock band Speaker Bite Me comes out of a too long hiatus when he sits dawn at his piano to combine his interpretations of Christensen with songs from his first solo album Uden Garanti. Besides Christensen and her floating words from beyond, the very much alive Signe Høirup Wille-Jørgensen from Speaker Bite Me and Maria Laurette Friis from Tys Tys make up the ensemble.

Label: Auditorium
description.dk:
Inger Christensens virkelighedsforelskede lyrik ansporede Martin Ryum til at sætte musik til den afdøde poets ord. Guitaristen og sangeren fra støjrockbandet Speaker Bite Me bryder en alt for lang tavshed, når han fra sit flygel kombinerer sine Christensen-fortolkninger med sange fra sit første soloalbum Uden Garanti. Det gode kvindelige selskab inkluderer ud over Christensen fra sin lyserøde sky en lyslevende Signe Høirup Wille-Jørgensen fra Speaker Bite Me og ditto Maria Laurette Friis fra Tys Tys.

Label: Auditorium

description.uk:
Savages have won over a hungry audience due to a batch of brutal shows. They are four girls on stage, playing raw post-punk with the same gory bite as Joy Division, Siouxsie and the Banshees and The Birthday Party when they gave birth to the genre.

The black-clad punk sisters have just released their debut album to rave reviews.

With determined ferocity, Savages raise the black flags in 2013.

Label: Pop Noire / Import
description.dk:
Savages har vundet sig et knurrende sultent publikum på grundlag af nogle brutale, vidt omtalte shows. De er fire piger på scenen, der spiller rå postpunk med samme blodige bid i struben, som da Joy Division, Siouxsie and the Banshees og The Birthday Party i sin tid bragte genren til verden.

De sortklædte punksøstre har lige sluppet en anmelderrost debutplade.

Med stålsat voldsomhed lader Savages de sorte flag vaje i 2013.

Label: Pop Noire / Import

related.name: CHELSEA LIGHT MOVING
related.short_description: Noise rock with legendary lead singer

related.name: GOAT
related.short_description: Funky trance rock with an African flavour

related.name: JOHN GRANT
related.short_description: Brutally heartbreaking songs with an electronic touch

related.name: PISSED JEANS
related.short_description: Hardcore punk for your inner Neanderthal

description.uk:
Jonathan Schultz and his acoustic guitar create a vibrant presence in his home recordings using sparkling finger play and gritty, existential nerve. The 18-year-old kid steps on stage with a complete band making his folk-inspired song rise towards the canvas dome above. His music is reminiscent of a young Bob Dylan despite Jonathan Schultz’ claims to be more inspired by R. Kelly.

Label: Cracki / Playground
description.dk:
Med gnistrende fingerspil og hæs, eksistentiel nerve skaber Jonathan Schultz og sin akustiske guitar et levende nærvær på sine hjemmeindspilninger. Den blot 18-årige knægt går ombord på scenen med et helt band, der får hans folk-inspirerede sange til at løfte sig yderligere op mod teltdugen. Hans musik vækker minder om en ung Bob Dylan, efter eget udsagn er Jonathan Schultz dog mest inspireret af R. Kelly.

Label: Cracki / Playground

description.uk:
Sekuoia’s crackling and lingering electronica has already had him signed with acclaimed Berlin label Project: Mooncircle. Sekuoia combines the organic with the electronic in a dreamy meltdown. Dry beats, synth washes and copy/pasted vocals conjure echoes of both dubstep and atmospheric ambient. The painterly soundscapes of the young Dane are equal parts night club after midnight and stalactite cave at dawn.

Label: Project Mooncircle
description.dk:
Sekuoias knitrende og dvælende electronica har allerede fået ham i stalden hos det anerkendte label Project: Mooncircle fra Berlin. Sekuoia kombinerer det organiske og elektroniske i en drømmende sammensmeltning. Kantslag, keyboardflader og skævklippede vokaler rummer ekkoer af både dubstep og atmosfærisk ambient. Den unge københavners malende soundscapes emmer af lige dele natklub efter midnat og drypstenshule ved daggry.

Label: Project Mooncircle

related.name: OM UNIT
related.short_description: London bass devoid of firm genre labels

related.name: KENTON SLASH DEMON
related.short_description: Deep house from the rear edge of the universe

description.uk:
One of the world’s most ethereal and delicate rock bands is finally back at Roskilde Festival – for the first time since 2006.

Sigur Rós find their symphonic future rock in an air-void space, only accessed by astronauts and abstract painters. The unmistakable Icelandic mixture of sad angelic singing, big reverb and profound organ sounds is more delicate than newly fallen snow.

The joy and redemption will even greater when front man Jónsi now and again rocks out on the electric guitar. Sigur Rós – Icelandic for victory rose – have sown something quite unique in the middle of the flower bed of rock music.

Label: XL / Playground
description.dk:
Et af verdensrummets mest æteriske og delikate rockbands er endelig tilbage på Roskilde Festival – for første gang siden 2006.

Sigur Rós henter sin symfoniske fremtidsrock i et lufttomt rum, hvor ellers kun astronauter og abstrakte malere har adgang. Den umiskendeligt islandske blanding af sørgmodig englesang, afgrundsdyb rumklang og højstemte orgeltoner er mere delikat end nyfalden sne.

Fryden og forløsningen bliver således endnu større, når frontmand Jónsi her og der trykker den af på elguitaren. Sigur Rós, islandsk for sejrsrose, har sået noget ganske unikt midt i rockmusikkens blomsterbed.

Label: XL / Playground

description.uk:
Since the beginning of the new millenium, James Ford and Jas Shaw have combined dance-friendly club music, experimental techno and pop bangers featuring celebrities joining in on the chorus.

Simian Mobile Disco used to be a (kind of) rock group called Simian. Gradually, however, the disco version came to rule the show and fill the dance floors. On their latest album, Unpatterns, Simian Mobile Disco have toned down the guest vocalists and serve up a purer distillation of techno, acid house and bass.

It's clear why Simian Mobile Disco have become VIPs merging the best of electronic music capitols such as London, Detroit and Chicago.

Label: Witchita / Target
description.dk:
James Ford og Jas Shaw har siden årtusindeskiftet balanceret på en knivsæg mellem dansevenlig klubmusik, eksperimenterende techno og pophits med kendisser på omkvædet.

Simian Mobile Disco var oprindeligt en (form for) rockgruppe ved navn Simian. Efterhånden kom discoudgaven dog til at overtage showet og fylde dansegulvene. På deres seneste album, Unpatterns, har Simian Mobile Disco skruet ned for gæstevokalisterne og serverer et mere rent destillat af techno, acid house og bas.

Således står det ekstra tydeligt, hvorfor Simian Mobile Disco er blevet højtrespekterede VIP’er, der tager det bedste fra elektroniske musikhovedstæder som London, Detroit og Chicago.

Label: Witchita / Target

related.name: DISCLOSURE
related.short_description: Electronic house duo with an ear for hits

description.uk:
Almost 15 years after their debut album, Slipknot has become one of the world's greatest metal bands – on a par with much older icons. With a series of raging metal albums and unforgettable stage shows, they have conquered the central spot in the bloodstained kings’ court.

The grotesque, masked vigilantes take the audience on a journey to hell’s burning ravines where all members commit themselves 101 % in the service of doom.

In 2013 Slipknot crowns few, chosen festival posters, including Roskilde Festival.

Prepare yourself and your limbs for a cleansing experience stretched to the breaking point with manic horror, tough riffs and surprisingly melodic choruses.

Label: Roadrunner / Warner
description.dk:
Knap 15 år efter deres debut er Slipknot blevet et af klodens mægtigste metalbands på niveau med langt ældre ikoner. Den centrale plads i de blodplettede kongers hof har de oparbejdet både med en række frådende brutale metalplader og uforglemmelige sceneshows.

De groteske, maskerede hævnere tager publikum på en rejse mod helvedes mest brændende slugter, hvor hvert medlem mobiliserer sig selv 101 % i undergangens tjeneste.

I 2013 kroner Slipknot enkelte, udvalgte festivalplakater, herunder Roskilde Festivals.

Bered dig og dine lemmer på en udrensende oplevelse spændt til bristepunktet med manisk rædsel, flående riffs og overraskende melodiske omkvæd.

Label: Roadrunner / Warner

related.name: METALLICA
related.short_description: Thrash giants roll over the Orange Stage.

description.uk: With January 2013 on their birth certificate, So-So Echo is very much a new acquaintance. They declined playing American mastodon festival SXSW to evolve and refine their product. And what a product it is. The Danish trio plays gorgeous, electronic pop oozing chilly elegance. Full of 80s nostalgia and stylish pink, but also an atmosphere of urban lights seen through tears.
description.dk: Med januar 2013 stående på fødselsattesten er So-so Echo et i dén grad spritnyt bekendtskab. De takkede nej tak til den amerikanske branchefestival SXSW for at udvikle og raffinere deres produkt yderligere. Og hvilket produkt. Den danske trio spiller underskøn, elektronisk pop, der afgiver fornemmelsen af kølig elegance og luksuriøse interiører. 80’er-nostalgisk og stilfuldt lakeret pink, men også med en atmosfære af storbyens lys set gennem tårer.

related.name: MARIE KEY
related.short_description: Airy, Danish-language pop from a sharp pen.

related.name: COMPADRE
related.short_description: Club music with Middle Eastern shade

related.name: MARTIN RYUM
related.short_description: Classical 60s poetry in fresh musical clothes

related.name: HIGHASAKITE
related.short_description: Alternative pop in full war paint

related.name: GEOMUNGO FACTORY
related.short_description: Groovy sitar music with ancient origins

description.uk: “I’m an old-school songwriter who happens to love electronic instruments”. This is Sohn’s description of himself. His lonely version of electronica has quickly become a minor sensation on the internet. Unlike many of his pc-based producer colleagues he sings over the edited, often mind-blowingly beautiful productions. It gives the music an intimate, organic and almost R&B- or soul-like feel. Sohn is rapidly becoming one of the hottest names in the equally hot flow of neo-soul and white, moody R&B.
description.dk: ”Jeg er en gammeldags sangskriver, der tilfældigvis elsker elektroniske instrumenter” siger Sohn om sig selv. Hans lidt ensomme electronica er hurtigt blevet en mindre internetsensation. Modsat mange beslægtede, pc-baserede producertyper synger han selv hen over de opklippede, ofte sugende smukke produktioner. Det giver en intim, organisk, nærmest R&B-agtig eller soulet fornemmelse i musikken. Sohn er på vej til at blive et af de hotteste navne inden for den lige så hotte strøm af neosoul og hvid, humørsvingende R&B.

description.uk:
Denmark hasn’t got a black metal rep as large as its Nordic neighbors. Solbrud may alter that fact. With long, atmospheric numbers, the young band creates a world of fabled, mythological darkness you don’t want to leave again at all.

Lead singer Ole Luk’s guttural screaming vocals leave no doubt that this is primitive black metal attacking with the characteristic, choking density. At the same time, there is also a core of melodic beauty in the middle of the mud storm of guitar, bass and drums.

Label: Euphonious / VME
description.dk:
Danmark har ikke et ry for blackmetal på samme måde som de nordiske naboer. Det kan Solbrud hurtigt komme til at ændre på. Med lange og atmosfæriske numre skaber det unge band en verden af sagnomspundet tusmørke, man ikke har lyst til at forlade igen.

Ole Luks gutturale skrigevokal efterlader ingen tvivl om, at det her er primitiv blackmetal med den karakteristiske kvælende tæthed i angrebet. Samtidig er her ligeledes ofte en kim af melodiøs skønhed midt i mudderstormen af guitar, bas og trommer.

Label: Euphonious / VME

description.uk:
An average of 250 live performances a year has earned The Soul Rebels a description as a thoroughly well practised ensemble. Their musical origin is the horn music played at funeral marches in New Orleans and they play a mix between traditional music and soul, funk, jazz and hip-hop. These gentlemen separate from more traditional brass bands by often letting vocals accompany the glistening notes. The Soul Rebels stir the generic gumbo while syncopes sputter, flash and writhe through the sparkle of trombones and tubas. Backed by a socially conscious hip-hop attitude and a wealthy musical tradition this band is ready to give the world a party version of New Orleans.

Label: Rounder / Import
description.dk:
Med et gennemsnit på 250 livekoncerter om året er The Soul Rebels det, man på alle planer kan kalde en velturneret enhed. Udgangspunkt er blæsermusikken fra New Orleans’ begravelsesoptog. Her indgår de traditionelle toner i et kapløb med soul, funk, jazz og hiphop. Herrerne adskiller sig fra mere traditionelle brassbands ved ofte at have vokaler oven på de messingglimtende toner. The Soul Rebels mudrer genrerne til, mens synkoperne sprutter, lyner og vrider sig i mundingen på de blinkende basuner og tubaer. Med samfundsbevidst hiphopattitude og en rig musiktradition i ryggen er orkesteret klar til at vise verden et festligere New Orleans.

Label: Rounder / Import

149.text: Atmospheric electronica with a heavy bass

description.uk:
The bewitched trance of Andy Stott takes you to a room, where every inch is more compact than an atomic bomb. The Brit specializes in dubstep, minimal techno and electronica. Often you can sense the bass more than hear it, the black-hearted beats are mildly worrying but also seemingly beyond gravity like the beautiful gymnast that graces the cover of breakthrough album Luxury Problems. Here, Andy Stott has crafted his most beautiful and approachable epos to date. His ghostly electronica is unreal and aboveground but also, due to the bass, a decidedly physical encounter.

Label: Modern Love / Import
description.dk:
Andy Stotts forheksede trance tager dig med ind i et rum, hvor hver eneste kvadratmillimeter er mere tætpakket end en atombombe. Britens speciale er et ekko af dubstep, minimaltechno og electronica. Bassen kan ofte mere fornemmes end høres, de sorthjertede beats er mildt foruroligende men også sofistikerede og hævede over tyngdekraften på samme måde som den gymnast, der hænger i det tomme rum på forsiden af gennembrudsalbummet Luxury Problems. Her har Andy Stott lavet sit smukkeste og mest tilgængelige epos til dato. Hans spøgelsesagtige electronica klinger uvirkeligt og overjordisk men er samtidig i kraft af bassen en decideret fysisk oplevelse.

Label: Modern Love / Import

description.uk:
Despite keeping in shape by playing live things have been quiet around Suicidal Tendencies with regards to making new albums lately. But 2013 is set to be a special year for front man Mike Muir (aka Cyco Mico) and his entourage of pumped up homeboys. The album 13 is the first in as many years and includes – you guessed it – 13 searing tracks which all demonstrate why Suicidal Tendencies is an institution. Not only the lead singer has long ago become a myth in the flesh; the guitarist Dean Pleasants is close to becoming a legend in his own right based on his funky grooves and eloquent solos. Whether you enjoy hardcore, thrash metal or skate punk, you HAVE to experience tracks like ”Institutionalized” and ”I Saw Your Mommy” live, before you kick off your sneakers for good.

Label: Suicidal / Target
description.dk:
Selvom de har holdt dagsformen intakt live, har der været stille omkring Suicidal Tendencies på albumfronten i en rum tid. Men 2013 bliver et mærkeår for frontmand Mike Muir (aka Cyco Mico) og hans følge af muskelsvære homeboys. Albummet 13 er det første i 13 år og har, rigtigt gættet, 13 svidende skæringer, der alle demonstrerer, hvorfor Suicidal Tendencies er blevet en institution. Ikke kun forsangeren er for længst blevet en myte i kød, muskler og blod, også guitarist Dean Pleasants er tæt på at antage legendestatus for sine funky grooves og veloplagte soloer. Hvad enten du er til hardcore, thrashmetal eller skatepunk, SKAL du opleve numre som ”Institutionalized” og ”I Saw Your Mommy” live, inden du stiller dine sneakers.

Label: Suicidal / Target

description.uk:
The beach, the sun, the waves. The music of David Alexander has a thing about summer.

Most of his songs are full of that sunlight people in Scandinavia only get to enjoy a few months each year. This gives the music its own shimmering, mournful beauty as synths, guitars and effect-drowned vocals weave a tapestry of drowsy summer memories, imaginary or real.

Label: Nomethod / Import
description.dk:
Stranden, solen, bølgerne. David Alexanders musik er optaget af sommeren.

De fleste af hans sange synes nærmest badet i det sollys, man i Skandinavien typisk kun er forundt et par måneder om året. Dette giver musikken sin egen glitrende, bedrøvede skønhed, når synths, flimrende guitarer og effektdruknede vokaler væver et broderi af døsige sommerminder, drømte som virkelige.

Label: Nomethod / Import

description.uk:
Canada’s ability to spawn original alternative bands seldom lets the country down.

Suuns are the expeimental types; imagine Radiohead born and raised in Montreal instead of Oxford.

In spite of the heavy electronic touch on their albums, they are primarily a rock band of the bold and adventurous kind with a penchant for jamming themselves into a cloud of electronica, krautrock and post-rock.

A new album called Images Du Futur is due in March. Suuns prepare to catch new souls in their hypermusical spiderweb.

Label: Secretly Canadian / Import
description.dk:
Canadas evne til at fostre alternative bands med stor originalitet fornægter sig sjældent lang tid af gangen.

Suuns er et af de mere eksperimenterende og udfordrende af slagsen – forestil dig Radiohead, hvis de var vokset op i Montreal i stedet for Oxford.

På trods af det stærke elektroniske islæt på deres plader er de et rockband live. Et avanceret, eventyrlystent rockband, som kan lide at jamme sig væk i en sky af electronica, krautrock og postrock.

Et nyt album ved navn Images Du Futur lander til marts. Suuns står klar til at indfange flere sjæle i deres hypermusikalske edderkoppespind.

Label: Secretly Canadian / Import

related.name: CHELSEA LIGHT MOVING
related.short_description: Noise rock with legendary lead singer

related.name: GOAT
related.short_description: Funky trance rock with an African flavour

related.name: K-X-P
related.short_description: Punk rock with a mechanical heart

related.name: JOHN GRANT
related.short_description: Brutally heartbreaking songs with an electronic touch

153.text: Classic hard rock with muscular riffs

description.uk:
With muscular riffs and a tight rhythm section, The Sword have become one of the most consistent heavy metal bands these days.

Fans of both sludge and stoner metal bands of recent times and worshippers of Black Sabbath are left in good hands with The Sword. These tough guys from Austin, Texas have a tight grip on the virtues of classic hard rock.

On their latest record Apocryphon, the main theme is Christianity’s banned texts of unholy wisdom. These boys have only one thing they hold sacred: The guitar riff in all its might and glory.

Label: Napalm / Target
description.dk:
Med sine muskuløse riffs og en stram rytmeenhed er The Sword et af vor tids mest konsistente heavy metal bands.

Hvad enten dine pejlemærker er nutidens sludge- og stonermetalbands eller Black Sabbath, er du i bedste hænder med The Sword. Mandfolkene fra Austin, Texas har et sikkert greb om den klassiske hårdrocks sandeste dyder.

På deres seneste plade Apocryphon er hovedtemaet kristendommens bandlyste tekster fyldt med uhellig visdom. Kun én ting er nemlig helligt for The Sword: Guitarriffet i al sin magt og stråleglans.

Label: Napalm / Target

related.name: KVELERTAK
related.short_description: Metallic hardcore punk with humour and hooks

description.uk:
Danish punk orchestra Synd Og Skam has arrived like a morning breeze.

So far, the noble savages have only released one EP, which was greeted with awed reviews from both critics and the public. Synd Og Skam share a vibe of having their backs against the wall and nothing to lose.

With pure poetry in Danish and semi-improvised post-punk, the Danes stir a very touching mélange of genres which is utterly dedicated to their own highly crooked vision of music and life.

Synd Og Skam, ladies and gentlemen, an imaginative, cryptic and very beautiful encounter.

Label: Af med hovedet
description.dk:
Bered dig på at blive blafret ør. En morgenbrise af et punkorkester, Synd Og Skam, er ankommet.

De noble vildmænd har indtil videre blot udgivet ep’en Blafret ør af kjoler. Her har de fået publikum og anmeldere til at tabe underkæben ganske synkront: De fremstår som en bande musikanter med ryggen mod muren og alt at vinde.

Med lige dele dansksproget poesi og halvvejs improviseret postpunk formår fynboerne at genreblande aldeles rørende og med en uforfængelig dedikation til deres krumbøjede musikvision.

Synd Og Skam, damer og herrer, et fabulerende, tungetalende og meget smukt bekendtskab.

Label: Af med hovedet

155.text: Virtuoso, Slavic folk music centered on strings

description.uk:
The music of the Roma people does not have to be played using horn ensembles. Söndörgö has had their breakthrough on the European roots-scene with a teeming concoction of harmonies from the southern Slavic regions, inspiringly transplanted to the bands home north of Budapest. The lively music is played and performed almost solely on the tambura; a regional stringed instrument whose potential is milked to the last drop. The virtuoso group of brothers and cousins has transferred their ancestral music to a present gear. This ensemble of well-playing fiery souls will give us a delightfully updated performance of the regions folk music.

Label: Harmonia Mundi / Import
description.dk:
Romaernes musik behøver ikke blive spillet med (s)truttende blæserensembler. Söndörgö er slået træfsikkert igennem på den europæiske roots-scene med et myldrende opkog af sydslaviske toner, som er blevet inspirerende omplantet i deres hjemstavn nord for Budapest. Den livlige musik er klimpret og musiceret næsten udelukkende på tambura; regionale strengeinstrumenter hvis potentiale malkes til sidste dråbe. Den virtuose flok af brødre og fætre har taget deres forfædres musik og sat den op i et mere nutidigt gear. Med et ensemble af velspillende ildsjæle som dette får vi egnens folkemusik i en velspillet opdatering.

Label: Harmonia Mundi / Import

156.text: Extremely heavy doom metal from the Baltic

description.uk: They call themselves the heaviest duo on Earth. Using only bass, drums and some keyboards Talbot breaks down the gates of the underworld making a maelstrom of black matter engulf you, the innocent and curious music lover. And, yes – you did read that correctly. There are no guitars to be found anywhere. The two Estonians set new standards for the genre of doom metal making it more remorseless and steaming cold than even the Baltic Sea.
description.dk: Jordens tungeste duo, kalder de sig selv. Ved hjælp af blot bas, trommer og lidt keyboard sparker Talbot døren ind til Dødsriget og får en malstrøm af sort materie til at strømme ud mod dig, sagesløse, nysgerrige musikelsker. Og jo, du læste rigtigt, der er ingen guitarer at finde i denne duo. Fra de baltiske vidder sætter to estere nye standarder for, hvordan man spiller doommetal, så den fremstår mere ubarmhjertig og rygende iskold end selve det baltiske hav.

157.text: Poetic dream pop from well-known female voice

description.uk:
She is among Denmark’s famous singing voices due to her past in the internationally renowned band Blue Foundation.

And now Kirstine Stubbe Teglbjærg has acquired a taste for the stage once again. She misses the audience – not least Roskilde’s – and has returned with an album called Hamskifte, Danish for shedding skin.

For the first time, Teglbjærg sings in Danish. The music is more organic than before, and Teglbjærg alternates between poetic, sensuous and more aggressive moods.

Here’s to an illustrious chanteuse coming home.

Label: A:larm
description.dk:
Med sin fortid hos triphoppede Blue Foundation er hun en af Danmarks mest berømte sangstemmer ude i det store udland.

Kirstine Stubbe Teglbjærg har fået smag for scenekanten igen. Hun savner publikum – ikke mindst Roskilde Festivals – og er vendt forandret tilbage med albummet Hamskifte.

Sproget er for første gang dansk. Musikken er mere organisk end før. Teglbjærg skifter mellem det poetiske, det sanselige og det kradsende.

Byd en hjemvendt sangengel velkommen tilbage.

Label: A:larm

description.uk:
Based in a dogma of total anonymity this Swedish band play their gothic noise rock cloaked in shadows. The self-titled debut album was fittingly released in the fall. In it the black silhouettes display their control of grinding guitars, booming bass and world-weariness. It is loud; it is noisy, like Black Rebel Motorcycle Club in Halloween-masks. It is evidence of the amount of psychedelic nuances found in the colour black.

Label: Novoton / Import
description.dk:
Med et dogme om total anonymitet spiller det svenske band deres gotiske støjrock svøbt i spørgsmålstegn og skygger. Det selvbetitlede debutalbum udkom passende nok i efteråret: Her udviser de sorte silhuetter en sikker fornemmelse for hvinende guitarriffs, buldrende bas og weltschmertz. Det er højt, det er støjende, som Black Rebel Motorcycle Club iført Halloween-masker, et bevis på hvor mange psykedeliske nuancer der findes i farven sort.

Label: Novoton / Import

related.name: K-X-P
related.short_description: Punk rock with a mechanical heart

related.name: GOAT
related.short_description: Funky trance rock with an African flavour

description.uk:
Rockuduro, Throes + The Shine call their debut record, the title offers a good description of a brand new music genre: A surprising rendezvous between alternative guitar rock and kuduro, the up-tempo dance music of Angola. This double band is a fully organic mashup introducing the song and rap of kuduro on top of guitar tones and drums from bearded indie kids. Throes + The Shine may be one of the first African-sounding dance bands to appear naturally along with American acts like Battles and HEALTH, as they’ve done in the past.

Label: Lovers & Lollypops / Import
description.dk:
Rockuduro, hedder Throes + The Shines debutplade, titlen giver en god beskrivelse af en ny musikgenre: Et overraskende møde mellem alternativ guitarrock og kuduro, Angolas optempo dansemusik. Dobbeltbandet er et fuldt organisk mashup, hvor kuduroens rap og sang foregår hen over de skæggede indieknægtes guitartoner og trommer. Throes + The Shine er givetvis et af de første afrikanskklingende dansebands, der har indgået sømløst i lineups sammen med eksperimenterende amerikanere som Battles og HEALTH.

Label: Lovers & Lollypops / Import

description.uk:
Röyksopp meet Boards of Canada in the sound world of Norwegian producer Torkelsen, who’s currently enjoying international acclaim.

With elements of glitch, instrumental hip hop and frostbitten soundscapes, the young beat smith has evolved a Scandinavian electronica more shimmering than the ice caps. On other releases, like Torsnes Beats vol. 2, the beats have more energy, “dirt and lo-fi elements”, according to Torkelsen himself.

Label: Sellout! Music / Import
description.dk:
Röyksopp møder Boards of Canada hos den norske producer Torkelsen, der lige nu får pæn opmærksomhed uden for de nordiske landegrænser.

Med elementer af glitch, instrumental hiphop og frostkølige lydlandskaber har den unge beatsmed udviklet en skandinavisk electronica, der funkler og stråler som indlandsisen. På andre udgivelser, som Torsnes Beats vol. 2, er beatet ifølge Torkelsen selv mere beskidt, rodet og energisk.

Label: Sellout! Music / Import

related.name: HIGHASAKITE
related.short_description: Alternative pop in full war paint

161.text: North African diva and global music star

description.uk:
She pays her third visit to Roskilde Festival this year. And a voice like that of Rokia Traoré is an even greater need today than ever before.

Today she serves as a voice for not just Mali, but the entire African continent. Her new album is called Beautiful Africa and has regular PJ Harvey wingman John Parish producing.

Rokia Traoré uses West African traditions as a stepping stone, but her live shows first and foremost embody the funky and electric Africa. You can also tell that the diplomat's daughter has listened to music from all over the globe throughout her life.

Label: Nonesuch / import
description.dk:
Hun spiller på Roskilde Festival for tredje gang. Og sjældent før har en stemme som Rokia Traorés været så tiltrængt.

Hun er i dag en af ikke blot Malis, men Afrikas centrale musikambassadører. Hendes nye plade hedder Beautiful Africa og bliver produceret af PJ Harveys faste sidemand John Parish.

Rokia Traoré har afsæt i vestafrikanske musiktraditioner, men hendes livekoncerter er indbegrebet af det funky, elektriske Afrika. Samtidig er det tydeligt på divaens magiske musik, at hun som diplomatdatter har lyttet til musik fra hele kloden hele sit liv.

Label: Nonesuch / import

description.uk:
He may be the hottest new Icelandic act right now. Ásgeir Trausti’s songs are also well on their way to reach the world outside the volcanic island.

The classical trained talent’s music is based on naked, beautiful songs, written and played on his acoustic guitar and spiced up with electronic features.

At Roskilde Festival he will bring a full band. The band version of the concerts includes musicians who normally play in his older brother’s reggae band Hjálmar.

Label: Sena / import
description.dk:
Han er måske Islands hotteste nye navn lige nu. Og Ásgeir Traustis sange er godt på vej til også at ramme verden uden for vulkanøen.

Udgangspunktet for det klassisk trænede stortalent er nøgne, smukke sange skrevet på akustisk guitar her og der tilsat elektroniske krummelurer.

På Roskilde Festival agter han at komme med fuldt band. Orkesterudgaven af koncerterne inkluderer også musikere, som normalt går til hånde i storebrorens reggaeband Hjálmar.

Label: Sena / import

related.name: HIGHASAKITE
related.short_description: Alternative pop in full war paint

related.name: MARIE KEY
related.short_description: Airy, Danish-language pop from a sharp pen.

description.uk:
With ever-moving foothold in both alternative rock and global sounds, Travelling Tribes have made their way into a Copehagen scene of psychedelica unafraid to make the musical paint box merge altogether. Tribal percussion, foreign melodies on the cello, synthesizers and impressionistic guitars are along for the ride when this bold collective cross the continents and head for the remote villages.

Label: ILK
description.dk:
Med omskifteligt rodfæste i både alternativ rock og verdensmusik har Travelling Tribes gjort sig bemærket som del af en psykedelisk københavnerscene, der ikke er bange for at lade den musikalske farvelade løbe helt sammen. Stammeagtigt slagtøj, udenlandsklingende melodier på celloen, synthesizers og impressionistisk guitarspil er blot nogle af de elementer, der kommer med på rejsen, når dette vovemodige kollektiv drager hen over kontinenterne og ud i provinserne.

Label: ILK

related.name: GEOMUNGO FACTORY
related.short_description: Groovy sitar music with ancient origins

related.name: ELOQ
related.short_description: Gritty beats from Copenhagen sound chief

164.text: Improvisational noise orchestra for the adventurous

description.uk:
Tremoro Tarantura play their music ”on location” and never enter a studio. As a consequence they are led on their journey into the storm of noise- and avant-garde rock music by any impressions or ideas that may come to them in the spur of the moment. The Norway-based experimenters share home turf with appraised orchestras like the post jazz band Supersilent. Thus, we can expect a similar cacophony of sound from all the colours of the musical rainbow – according to one source the Norwegians find their inspiration from acts such as AC/DC, the harsh composer Penderecki and the velvety Frenchman Serge Gainsbourg.

Label: Kakao Musikk / Import
description.dk:
Tremoro Tarantura spiller deres musik ’on location’ og går aldrig i studiet. Det er altså de indtryk og indfald, de nyder på et givet tidspunkt, som leder dem på vej ind i støj- og avantgarderockens stormvejr. Den internationale gruppe af eksperimentalister er bosat i Norge, der også er hjemstavn for hæderkronede orkestre som eksempelvis postjazzbandet Supersilent. Vi kan altså forvente en kakafoni, der låner fra alle musikregnbuens farver – ifølge én kilde finder nordmændene inspiration både hos AC/DC, den krasse komponist Penderecki og den fløjlsbløde franskmand Serge Gainsbourg.

Label: Kakao Musikk / Import

165.text: Alternative rock icon takes over R&B

description.uk:
R&B and alternative rock has been giving each other flirtatious looks for quite some time. Truls Heggero has taken the final step and decided to get into bed with urban, glittery pop music. The celebrated songwriter, vocalist and composer won the appraisal of the audience working with Lukestar, who played at Roskilde Festival in 2011. The Norwegian falsetto towered above guitar-laden power pop with a Nordic feel. As of now the guitar strings are less prominent and replaced by booty shaking electronic pop and soul. Judging by initial responses this brave change of clothing will continue to please fans of the big man’s former bands.

Label: EMI Norge / Import
description.dk:
R&B og alternativ rock har længe sendt hinanden flirtende blikke. Truls Heggero har taget skridtet helt ud og besluttet sig for at gå i kanen med den urbane, glitrende popmusik. Den hyldede sangskriver, vokalist og komponist vandt især publikums gunst med Lukestar, som spillede på Roskilde Festival i 2011. Her tårnede nordmandens falsetstemme hen over en bund af guitarpræget powerpop med nordisk sug. Fra nu af bliver guitarstrengene nedtonet til fordel for elektronisk pop og soul med vrik i bagdelen. Et modigt hamskifte, der stadig – efter de første, tidlige lyt at dømme – vil behage fans af den store mands tidligere bands.

Label: EMI Norge / Import

related.name: KARPE DIEM
related.short_description: Hip hop with loads of humour and humanism

166.text: Punky garage rock with devil horns and hard-ons

description.uk:
The Denim-Demons of Turbonegro are back at Roskilde for the first time since 2005. A new lead singer has joined the fray and the barks of Tony Sylvester has given the Norwegians a fresh shot of punk in the jugular, which is very evident on the comeback album Sexual Harrassment. Rarely has garage rock with devil horns and a permanent hard-on been played better than by this pack of crazed dogs. With whiplash guitar solos and flavours of booze and kinky sex, Turbonegro are set to save rock music and they will send it back where it belongs: In the arms of the Devil himself.

Label: Volcom Entertainment / Import
description.dk:
Denim-dæmonerne Turbonegro er tilbage på Roskilde Festival for første gang siden 2005. En ny forsanger er steget på, Tony Sylvesters barkede bjæf har tilført nordmændene fornyet punkenergi direkte i blodåren, hvilket fremgår tydeligt på genkomstskiven Sexual Harrassment. Garagerock med djævlehorn og stådreng er sjældent spillet bedre end af den her omgang helvedeshunde. Med guitarsoloer, der kan forårsage piskesmæld, og en ren, simpel rockenergi, der strutter af sjusser og kinky sex, står Turbonegro klar til at redde rocken og sende den tilbage i armene på Den Onde selv.

Label: Volcom Entertainment / Import

related.name: KVELERTAK
related.short_description: Metallic hardcore punk with humour and hooks

description.uk:
Funeral doom is a subgenre in extreme metal, in which everything sounds like it is played in slow motion. The music marches like a funeral procession towards annihilation. The Finnish duo Tyranny is one of the strongest lineups in the genre. Their extremely prolonged mini-symphonies depict the lot of the human race as seen from the icy cold perspective of eternity. Tyranny’s vocals are dragged from the blackest reaches of the cosmos, the guitar riffs and minor keyed keyboards drags the music to the limit of imagination without stalling the dark march completely.

Label: Firebox / Target
description.dk:
Funeral doom er en undergenre inden for ekstremmetallen, hvor alting lyder, som blev det spillet i langsom gengivelse. Som et sørgeoptog traver musikken med tunge skridt mod udslettelsen forude. Den finske duo Tyranny er en af genrens stærkeste repræsentanter. I ekstremt udstrakte minisymfonier skildrer finnerne menneskeracens lod set fra evighedens iskolde perspektiv. Tyrannys knurrevokaler lyder som hentet fra den sorteste ende af kosmos, guitarakkorderne og molfladerne på keyboardet trækker musikken ud så langt, som tænkes kan, uden at den mørke march går helt i stå.

Label: Firebox / Target

168.text: Devious hard rock from the cellar tombs

description.uk:
With a mixture of darkly psychedelic hard rock and heavy metal, Uncle Acid & The Deadbeats have gathered what is practically a small cult around their name.

There is a hefty groove behind the zip of the leather trousers and the boys from Cambridge seem inspired by gory horror flicks, Charles Manson and their old Alice Cooper and Black Sabbath vinyls.

Uncle Acid & The Deadbeats will be a revelation for everybody with a penchant for memorable melodies and nostalgic fuzz guitars.

Label: Rise Above / Target
description.dk:
Med en blanding af mørk, psykedelisk hårdrock og heavy metal har Uncle Acid & The Deadbeats skabt en mindre kult omkring deres navn.

Her er et bastant groove i dyret inde bag læderbuksens lynlås. Cambridge-drengene er efter alt at dømme inspireret af splatterfilm, Charles Manson og deres gamle vinylplader med Alice Cooper og Black Sabbath.

Uncle Acid & The Deadbeats bliver en åbenbaring for alle, der kan lide deres rock indsvøbt i mindeværdige melodier og nostalgisk fuzzpedal på guitaren.

Label: Rise Above / Target

description.uk:
The poppy acid rock songs of Ruban Nielson made the world want a piece of him, before his trippy sugar cubes were even ready for consumption.

This year’s follow-up album, II, has just arrived. It carries on with flickering sunshine, laid-back nonchalance and heartwarming melodies.

Unknown Mortal Orchestra gazes reverently at late The Beatles and early Pink Floyd, and the acid trip also has a slack, home-made vibe reminiscent of a young Beck.

Label: Jagjaguwar / Cosmos
description.dk:
Ruban Nielsons poppede syrerocksange fik musikverden til at løbe ham på døren, nærmest inden newzealænderens trippede sukkerknalder var klar til indtagelse.

Opfølgeren til debutpladen, II, er lige udkommet. Her fortsætter Unknown Mortal Orchestra stilen med stenet guitarrock fyldt med flimrende solskin, tilbagelænet nonchalance og hjertevarmende melodier.

Unknown Mortal Orchestra har blikket rettet mod sen The Beatles og tidlig Pink Floyd, men tilfører syretrippet sin egen tilbagelænede og hjemmehæklede vibe, der kan minde lidt om en ung Beck.

Label: Jagjaguwar / Cosmos

description.uk:
With enthustiastic live shows and well-timed releases, Urban Cone have moved into position as the new wonder boys of Swedish pop. The international blog community has taken notice, as well. Urban Cone’s dance friendly synth pop shows love of The Human League and other neon classics. At the same time, Urban Cone are gifted with an acute ear for pop tunes so characteristic of the Swedes.

Label: Universal Music Sweden / Import
description.dk:
Med drypvise musikudgivelser og entusiastiske liveshows har Urban Cone på kort tid kørt sig selv i stilling som svensk popmusiks nye gulddrenge. Også det internationale blogvæsen har danset efter Stockholm-drengenes pibe fra første færd. Urban Cones dansevenlige synthpop vidner om kærlighed til både The Human League og andre klassikere inden for den neonblinkende musik, samtidig har Urban Cone det der særlige popøre, som det svenske folk åbenbart besidder automatisk.

Label: Universal Music Sweden / Import

description.uk:
Flosstradamus, Toddla T and Diplo have praised him. Everyone from the dj/producer Dave Nade to the porn actress Jessie Andrews have claimed to be the person behind the mask – the true ƱZ. Like Batman or Banksy, ƱZ lives in the shadows and makes the imagination put in extra hours. The mysterious individual paved the way for perhaps the first musical genre born exclusively on the Internet: Trap is a wild mix of digital bass, dubstep and house. The cartoon-like music has been raised in the schizophrenic greenhouses of YouTube and Soundcloud and ƱZ belongs to the crème de la crème of the crazy beat makers of the 10s.

Label: Jeffree's / Import
description.dk:
Flosstradamus, Toddla T og Diplo har hyldet ham. Alle fra dj/producer Dave Nada til pornoskuespillerinden Jessie Andrews har hævdet at være skikkelsen bag masken, den sande ƱZ. Som en anden Batman eller Banksy lever ƱZ i skyggerne og sætter fantasien på overarbejde. Den gådefulde M/K vejen for den måske første rendyrkede internetmusikgenre: Trap er en heftig blanding af digital bas, dubstep og house. Den næsten tegneserieagtige musik er opfostret i YouTube og Soundclouds skizofrene væksthuse, og ƱZ tilhører cremen af cremen inden for disse 10’ernes gale beats.

Label: Jeffree's / Import

description.uk:
Since 1963, Marcos Valle has been a pioner of Brazilian music. He combines Western pop music, soul and jazz with bossa nova and other genres bursting with vitamin D. With his gentle, conversing voice he makes the snug music glow with well-being and ease. Underneath, however, there is also a political bite. The cozy music with its breezy flutes, groovy guitars, Hammond organ and jazzy electric piano has claws found in the lyrics. Marcos Valle deserves a place as one of Brazil’s major icons alongside Gilberto Gil and Caetana Veloso. The old master will be joined on stage by a dynamic exponent of the next generation, Lucas Santtana.

Label: Far Out / Import
description.dk:
Siden 1963 har Marcos Valle været en af den brasilianske musiks bannerførere. Som en sand pionér har han kombineret vestlig popmusik, soul og jazz med bossa nova og andre D-vitaminafgivende musikgenrer. Med sin blide, konverserende stemme får han den lune, vrikkende musik til at ose af velvære. Og neden under de blide briser er der også en politisk stillingtagen. Den kælne musik med de raspe fløjter, groovy guitar, Hammond-orgel og jazzede elklaver bider fra sig, hvis man lytter til Valles tekster. Marcos Valle fortjener en plads som en af Brasiliens stærkeste røster ved siden af Gilberto Gil og Caetana Veloso. Den gamle mester får selskab på scenen af en dynamisk repræsentant for næste generation, nemlig Lucas Santtana.

Label: Far Out / Import

description.uk:
With inspiration from 80s no wave, post punk and dark industrial, Vanligt Folk have already won several Swedish black hearts.

DAF, Nitzer Ebb and Einstürzende Neubauten are just a few of the benchmarks that have been deduced from the trio’s self-titled EP. Icy synths and ominous cold war atmosphere played and sung with insisting endurance.

With only one EP, we have only seen the early shapes of the black swan Vanligt Folk may turn into.

Label: Progress Productions / Import
description.dk:
Med tankerne rettet mod 80’ernes no wave, postpunk og mørke industrial har Vanligt Folk allerede kapret mange sorte svenske hjerter.

DAF, Nitzer Ebb og Einstürzende Neubauten er blot nogle af de inspirationskilder, man har udledt af trioens selvbetitlede ep. Her er kølige synths og ildevarslende koldkrigsstemning spillet og sunget med en insisterende inderlighed.

Med kun en ep ude har vi endnu kun set det første omrids af, hvilken form for sort svane, Vanligt Folk er i færd med at udvikle sig til.

Label: Progress Productions / Import

description.uk:
Dominick Fernow focuses on the war on terror with his Vatican Shadow project. With electronic loops, he takes us into a world of Islamic uprising, military buildup and blood-dripping partisan warfare.

The American's disturbing electro is dark, dystopian and industrial – yet, the whole universe is recognisable from news channels’ restless broadcasting.

Vatican Shadow is not the versatile American's only project. He also records under the name Prurient and is head of the trendsetting record label Hospital Productions.
description.dk:
Dominick Fernow drejer radaren ind på krigen mod terror med Vatican Shadow. I fåmælte, elektroniske loops tager han os med ind i en verden af islamisk opstand, militær oprustning og bloddryppende partisankrig.

Amerikanerens foruroligende electro er dunkel, dystopisk og industriel i tonen – stadig er hele universet genkendeligt fra nyhedskanalernes hvileløse sendeflader.

Vatican Shadow er ikke den alsidige amerikaners eneste projekt. Han indspiller også under navnet Prurient og er chef for det stilskabende pladeselskab Hospital Productions.

related.name: ANDY STOTT
related.short_description: Atmospheric electronica with a heavy bass

description.uk:
You have to be made of stone to not want a pair of golden shoes, a suit and plenty of hair gel when Vinnie Who takes the stage with copious amounts of synths and soprano vocals. Niels Bagge, which is the real name behind the disco comet, keeps drawing fresh souls towards the mirror ball-light, where good melodies and delicate movements of the hip just keep going. At 2013’s Midnight Special it will be made clear that the talented singer and songwriter intends to stay. An uncompromising will to make intelligent disco has given Vinnie Who the title of funky pop prince of Denmark.

Label: EMI
description.dk:
Når Vinnie Who indtager scenen med rigelige mængder synths og falsetvokaler, skal man være et skarn for ikke at ønske sig guldsko, jakkesæt og masser af gele i håret. Niels Bagge, som er disco-kometens borgerlige navn, vinder hele tiden nye sjæle ind under sin spejlkugle, hvor de gode melodier og det sarte svaj i hoften bare fortsætter. På 2013s Midnight Special står det klart, at den talentfulde sanger og sangskriver er kommet for at blive. Med en kompromisløs vilje til intelligent disco er Vinnie Who blevet Danmarks funky popprins.

Label: EMI

related.name: MARIE KEY
related.short_description: Airy, Danish-language pop from a sharp pen.

description.uk:
Rock, roll and metal in perfect harmony has been the foundation that has helped Volbeat all the way to the top.

On an unparalleled ride towards the top of the metal scene, the lads have developed a unique blend of melodic stadium heavy rock, packed as tight straw bale with equal parts power and hit potential.

Today they don’t bow and scrape to anyone on the European metal scene. The US is also conquered. Tour buddies and source of inspiration, Metallica, are now friends of the band.

In 2013, Volbeat will make another impact. A new, galloping rock album is released this spring.

The homecoming at Roskilde Festival will be a proud reunion with some local heroes whose world domination is about to be a reality.

Label: Universal
description.dk:
Rock, rul og metal i skøn forening har været grundstenene, der har hjulpet Volbeat helt til tops.

I et uforligneligt ridt mod metalscenens øverste tinde har drengene udviklet en unik blanding af melodiøs stadiontungrock, pakket som en stram halmballe med lige dele råstyrke og hitpotentiale.

I dag bukker og skraber de ikke for nogen på den europæiske metalscene. Også USA er erobret. Turnekammeraterne og inspirationskilden Metallica er i dag blandt bandets venner.

I 2013 kommer Volbeat til at støde hårdere igennem end nogensinde. En ny, galopperende rockplade er på stepperne til foråret.

Hjemkomsten på Roskilde Festival bliver et stolt gensyn med nogle lokale helte, hvis verdensdominans er ved at være at være en realitet.

Label: Universal

related.name: METALLICA
related.short_description: Thrash giants roll over the Orange Stage.

related.name: KVELERTAK
related.short_description: Metallic hardcore punk with humour and hooks

description.uk:
”Shoot the Moon” Voodoo Glow Skulls proclaim in one of their classic songs. The style defining collective has aimed for the sky since 1988. Their songs roar along in a fiery hurricane of punk, ska and trombones – like Bad Religion, Sick Of It All and The Specials rolled into one pumped up orchestra. Using political aggression, humour and the characteristically Californian mixture of Spanish and English, Voodoo Glow Skulls has showed no intention of slowing down despite a 25 year long career. Look forward to being run over when Voodoo Glow Skulls let the black magic explode during the late hours of Roskilde Festival.

Label: Smelvis / Import
description.dk:
”Shoot the Moon”, proklamerer Voodoo Glow Skulls i en af deres klassiske sange. Det stilskabende kollektiv har siden 1988 altid sigtet højt. Deres sange sprutter af sted i en chilibrændende orkan af punk, ska og myldrende tromboner – som Bad Religion, Sick Of It All og The Specials rullet sammen til ét muskelstruttende orkester. Med politisk riv, humor og Californiens karakteristiske blanding af spansk og engelsk har Voodoo Glow Skulls ingen intentioner om at sætte farten ned 25 år inde i deres karriere. Glæd dig til at blive løbet over ende, når Voodoo Glow Skulls lader den mørke magi eksplodere i Roskildes sene nattetime.

Label: Smelvis / Import

description.uk:
Flamboyant band When Saints Go Machine opened the Orange Stage in 2010 with their electronic, velvety pop. International music media have also taken note of the Copenhagen dandies fronted by the incomparably versatile singer Nikolaj Vonsild in front.

Their impressionistic sound is permeated by a desire to experiment. Yet, the melodies and delicate sway of the hips are never abandoned. And their latest single "Mannequin" demonstrates that the towering ambition is unlikely to be lowered on their new album, Infinity Pool.

When Saints Go Machine continues to win new fans among both audiences and critics. An elegant swan with neatly painted feathers.

Label: EMI
description.dk:
Flamboyante When Saints Go Machine åbnede Orange Scene i 2010 med deres elektroniske, fløjlsbløde pop. Udlandet har også taget notits af de københavnske dandyer med den uforligneligt alsidige forsanger Nikolaj Vonsild i front.

Deres impressionistiske lydunivers er gennemsyret af en trang til at eksperimentere. Alligevel bliver melodierne og det sarte hoftesvaj aldrig ladt i stikken. Og deres seneste single ”Mannequin” demonstrerer, at det tårnhøje ambitionsniveau næppe bliver sænket på deres nye fuldlængde, Infinity Pool.

When Saints Go Machine fortsætter med at vinde fans både blandt publikum og kritikere. En elegant svane med sirligt malede fjer.

Label: EMI

description.uk:
On his breakthrough album Big Inner Matthew E. White mixes soul, jazzy soft rock and folk in a way that makes listening to the record feel like having your bones warmed by the sun. The music could be described as gospel for hipsters and doubters. But Mr. White’s songs sizzle with an amount of American musical history, enough to make the long tracks seem thrumming with reality and sincerity. Matthew E. White transfers the album to the stage accompanied by the heavily armed Spacebomb. The young master and his backing band will make sure to hit you squarely in the softest part of your solar plexus with every trembling tone.

Label: Domino / Playground
description.dk:
På sin gennembrudsplade Big Inner blander Matthew E. White soul, jazzet softrock og folk på en måde, så det at lytte med er som at få knoglerne varmet igennem af solen. Gospel for hipsters og tvivlere, kunne man næsten kalde musikken. Men Mr. Whites sange syder samtidig af nok amerikansk musikhistorie til, at de lange sange fremstår ægte og dirrende. Når Matthew E. White overfører pladen til scenen, sker det i ledtog med sværtbevæbnede Spacebomb. Husorkesteret sørger sammen med denne unge mester for, at hver tindrende tone også rammer dig lige i dit blødeste mellemgulv.

Label: Domino / Playground
